You kick open the door and toss Ashley with the others. Ashley! Kim said. You shrink down. That’s all of them. You said. Looks like it wasn’t easy. He said. A few hiccups, but nothing major. He said. Don’t say I didn’t give you anything. He said. He hands you 50,000 dollars in cash. (Private island. Here I come.) He said. Is that how much your soul’s worth? A few thousand dollars!? Kira said. You need a soul to lose it. You said leaving.

You head to o district and find Arif. Holy shit…. You look terrible. Ash didn’t go easy on you. He said. I’ll be fine. Here. You said. You hand him half of your cash. You know, it took every once of me not to beat down Kyle when I saw him. He said. I saw it on your face. Kyle can have his fantasy world of women at the top, but we’re going to make our own lives. Dictated by no one but ourselves. You said. No other way to live. He said.
11111111111111111111111111111.title: In m district

111111111111111111111111111111.content:
With Ashley and her friends captured, Kyle wasted no time. He quickly broadcasted the name of the traitors and hos sentence for them. When that was done, m district was easy pickings. Without Ashley and her friends, m district quickly fell. No stone was left unturned. Every single man there was captured and placed in the prison. Rumors spread that you helped the master in his conquest. They were mad at Kyle for betraying them, but what you did made you public enemy number 1. But you didn’t care. If there was anyone to blame, it themselves. That’s what you thought. They weren’t strong enough to fight, so they get what they deserve.

You’re on a rooftop in m district. Completely deserted…. You said. (They were through. They say we’re worse than Kyle now.) He said. (Like I care.) You said. You leave M district and head to the prison. You walk inside the prison and look around until you find Ashley in a cell. You holding up in there, Sue? You said. Saying that she’s angry at you would be an understatement. If it wasn’t for those bars, she’d come at you. At least they’re feeding you. But I can’t imagine the torture they’re putting you through. You said. She grits her teeth and snarls. Looks like the re-education is working. You’re acting just like those preteens. You said. Ashley calms herself down. Looks like you need some more. I’d love to stay, but I got things to do. You said. …..You know, there is a lot to life I don’t know about….. But there is one thing I know for sure. You’re going to suffer pain, loss, and betrayal. Just like all of us. And when you’re at your lowest point, there’s going to be no one there for you. No one to pull you out of the darkness. I hope you suffer the worst pain and suffering this world has! She said. That’s ominous. But that kind of pain has no effect on someone with nothing and no one. You said. Lying to yourself….. You’ll find out. People like you always get theirs. She said. Goes to show you don’t know who I am or what I’ve been through. You said. You head out and leave. (That was….interesting. Looks like we won’t be friends with Sue at all.) He said. (That was never going to happen. She’s a bleeding heart.) He said. (Reminds me of……Narue.) He said. (Don’t compare Sue to Narue. Stark difference between compassion and bleeding heart.) You said.

You get back to m district. So how’s the whole mayor thing? You said. Who am I going to govern? The rats? You said. A lot more useful. You said. I take it Ashley’s not happy. He said. Livid. You said. And Kim? Is she…..doing ok? He said. I didn’t go see the other two. But you can go see her and tell her you like her. You said. You think she’ll understand!? I mean! I don’t like her. N….not like that! More as….. What’s the word? He said. Girlfriend? You said. You can see us together? I mean! That’s not it! He said. Arif, you can lie to me, but not yourself. You know your heart beats for her. You said. In a world like this, love is the last thing I thought would get me. He said. I can brake her out. If you want. You said. Then it would be awkward. Plus, I know Kim. She’s already thinking of a way to get out. He said. Flowers and chocolate. Throw in a teddy bear if you want the extra points. You said. I don’t think I can find flowers pretty enough for her. D…. Did I just say that out loud? He said. Yep. And your toughness has gone down by ten. You said. You laugh as Arif looks away in shame.

After a while, you head back to Mira’s. You don’t get through the door before Miley comes running. Miley. You said. Hey…. How’d you get like this? She said. You didn’t think I would stay small forever, did you? You said. But you can’t be my little brother like this. She said. Sure I can. You said. You will?! Thank you! She said. Miley hugs you as Mira shows up. So…. You’re back. She said. Give us a minute, Miley. You said. Miley runs to her room. She sees you as family. She said. She likes me. You said. That makes one of us. She said. Come on. You still mad at what I said? That was over a month ago. You said. You said you didn’t need a worrywart like me. So I took the hint. She said. Doesn’t mean you have to act like you hate me. You said. I don’t hate you, but you obviously don’t want me to like you. She said. You talk like you hate me. You said. Why do you care? She said. Cause home is where the heart is. You said. So this is home to you? She said. Don’t say it like that. Miley likes having me around. You said. You don’t treat her like you treat me. She said. Come on. You aren’t giving me a fair chance here. You said. Over a month in and you still act like we first met. She said. It’s hard to adjust. You said. How? I treat you with respect, I don’t threaten you, make you do anything you don’t want to, what else is there I need to do? Walk around half or fully naked. She said. ……Is that a legit option? You said. …..Pervert. She said blushing. Point is, I’ve treated you with the utmost and you still have a stick in your ass. She said. I can be easy going and all that. I just don’t show it. She said. Why not? She said. If you haven’t notice, your kind isn’t the friendliest. Killing, enslaving, eating, mutilating, and that’s all before noon. You said. So you see me like one of those sadists? She said. I didn’t say you. But nine out of ten isn’t a good number. You said. Miley? She said. Eight out of ten. Sill isn’t good. You said. Which bring me back to my original question: What else do I need to do? She said. I don’t know. Kiss me? You said. Mira walks up to you, takes your mask off and plants one on you. You could feel her tongue invading your mouth. (Damn…..) He said. After a minute, she breaks it.

That do it? She said. I was actually being sarcastic about that. You said, putting your mask back on. Y…..you were? She said, stunned. Of course. I didn’t think you would actually do it. And where did you learn to kiss like that? On your pillow? You said. T…. That’s not important! She said, blushing. (This one is full of surprises…. I think I’ll let her live.) He said. (Because you’re crushing hard on Miley.) You said. (…..So?) He said. (Aww. There is a heart in you.) You said.
111111111111111111111111111111.title: A month later

1111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Hey, little brother! Miley said, running up to you. Hm? What is it? She said. Come play with me. She said. Ok…. You said a little unsure. Not like this. Shrink back down first. She said. (What is this kid planning?) You thought. (Do it.) He said. Using your armband, you shrink back down. Perfect! This will make it easier to play! She said. Miley reaches for you and your hand was on your knife’s hilt. Her fingers wrap around you and you’re lifted up to her smiling face. This….is a different perspective. Joanna was one thing, I knew what she’d would do. But this…. You said. Hehe! You’re even cuter in my hand! She said. Try….to not let it go to your head. You said. But you’re so cute! I can’t help it! She said. S-so what are we playing here? You said. Don’t sound like that. You won’t get hurt at all. And you’re going to love it! She said, smiling. (A smile that big. I’ve seen that smile before.) You said. (All the things Joanna did to you.) He said. (Yeah. She’s about to…..) Before you could finish, you were pressed against Miley’s lips. Mwah! She said. She kisses you multiple times, smothering you against her soft lips. Mwah! I call it the kissing game! I kiss you until I think you had enough! She said. For the next 5 minutes, you’re assaulted by Miley lips. When she finally stops, she laughs. Told you that you’d love it. She said. It was…..something. You said. Let’s play like this next time! She said. Sure…. You said.

After cleaning the spit from your mask and suit, you get a message on your phone. Unknown? “I think it’s time we meet. Follow the broken highway out of o district. Come alone” It said. (Someone wants our attention.) He said. (From the tone of the message, it’s not Sue.) You said. (Maybe it’s the benefactor who’s sent all his money to the army.) He said. (Only one way to find out.) You said. You head out to o district, but not before telling Arif.

Someone sent you a message to meet you out of beyond o district? He said. Yeah. You said. Only a few people have been gone past o district. He said. Is it dangerous? You said. No one has come back to say what’s out there. Not even Kyle’s elites go past o district. They’ll go in the ocean, but not pass the o district border. He said. They must think I can survive to get to them. You said. I don’t think you should go alone. He said. Said I had to. Like you said, don’t know what’s out there. You said. How long will it be? He said. Don’t know. A few hours, days, weeks, or even months. Don’t worry. I’ll be back to be best man in your wedding to Kim. You said. Arif blushes as you laugh. See you later. You said. You head into o district and see the highway. Still intact and standing. But piece of it missing. You said. You start walking.

As you walk, you see destroyed cars and crushed cars. Along with a few bloodstains. Blood’s all dried. This must have happen a long time ago. You said. You keep going until you reach the end of the long highway. Damn. This place makes o district look nice. You said. You see long mutilated bodies, skeletons, dried blood, and bodies with no heads. You look around to see the buildings are in a horrible state. Dilapidated and crumbling down. Man. This makes what the women do look sane. You said. (Who do you think did this in the first place?) He said. (No sane person would do this?) You said. (You think these girls are sane?) He said. (Far from it. But this is another level.) You said. You cell phone goes off. “Enough sightseeing. Get to the center.” He said. You walk into the city.


Back in f district.

In the prison

Ahhhh! Ashley said, screaming. We’ve been at this for hours. Why don’t you tell me what I want to know? Kyle said. I told you….. I don’t know him. She said. Same story from your friends. You think we’ll believe that? Kouyki said. It’s the damn truth. No one knows the guy. Ashley said. One of you knows for sure. Amy said. She punches Ashley in the gut. Even though Amy was shorter than Ashley, the serum she took made her stronger. Who is he!? And how is he so strong? She said. Like I said, I don’t know….. Ashley said. Amy. Stop. She’s right. Kyle said. She’s lying. I know one of these three know something! She said. We’ve been torturing them for days, and all of them say the same thing. Luna said. If they don’t know him personally, then they must know someone who does. Yumi said. Talk. Who does he hang out with? Amy said. You think…..I keep tabs on him? Ashley said. All of you know each other. Who does he be around the most? Amy said. I…..don’t know. Ashley said. We’re getting nowhere with her, Amy. Let’s question the other two. Kyle said. Amy walks over to Kira. She gets her a nasty look as Amy sits her up.

Who does he know? Amy said. As much as I hate him, I hate you more. I’m not telling you a damn thing…. Kira said. Amy hits Kira and she falls down. Ashley was getting mad. She didn’t care if they hurt her, but Kim and Kira, she couldn’t stand seeing hurt. Amy beats on Kira until Kim shouts stop. What? Amy said. I said stop. I…..know who he spends his time around. Kim said. Who? Who is it!? Amy shouted. …..Arif. His name is Arif. She said. Wait. The guy who came into my mansion? Kyle said. If he he looked like trouble, yeah. That’s him. Kim said. Where is he? Koyuki said. Around this time….. He’s usually walking around m district. She said. Girls. Find him and bring him here. With a nod, each one of the elites head to m district. I’m so sorry, Arif…. Kim said


Back to your pov.

This looks like the center. You said, getting another message. “Took long enough. Don’t just stand out in the open. Find a secure place.” It said. (Could have told us in the last one.) He said. You look at the crumbling buildings and find one that is stable. You head inside and get a text. “Sun is setting. Too dangerous to move at night. Stay there until daybreak.” It said. Looks like I’m camping here. You said. You put some rubble and wood together and make a fire. You sit next to the fire and taken in what happen today. (This person better have a really good explanation for making us camp out like hobos.) He said. (Has to be if they want us to come to this place. You don’t bring someone here for nothing.) You said.
1111111111111111111111111111111.title: An invitation

11111111111111111111111111111112.content:
Master. We’re back. Koyuki said. What took so long? Kyle said. Sorry. This one knows how to hide. Yumi said. Rgh! Get your grimy hands off me! You said. Shut up! Amy said, squezzing you. Argh! You said. Arif! Stop it! Kim said. Amy. Kyle said. Ay loosen her grip. Alright…. You got my attention, Kyle. What is it that you want? You said. The guy you hang out. Who and what is he? Luna said. You think I know? You said. Your friend here says you’re around him the most. Yumi said. I know as much about him as he likes Ash. And that’s nothing. You said. Really? You seem buddy-buddy with him when you were in my mansion. Kyle said. He was only like that because I’m close with these three. You and your stupid plans, Kira! You said. At least I did something! She said. Enough! You. How is he so powerful? Koyuki said. How would I know? He doesn’t tell me anything. You said. He must have told you something! Amy said. He didn’t. I don’t even know his name. But I know that crossing him isn’t good for your life. And that money is his sole love. These three should know that. You said. So none of you know a single thing? Kyle said. That’s what we’ve been saying…. Ash said. If that’s the case, we should do something about them. Luna said. And what’s that? Mind control collars? More torture? Execute us in the arena? Ashley said. All of them great ideas. I say execution. Yumi said. Even if we did, we’d still have him to deal with. Soya said. I have an idea. Where is he now? Kyle said. He’s gone. You said. Gone?! What do you mean gone? Answer me!! Amy said. He left. I don’t know where. Like I said, he doesn’t tell me anything. You said. Then we need to bring him back. Kyle said. And how are you going to do that, master? He cares about nothing and no one. Ashley mocks. He might not care for you three, but for this guy…. He must care for you to a point. Kyle said. Don’t even think about it….! Kim said. W-we’re going to bring him back here!? Soya said. Of course. That way we get rid of all of them one stroke. Koyuki said.


Back to your pov.

You’re laying on the cold ground with sound of fire crackling. As you sleep, you hear a voice. Huh….? You said. You sit up and hear the voice calling your name. Who’s there….? You said. You got up and look around. You hear the voice again and it sounds like…..Chijinda. Chijinda…..? You said. You see him standing in the distance. Wha….!? You said. You take off your mask and rub your eyes. But he’s still standing there. C….Chijinda….. You said. He turns and walks away. W….wait! You said. You quickly run after him. (Ugh…. What’s all the racket? I need my beauty sleep.) He said. (Joke later. I just saw Chijinda.) You said. (Again with this?) He said. (I’m sure it’s him this time.) You said. You run after him and cut the corner, but he’s gone. Where….? You said. You see him standing further away. He looks at you and walks away. Chijinda! Wait! It’s dangerous here! You said, running after him. When you turn the corner, he’s gone. This is a dead end. Where did he go!? You said. You look around and look outside and see him standing in the street. You quickly jump out and chase after him. Chijinda! Stop! You said. Your voice reaches him and he stops. Finally….. This place is dangerous. We shouldn’t- You’re interrupted by a searing pain in your head. Argh! You said gripping it. It subsides after a few seconds, but Chijinda’s gone. Chijinda! You shout. (I keep telling you. You’re chasing the wind.) He said. (I know what I saw. It’s him. Looked like him, smell like him, even his smile. Right down to a T.) You said. (I see everything you do. I hear what you hear. And feel what you feel. I saw nothing while you were running. I’m telling you you’re chasing thin air.) He said. (But…. I saw him clear as day. If you can’t see him….. Then….. Am I hallucinating?) You said. Your thoughts are interrupted by a bellowing roar. That….doesn’t sound friendly. You said. The ground shakes as the roaring becomes louder. You wait and see it’s a preteen. When she sees you, she lets out a thundering roar.(So they’re this far out too.) You said. (This one’s different.) He said. (Meaning?) You said. (The others are sadistic. This one seems….feral.) He said. (Feral? Why would she go feral?) You said. (There are always those who take things too far. Here she comes.) He said. She reaches for you and you disappear. She looks surprised and you reappear on her shoulder. You punch her on the jaw and she hits the ground with a loud thud. You land on the ground and dust off as you get a message.

“You’ve just alerted the horde.” It said. (There goes my beauty sleep.) He said. “Go back into hiding and stay there until daybreak.” A new message said. (This person is bossy.) You thought. You hear multiple roars from all directions. You quickly run into a dilapidated building as the ground shakes violently. You peek out to see a few dozen of them. Holy…. That’s a lot of them. You said. (They sure know how to accessorize. Bone necklaces.) He said. (Puts everything kyle and his goons do in perspective.) You said. You cell phone goes off. “You’re close. We’ll meet in the morning.” It said. Finally. Going to get some answers. You said. You duck down as one of the savages pass by and stay there for the night.
11111111111111111111111111111112.title: Switch to Arif

111111111111111111111111111111121.content:
Daybreak…. About time. You said. You don’t see any of the savages out, so you head outside. You get a message on your phone. “Head down the next ally. Blue door. Top floor.” It said. You walk until you come to the ally and see the door. You open it and head up a flight of stairs until you reach the top floor. Finally. You’re here. A voice said over an intercom. I take it you’re the one who sending the messages. You said. Not how I prefer to handle things, but the only way to reach you. I bet you have plenty of questions. I will answer them. He said. A buzzer goes off and the door unlocks. You open the door to a well furnished room and see a milled aged man sitting at a desk.

So. I can finally put a face to you. You said. So can i. When I heard that someone was giving Ashley a hard time, I had to know who. He said. So you know Sue. Does that mean you’re m districts benefactor? You said. I am. All the supplies and weapons come out of my pockets. He said. So that’s how they were able to rebuild so fast. Wait. Wouldn’t it be better to be in m district and not here? You said. Nobody will come after me here. I have a lot enemies, and you’re the only one brave enough to come here. He said. No different than what I usually deal with. But what’s the reason you called me out here? You said. Ashley’s been ranting about some guy with tremendous strength being selfish. Being able to knock anyone out in one punch and moving like the wind. He said. She’s not wrong. Why should I help Mary Sue and her band? You said. She also said you worked with Kyle. He said. Kyle offered me something. You said. Scratch my back, I’ll scratch yours. You remind me of someone just like that. He said. Save story time for later. Did Sue put you up to this? You said. No. This was all me. I’m brought you here to help you. He said. Help me? With what? You said. That darkness in you. He said. Don’t tell me you’re going to preach to me like Sue did. You said. Not that darkness. Your other half. He said. My other…. You mean…. How do you….!? You said. I know a lot about you. You’re not as mysterious as you think. He said. And what else do you know? You said. I know your dark half wants to take over your body. I know you don’t want to make friends because of fear of suffering another tragic loss. And that you’re looking for solace for that tragic loss. Am I right? He said. His knowledge of you freaks you out as much as it surprises you.

How do you know all that? You said. Someone’s been keeping an eye on you. But I will let him make himself known. But I know that even though you and your dark half act like you’re on the same page, you’re both plotting on how to do each other in. He said. Ah…! You both said. Your power alone can destroy the planet. And his many more. I’m not going to tell you what to do with that power, but it will rip you apart if you two don’t get on the same page. He said. …..You have no idea what he can do if he gets out. You said. Can’t be any worse than the world is now. He said. He’ll make Kyle look like a saint. You said. That’s a stretch. But you know that I’m right. He said. …..What do I do first? You said. Break the seal. He said.

Inner psyche.

You walk up the gate. Get out here. You said. You see glowing red eyes as he walks up to you. He’s a spitting image of you. Except his taste for death and destruction is bottomless. Heh. How long since your last visit? He said. Since you fucked up my face. You said. A few scars never hurt anyone. You’re really going to do what this man said? He said. If it gets you under control. You said. And what’s stopping me from just taking your body? He said. I expect nothing less. You won’t succeed like last time. You said. Joanna and Blake aren’t here. You sure about this? He said. I can handle you. You said. I’m not one of these preteens. He said. I know what you are. And I’m ready for you this time. You said. You overpower the force on the gate and it opens. He appears right in front of you. Then let’s begin. He said. He hits you in the gut and kicks you away. You hit the ground and roll back up standing. You disappear and reappear behind him and catch his arm. Gotcha! You said. You knee him and send him flying with a punch. You disappear and slam him down into the ground. He gets right back up. Hehehe! Nice move there. I think we should quit warming up. And get right to the real fight. He said. He powers up. Ugh…..! This is what I was afraid of…. You said, powering up as well. Both of your power gets high enough to see each others aura. That dark red haunts me…. You mutter. Don’t keep me waiting. Let me enjoy myself before I take what’s mine. He said.
111111111111111111111111111111121.title: The next day

1111111111111111111111111111111211.content:
You both clash into each other; Exchanging blows with each other. You block his punch and he blocks yours. I have to admit. You’ve improved since the last time. He said. I knew day like this would come. Just earlier than I thought. You said. No amount of training can prepare you for me, but it’s a nice gesture. He said. That’s what you think. I’ve learned since our last fight. You said. You push him off and roundhouse kick behind you and hit him. He slides on the ground and handstands back up. Hmph. Looks like you did learn one of my tricks. But there’s plenty more. He said.

Outside.
You can’t hear me, but you must know that this isn’t a last man standing. You must become one with yourself. He said.

Back inside.
You deflect a blast and he tanks it. Let me show you how it’s done. He said. He fires a blast at you. You dodge it and are kneed in the gut. Ack! You said. He pulls his arm back and punches you in the ground. Your whole insides feel like jello and all your ribs are broken. The pain is intense as your bode quickly heals itself. You get up, but the fight has taken it’s toll. You’re still not ready for me. Now I take my prize. He said. He charges at you, but you smile when he gets close. You dodge him. Ugh! He said. He braced for an attack, but instead, you grab him. W….what are you doing?! He said. You know….. It’s hard for me to….admit when I’m wrong. But I was. All this time I thought I needed to lock you away or beating you down. But…. That’s not it. We’d fight for eternity. The only way to beat you…. Is to accept you as a part of me! You said. Ugh! He said. You both glow in a bright light and are engulfed in it.

Outside.

You open your eyes. Well? He said. You take of your mask and he sees one eye normal and the other red. Very good. He said. Grrr…. This isn’t over. He said. Your eye goes back to normal. How do you feel? The man said. I feel….different. Like I’m finally whole. You said. This is only the first step. Now, you two have to work together and learn to share and trust each other. Easier said than done. He-Ah! You said as your eye turns red. I don’t share anything with anyone. He said. First time for everything. Now. We have work to do. First thing: Trust. You have to trust each other. You can’t go or do anything without an establish trust first. He said. So….what do I do? You said. Your dark half has to trust you in giving over control to him. While you have to trust your dark half to do the same. Give him what he wants? He’s not going to relinquish control once he gets it. You said. Let’s see what he does. He said. Reluctantly, you give your body over to him. Your eyes turn red. Finally….. After all this time. He said. Intriguing. The switch was smooth. The man said. And so will the cut I make across your neck. He said. Violent. I expect nothing less of a manifestation of anger. The man said. He had so much how could it not? Things will get done no-Rgh….! He said as you gain control of your body. You can’t do it like that. You have to trust each other. He said. He can’t be trusted. You heard what he said. He said. He’s full of steam. Wanton destruction doesn’t interest him. Now. Give him control. He said

As the days go by, you follow the man’s advice. Slowly trusting your dark half with control over your body. Your dark half was slower than you in this. Opposing every time he could. But their was a problem at home…..

Hmm. He should have come running by now. Kyle said. That liar….! I’ll grind him into the ground for this! Amy said. He’s still useful. If we kill him, we loss our trump card. Kyle said. Master! Yumi said, running into the mansion. What is it? Kyle said. The man gave us more information. He said his friend went past the o district border. She said. What!? Past the border?! Even he wouldn’t! Kyle said. Then our problem is taken care of. No one who goes pass the border is seen again. We can turn our attention to the traitors. Koyuki said. No! I was suppose to kill him! Amy said. W-we’re aren’t sure. I mean, he fought our army by himself. If he can do that…. Soya said. I’m not saying anything until I see a body. Luna said. How will we know if he’s dead? No one is crazy enough to go pass the border. No one’s been in the past years. Soya said. Then we forward the message. Kyle said. Forward? W-we’re going out there!? Yumi said. No. But he went out there for a reason. Something or someone called him out there. Get ready to broadcast. Kyle said.


Back to your pov.

Excellent. You two finally trust each other. The man said. Wouldn’t say fully, but we have an understanding. You said. Now. The next two will build off that bond. You both have your own powers, but together. You’re unmatched. Combine your power with his. He said. How? You said. That one you did when Beth disintegrated. You said. It took a lot out of me to do that. You said. Do that, but half of it yours and his. He said. You concentrate your power and bright, half white and half dark ball of energy forms. Very good. Now. Throw it. He said. You throw it at a building and it disintegrates into nothing. You trust each other to share a body and powers. We’ll come back at night to do the next step. He said. You both head back to his place.

I must admit. This is going smoother than I originally thought. He said. He’s doing it out of convenience. He thinks he’s hot shit. Anything to improve his ego. You said. You said he was all your bad qualities rolled into one. He said. Didn’t think ego was a part of it. You said. We all have that, you just never had a reason to show it. He said. As you take a seat, you see his tv flash on. What the hell? Kyle and his goons. And is that….Arif!? You said. Haven’t seen Kyle since he became master. He said. Alright, hero. You see who we’ve got. Koyuki said. You are making the biggest mistake of your lives. If he doesn’t kill you, I will! Arif said. Quiet! Koyuki said. She closes her hand around Arif and squeezes. If you aren’t dead out there and want him alive, come to x prison. She said. And just in case you’re making friends out there, come alone. Yumi said. The screen goes blank.

Where’s the best place to dig 5 unmarked graves? You said. You’ve got to know it’s a trap. He said. Traps work both ways. You said. You know what’s going to happen, and you and your dark half aren’t completely on the same page yet. But you’re going to go anyway. He said. Arif’s my friend. I’ll turn that place upside down to find him. You said. ……Very well. He said. You leave the building and head onto the highway back to o district.
1111111111111111111111111111111211.title: Cooperation

11111111111111111111111111111112111.content:
After a day’s walk, you get back to o district. You head through m district and get to the prison. You blast a hole in the wall and walk through it. When guards come to investigate, they immediately stopped in their tracks. You grab your knife and grip the handle. Most of them were scared. He’s just one man! A guard said. When she came at you, you stab her in the stomach. She looks down and back at you and you slice her neck and push her down. You stare down the others and they run.

As you walk past the cells, the men in them were either cheering or backing away to get away from you. There was one guard who decided to be brave, but you side stepped her and force her to the ground. Where…..are the elites? You said. She doesn’t say anything, so you stomp her back. Where?! You said. Screw….you! She said. You picked her up and slam her into the wall. Then threw her into the adjacent wall. Ok. Ok! They’re further in! She said. Be more specific! You said, holding your knife to her neck. The meeting hall! They’re in the meeting hall! She said. Kill! Kill! Kill! You heard. The men in the cells were chanting. The women watched them be killed in the arena. Now it was there turn. Kill! Kill! Kill! They chanted. (Give the crowd what they want…) He said. You plunge your knife into her as the men cheered. You pull it out and throw her on the ground. (Now I see the attraction the arena has.) You thought. You head to the meeting hall.

As you walked you came across a cell with three people you know too well. Well… Look who it is. Kira said. (A cell? I was hoping for a public execution.) He said. Heard you went past the border. Find what you need out there? Maybe a heart or some decency? Kim said. You’re lucky I don’t take your heart. You said. What do you want? Gloat? Ashley said. I don’t have time to deal with you, Sue. Or your merry band of misfits. I need to find Arif. You said. Arif… Why?! What’s happened to him?! What did you do?! Answer me! Kim said. You pull her head into the bars and she falls down. Sweet dreams, thot. You said. You walk away from the cell and continue on.

You find the room labeled meeting room and kick it open; catching the elites attention. Guess we can’t put the rumors to rest. Yumi said. You draw your knife. H-He’s going to kill us! I knew this was a mistake! Soya said. He won’t do a thing if he cares for this worthless man. Koyuki said. You see her holding Arif in her hand. One more step, and I crush him! She said. D-Don’t provoke him! Soya said. Don’t worry about me…. Put these bitches in the ground! Arif said. I said quiet! Koyuki said. She closes her fingers around him and squeeze him. You thinking I’m joking? I will kill him. She said. (Looks like I got no choice.) You thought. You raise your foot and stomp the ground, creating a massive earthquake. As the ground shakes, Koyuki drops Arif. You catch him and leave.

You shrink back down and make your way outside. Guessing……you do care. He said. Why wouldn’t i? We’re getting out of here. You said. You make it outside and see a van waiting. What is this doing here? Never mind. You said. You put Arif in the back, get in and drive. Where…..are we going? He said. To an acquittance. You said. You drive all the way back to the building . You get Arif out and help him. So this is what lies past the border? Makes o district look up to code. He said. You help him into the building and up the stairs. You kick open the door and set him down on the couch. I take it when well. The man said. Yeah. You have any medical supplies? You said. I’m fine…. Wait. I’ve seen you before. You’re Sinclair. Arif said. You know him? You said. Only that he has an endless fortune. He said. I wouldn’t say endless. I just know where to put my money. Sinclair said. So you’re M district’s benefactor. I wonder if Ashley knew? Arif said. Speaking of Ashley, I don’t think you saved her. He said. They left during the confusion. If I know them, they escaped with all the men they could carry. You said. Then we’re back to square one. Sinclair said. An important man like you must have a reason to being out here. He said he has a lot of enemies. You said. You wanted protection? Arif said. I have my own security. But I’ll let him tell you the reason. Sinclair said. What does he mean? Arif said. It’s a long story….. You said.
11111111111111111111111111111112111.title: Rescue

111111111111111111111111111111121111.content:
So let me get this straight. You’re not from this world, and you have an inner evil that can take over your body, and you have a lot more power than you’re letting on. He said. More or less. I don’t know how Sinclair knows about it. You said. It’s all true, Arif. He’s more powerful than you think. He just doesn’t want to show it because it will draw attention. Sinclair said. I can see why. If Kyle found out about a person who can shoot energy beams from his hands…. Arif said. Or Sue. Who knows what she’d do. You said. Ashley’s always had good intentions, but she does get carried away. She almost implemented a curfew for us. He said. We can discuss who’s the lesser evil later. Right now, we’re behind schedule. Sinclair said.

Two days go by and you’ve been learning more and more. You and your dark half aren’t on the same plane yet, but you both know that this benefits you both. As you were out practicing, you felt that someone was near. You turn around to see a 20 year old woman dressed boots, long, brown hair, a coat covering her breast, dark pants. Found you…. She said. You want a cookie? You don’t look like one of Kyle’s. Sue sent you? You said. Ashley wanted to come out to find you, but didn’t want to send a lot of people out here. She said. And she picked you. Great…. What does she want? You said. You and your associates out here are coming with me. She said. Heh. Someone thinks highly of themselves. You really think you have a shot? You said. I’ll take you by force if I have to. She said. Heard that before. I don’t have time for you. You said. You turn and walk away, but she’s appears in front of you. (What the?) You thought. You’re not getting away that easily. She said. I’m not wasting my time on you or Sue. You said. You disappear, but reappear in her hand. What the?! How did you do that!? You said. You aren’t escaping me. I will you force if I have to. She said. (There’s something up with this one….) He said. (Being able to catch me like that….. She’s not one of the standards.) …..Fine. But you wanted this. You said. You disappear and reappear on the ground.

You disappear and attack her, but she vanishes. What? You said. You’re suddenly grabbed and slammed into the ground. That smarts…. Now it’s my turn. You said. You disappear and reappear behind her and she blocks your kick. You turn and kick her again, but she blocks. You use your arm to stop your fall and she punches you in the side. Ack….! You said. She then kicks you in the side and you are sent a few feet away.

(Why are you playing with her? Kick her ass!) He said. (She knows all my tricks and moves. I even tried my speed attacks, but she saw right through them.) You said. (Then blast her to the moon!) He said. (I’m not using them.) You said. You get to your feet and are grabbed and placed in her open hand. You can’t win. Surrender. She said. You’re quick to call it. I’m not done yet! You said. She raises her hand over you and it starts glowing faintly. I don’t want to hurt you. But if you won’t yield….. She said. (This chick is full of herself. I need a plan of action….!) You thought. (Enough of this! Move over!) He said. Your body is forcibly taken over and your eyes glow red. You build up energy in your hands. What? She said. You fire the energy at her face and she moves her hand to block it. When she puts it down, you’re gone. What the? Where did he go? She said. She senses someone behind her and she blocks an explosive punch. The force behind it sends her back. You walk out of the smoke with raging energy in your hands. Wh….. How are you…. What are you? She said. You blast her and she moves out the way. You rush her and she blocks, but is hit from the side. (What? How did he hit me? I saw through his movement.) She thought. When she lands on the ground, you appear in front of her with your hand near her chest. ……Heh. You said. You blast her and she’s engulfed in a giant red energy wave.

When the smoke clears, you see her on one knee with her clothes tattered . Ugh….. She said. She looks at you. I….. You…. She said. I’ll send you straight to hell. He said. You build up energy in your hand. I…. need to get away….. Solaris! She said. There is a bright flash that blinds you. Ahh! Can’t…..see….! He said. While he’s blind, she makes her escape. When you’re sight returns, she’s gone. Rghhh! Bitch…. He said. You take your body back. (You just made us public enemy number one.) You said. (I’m not dying because you’re afraid of being found out.) He said. (You have no idea what power mad people like Kyle will do to get this power.) You said. (Won’t need to if you bury him.) He said.
111111111111111111111111111111121111.title: continue

1111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
You walk back to Sinclair’s building. By the tremors I felt, I’m guessing you got into a fight. Arif said. Nothing I couldn’t handle. You said. You look like you got thrashed a bit. He said. A few mistakes here and there. Won’t happen again. You said. Don’t tell me Ashley came here and almost kicked your ass. He said. Not Sue, but she’s a friend of hers. She was….different. You said. How so? He said. Every where I moved, she was there. It was like I was standing still. You said. Arif perks up. You didn’t….see any weapons on her, did you? He said. I notice a holster on her hip, but she didn’t use any guns. You said. Anything else you notice? He said. I felt….like I was standing in front of dread and sorrow. You said. Ugh……! I thought Ashley left them behind….. Arif mutters. Arif? You said. I….don’t know this one. But we should get ready just in case she comes back. He said. You think she’ll come back? You said. Yeah. And if you showed off, she’s not coming back alone. He said.

You and Arif stakeout the bridge. Ok. If she’s with Sue, no way is she bringing the army. You said. Let’s not rule that out just yet. Let’s have some options. He said. Ok. That highway isn’t stable. No way the army could get across. You said. The only way they could get her is with the navy. He said. How would they get here? This body of water is isolated. You said. Ships are like Tonka toys to them. Ashley or any girl could pick one up and break it like a twig. He said. So let’s say the navy does come. What are we looking at? You said. Ash isn’t going to risk lives on this. Navy comes, missiles away. He said. How powerful? You said. Nuclear. He said. If they have that, why are they having a hard time? You said. Leaves nothing but a few scratches. He said. And the radiation? You said. No effect. He said. Ok. So Sue and her band and the navy armed with nuclear missiles. A tall order…. But I think we can handle. You said.


You both wait an hour before you see something. Sue and her friend are crossing the water now. Barely past their ankles. You said. You see a ship? He said. They aren’t carrying anything. I only see those two. You said. Guess Ashley took it to heart. He said. They’re on ground. I’ll let them look first. You said. You look out at them when you notice something in the air. I….Is that a UAV? You said. Out here? He said. The UAV circles over you. Well, they know about us now. You said. Can’t hide with that up. Not even inside. They have thermals and infrared. He said. Still can make them work for it. You can’t say you don’t like messing with Sue. You said. Before she got onto me. He said. Then let’s enjoy ourselves. You said. You both come out of hiding and head into a building at random. You wait a few minutes before you see an arm coming in. You stab it and it retracts. As it does, the building starts to crumble. Ever run out of a falling building? You said. This wouldn’t be the first. He said. You both run and jump out of the building. You land on the ground and catch Arif. You set him down and notice the UAV circling back. Let’s go. You said.

You both duck into a narrow ally way and enter another building. Sue’s not going to be happy about that scar. You said. You hear stomping and after a few minutes, silence. Think they’re gone? You said. Not likely. Arif said as he pointed out an eye looking in. ….Fuck. Then an arm comes in. Shit! Looks like we’re jumping! You said. Jumping?! Where?! Arif said. The building across. You watch action movies? You said. Movies being the key word! He said. Come on! You said. You both run and jump to the nearby building and roll as you hit the ground. Guess I can cross building hopping off my bucket list. He said. Nothing beats the real thing. You said. Except for the giant air mattress….. He said. That UAV’s got to run out of gas soon. You said. You both hear stomping. We know you’re in there. We aren’t going to hurt you. A voice said. Heard that before. You said. Look….. We just……want to talk. Ashley said. Even I don’t believe that shit. Arif said. I think we exit stage left. You said. You both head down the broken staircase. Watch where you step. This thing looks like it will crumble. You said. You both tread lightly until Arif stops. You hear that? He said. You listen for what he hears. I don’t- You’re interrupted by a fist come through. Shit! You said. It retraces and the building starts to shake. You both run down and out of the building and into a hand. Before you both could react, it closes around you both. Fuck…. Arif said. The hand lifts up and opens.

About time you caught us. You said. We had no plan on hurting either of you. Yet you ran. She said. Trust the word of giant. Arif? You said. Not even on a good day. He said. Did it work? Who is…. Arif? You’re the mysterious person out here? Ashley said. I like being a mystery, but it’s not me who called him out here. He said. Then who else is out here? What are you plotting all the way out here!? Ashley said. I don’t have to tell you a damn thing, Sue. My business is my business. You said. We’ve come too far for you to ruin everything! She said. I’ve done as much to you as Kyle has done. Nothing. And that’s how it’s gonna stay. You said. You!! Let’s go Cecil. She said. Closing her hand, they both head back to m district.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: continue

11111111111111111111111111111112111111.content:
After the long travel, you’re placed on a table. Are you going to torture me? Really? You said. Please. I’m not some barbarian. Although you do deserve. She said. Then why are we here? And we’re Arif? You said. He’s fine. Kim’s looking after him. She said. (Heh. Bet Arif is smiling ear to ear.) So why am I with you? You said. We’re going to have a discussion. She said. Aw, not this again. No means no, Sue. You said. And why not? She said. Just because you, your goons, and every other fucking guy her has a problem with Kyle, doesn’t mean I do. You said. This effects you as well. You think he will just leave you alone? He’s not going to let another man have more power than him. She said. And that’s his hang up. I showed Kyle what happens when you cross me. You said. And you think that will stop him? Power went to his head. He made things worse than they were. And with you around, it’s only going to get worse. She said. I’m not m district’s saving grace. I got my own problems to worry about. You said. It will be all of our problem if the master isn’t stopped! She said. Then stop him. You said. It’s not as easy as you think. She said. Really? What’s stopping you? It isn’t his goons. They’re fucking kids. You’re almost an adult. Go there with your merry band and do him in. You said. We wouldn’t make it through f district. They’ll stop us on sight. She said. Then why don’t you use what you use against me. Those marks that were on your arm. You said. ……If only you knew what they meant. She said. Like I care. No means no. You said.

Look…. I’m trying to be nice about this. You worked with the master a few times. She said. And? You said. So what is he offering you to keep out? She said. Nothing. Kyle didn’t bride me to stay out this. He had a few jobs for me and paid for my service. You said. So it’s money that drives you….. Making a profit off other people’s plight? She said. This is a business. I don’t play favorite. Kyle had the money, so I worked with him. Simple as that. You said. So you’re a mercenary. No morals or anything as long as the check clears. She said. If you want to be technical. I’m looking after myself. I can’t trust anyone else but me in this world. You said. *Sigh* Better than nothing. Name your price. She said. Killing giants, saving people, assassination of a despot…… 90,000. You said. 90,000!? You want a private island as well!? She said. Maybe…. I’m going to be doing most if not all the work while you jokers sit back. You’re lucky I only use I knife, or I’d charge more for weapons upkeep. You said. …..75,000. She said. 80. You said. 70. She said. 65,000. That’s as low as I’m going. You said. Deal. She said. I expect full payment. You said. You’ll get your blood money. She said. I’ll leave you alone to simmer and plot. You said. You jump down and leave.

You head out and look for Arif when you see him and Kim. You can tell he’s nervous. After a few minutes, Kim hugs him. About time he told her…. You said.

A few hours later

So 65,000 to do their jobs for them? He said. I originally asked for 90,000. Sue skipped the first day of negotiation class. Negotiate from a position of power. You said. Surprised she knows how to. She likes to strong arm and intimidate. He said. Or appeal to a person’s morality. Guess that’s how she got Kira and Kim. Speaking of Kim….. You and her are a thing now? You said. Well….. We are. He said. Oh I can’t wait to see you in a suit. You said. W-we’re going to hold off on all the couple stuff until Kyle is taken care of. He said. Aww… She’ll be waiting with baited breath for her freedom fighter. You said. C-can we get on with this?! He said, blushing. Sure. It’s just the standard prison bust. I’ll create the distraction, you get everyone out. You said. I’ll have them out. The army will deal with the collars. He said. You grow and kick open the door. As you walk through, the alarm blares. A few enforcers head your way, but stop dead when they see you. Before they could react, you knock them all out. More come your way and you quickly deal with them and head to medical.

I’ll draw them farther away from the cells. By the time they know what’s going on, it’s too late. You said. You walk in further and keep the guards busy. Ok…. Last one down. Time to- Chijinda? You said. You look down the hall to see Chijinda standing there. (Not this again…..) He said. (But…. He’s right there.) You said. (No one is there. Do I need to remind you that I see what you see?) He said. You wonder why when Chijinda walks towards you. He stops when he gets close. (Just….like when we went to that school.) You said. You reach out and touch him. (He feels like he’s right there.) You thought. (You’re touching nothing!) He said. (But….!) You said. There is a mild pain in your head your head. When you shake it off, Chijinda’s gone. H….He was right here. You said. Then your phone rings. I got all of the prisoners out. Arif said. Then let’s go. You said. You head back out.

Jeez. This everyone? You said. Entire fucking prison. Some got out on there own. He said. Listen up. You want to go back to kissing ass, you’re more than welcome. But you want to be free, head to m district. You decide if you want this nightmare to end. You said. …..End the nightmare. One said. End the nightmare…. Another said. End the nightmare! Another said. They start chanting End the nightmare. A speech and a rally cry. Are you sure you’re in it for the money? Arif said. No reason I can get some fun. You said. You jokers want to be free? Then head to m district and find Ashley. Arif said. The horde lets out a loud cheer. I think this might be the start of something. He said.
11111111111111111111111111111112111111.title: Back in M district

111111111111111111111111111111121111111.content:
You head into the base and see Sue and her band talking. 65,000?! He wants that much!? Kim said. 90,000 was his original offer. She said. What’s he going to do with all that? Buy a private island?! Kim said. He’s a mercenary. No morals or anything. Ashley said. He should be doing this for free. We’re all in the same boat here. The master isn’t going to stop at us. Kira said. And where are we going to get that much from anyway? Kim said. I already have the cash. Our benefactor must have gotten word. But he’s not getting it until the master is out of power. She said. I just can’t believe it. At a time like this, he decides to be money hungry. Can you get anymore selfish? The master gave him ten thousand to capture us, and that was enough. Kira said. I hate to admit it, but he’s good at what he does. He took on the master’s army and his elites without even trying. Kim said. We could have done that. We have growth bracelets as well. Kira said. But the battle would have been drawn out more and we’d lose more than the master would. He practically kept us alive. Even if we did put a collar around his neck. Ashley said. Ugh! I just can’t believe it! If he’s not worse than the master, he’s a close second. We need to do something about him. Kira said. Hold on. I don’t like him either, and I hate the fact Arif spends so much time with him. But I don’t think we should make an enemy of him. Kim said. We got to do something! He took money to capture us and help us. What’s stopping him from taking money to derail everything we work for? Kira said. If the elites couldn’t touch him, what chance do we have? Kim said. I didn’t say kill him. What if we locked him up forever like we’re going to do with the master? Kira said. He’ll just break out. Ashley said. Not if we put one of those mind control collars on him. Kira said. We do that, we’re no better than the master. Might as well sign up with him. Ashley said.

You grow while Kira thinks. Ok. How about we handle a money hungry mercenary? She said. Uh…. Kira. Kim said. What? Kira said. She looks behind her and you knock her to the ground. You stomp on her neck. Care to repeat those words? You said. Ugh…..! Gladly.....! You money hungry bastard! She said. Then I guess I should live up to it then. Starting with you. You said. You do anything, you don’t get a dime! Ashley said. You think for a second and let her go. The prisoners are free, Sue. What next? You said. All of them? She said. Every last one. You said. That moves our time table up by months. We can focus on the master without worry. Kim said. Yeah….. I want you to bring in the elites. That way the master has no one to fall back on. Ashley said. Not like you’re going to be marching on his place anyway. Just going to have me get him. You said. Just go. Kim said. You turn and leave.

You get to the mansion and climb up to the rooftop. Everyone. Every last man in there is gone. Yumi said. How is that possible? Even for him that….. Luna said. It was a two person job. He kept all the guards busy while another unlocked all the cells. Koyuki said. Argh! When I find the two of them, they’ll wish they were dead! Amy said. Getting angry won’t solve this. Koyuki said. Going straight to m district and capturing every man there will. Luna said. What if he wants that? He wants us to go there so he can torture us in the most vicious ways! Soya said. He’s not a psycho. And he wouldn’t think that far ahead. But action needs to be taken. Koyuki said. What do we do? Yumi said. Execute him and any traitorous women working with the males! Set an example for all to see! Amy said. Think rational, Amy. If we- You crash through the window and land on top of Koyuki. You!! Amy said. You leg sweep and slam Amy into the ground. You grab Yumi and Luna and slam them as well. Ah….! Soya said. You stare right at her. You can tell she wants to run, but her legs won’t listen her. ……Boo. You said. Soya’s eyes roll as she faints. You go around and bind them. Little help here? You said. Your dark half comes out and helps you carry them back to m district.

Here you go, Sue. You said. You toss the elites down. Jeez…. Are they alive? Kim said. Why would you care? Feel sorry for them? You said. Ow….. My head….! Koyuki said. Agh….. What happened? Where are we? Yumi said. One by one, the elites come to. You coward!! Can’t fight me on equal terms? Have to get the drop on us!? Amy said. You’re lucky that’s all I did. These jokers are your problem, Sue. You said. We’ll keep them locked up. And they will answer for their crimes. Ashley said. You people are the only ones committing crimes! Yumi said. You all will pay for this! Luna said. Right…. You said. As you look at them, you notice they look like the heavenly queens and Miku. In fact, they look like the spitting image and right in front of you. The mild headache come back. You shake your head before leaving. How much are they giving you? We’ll double it. Koyuki said. You stop. Can you? From what I see, you’re in no position to talk. You said. Name your price. You could retire in the lap of luxury. She said. Luxury? That’s expensive. You said. Just give me a number. She said. Don’t you dare! We already bought and paid in advance! Kira said. I follow the money. So if she’s offering, I have to take notice. If you get out of this, come find me. You said. You walk out.

Going to take there offer? Your dark half said. If they get out and can actually double what I’m offered, then yeah. You said. Heh. And they think Kyle’s the enemy. He said, going back inside you. You shrink back down and head to Mira’s place.

You walk in and take a seat on the couch. You sit back and relax. Finally some down time. You said. …… Your fault. A voice said. What? You said. It’s all you fault…… A voice said. What the hell? You said, getting up. You couldn’t save him….. It said. W-who’s there?! You said. He died because of you….. It said. I didn’t…. He was…. You said. You were too slow. And he’s dead….! A voice said. A blood image of chijinda appears in front of you. I…. I was… You said. WEAK!! The voice shout. You head hurts and you stumble in pain. No…. Chijinda…..! I’m….. You said. As you hold your head, you’re shaken violently. Hey! Hey!! Snap out of it! Mira’s voice said. The visage of chijinda is replaced by Mira shaking you.

M-Mira? You said. Finally….. She said. What…..happened? You said. I heard you talking, so I came to see, but no one was there. Then you started clutching your head and you started saying things. (What’s…..happening to me?) You thought. Mira takes her hands off you as you stand up. Is everything ok? She said. Yeah….. I just need some rest. I’ll be fine. You said.
111111111111111111111111111111121111111.title: continue

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
You couldn’t get much sleep and woke up a few hours later. You sit up on the couch and put your head in your hands. Then you get a text to your phone. You look and read the message. “Head to M district. There’s something you need to see.” It reads. (Another shady person.) He said. You get up, put your mask on and walk to m district.

When you get there, you get another message. “Get a disguise and head into the base.” It said. You look around and find a lone soldier. You knock him out and take his uniform. What could be in there that I need to do this? You said. You walk past the guards and through the training area and head inside. You walk around and find a group of soldiers, a general and a few scientist. What are they watching? You said. You walk into the group and see a soldier in what looks like an power suit fighting 5 other soldiers. (What the? Where did they get those from?) You thought. (And look. He’s not even breaking a sweat.) He said. After 2 minutes of watching, the test is stopped. As you can see, the exo suit increase the overall performance of the soldier. The head scientist said. How does it perform against those monsters? The general said. The suit makes the individual faster and survive most fatal encounters with an injection of healing serum. He said. So if they get stomped or anything….. The general said. The soldier should be able to get away and if they don’t, all they have to do is activate the stim injection and it will be like they were never hurt. He said. And as for offense? The general said. Strength of the individual is increased significantly, but it would take multiple soldiers to down one monster. Another scientist said. So our odds of survival go up or down? The general said. Up. Plus, with Ashley and her friends help. We have nothing to worry about. The scientist said. I’m convinced. A soldier said. …..Alright. How long would it take to mass produce? The general said. It would a while to fit each soldier. The scientist said. Then let’s get to it. And one last thing…… How are these suits against……him? The general said. Combat is improved, but I wouldn’t hold my breath. The scientist said. Then we’ll worry about him later. He said. The group disperses and so do you.

If they work as well as he said, Sue can finally stop harping me. You said. (But what about our payday?) He said. (We’ll get that. Sue’s not dumb enough to shit me.) You said. (You think these suits are a problem for us?) He said. (No. I see no reason to do anything.) You said. Then you get a message. “100,000 to deal with this.” It said. (Now we have a reason.) You said. (How do we know this person will pay?) He said. “Money has been transferred. Check account.” A new message reads. You check and see the money is there. (Guess we have a job to do. Who do we kill first?) He said. (We can’t kill anyone. We need to be discreet.) You said. (Why?) He said. (If we go and rampage and destroy everything and everyone here, Sue will know it was us and we won’t get paid. Best way to get away with this is to make it look like a renegade soldier sabotage all their work.) You said. (But I hate doing things from the shadows.) He said. (Private island where you can hunt anyone you want.) You said. (You know, I’ve always like liked the stealth approach.) He said. You walk and look for the R&D section where you find a bunch of exo suits being built. It’s a production line. Workers and machine pumping out these suits. You said. (Imagine them building one for sue and her friends.) He said. (Oh god. We’d never hear the end of it.) You said. You head inside.

Ok. If I can cause a chain reaction, production will be stopped. You said. (But it’s automated.) he said. (Then we fry the main circuits.) You said. You walk around and head into the overlooking room. Here. This must be the master controls. You said. You break the controls and the automated machines all start to explode. Best get out of here before they find me. You said. You head out of the room and blend in with all the confusion. You make your way back out and get out of sight to change back to your clothes. I do excellent work. You said. You said. You leave m district before you’re caught.

A few hours later.

You’re in o district looking for Arif. He’s usually here. Where is he? You said. As you look, your phone goes off. What do you want, Sue? You answered. We need to talk. In person. Now! She said, hanging up. (Think she knows….) He said. You make your way to m district and find Sue with her friends. What do you want? You said. You bastard! You bastard! Kira said. What’d I do this time? You said. I know it was you! Only you would do something like this! She said. I don’t even know what happened. You said. There was a project being done at one of the bases and it was sabotaged. Kim said. And only you could do something like that! Kira said. Oh please. Don’t come after me with accusation unless you have proof. You said. Who else could break in there?! Kira said. Wasn’t me. I was in o district. Plus, why would I do that anyway? You’re paying me to help, so why would I ruin my payday? You said. Well if it wasn’t you, then you’d have no problem finding out who did. Ashley said. No, I don’t. But do you have any leads as to who? You said. Reports said a soldier with heavily scared face was snooping around were he shouldn’t be. Ashley said. Then I’ll go find him. You said. You turn and leave.

(We need a patsy.) He said. (Don’t worry. We’ll find one.) You said. You head back to the base and the welcoming isn’t that warm, but they stay out your way. Jarheads know their place. You said. You head inside the base and look around to make sure no one was looking or watching. When one soldier past by, you take his legs out from under him and punch him to the ground. That should do it. Now…. I just need to mark up his face. You said. You pull out your knife and get to work. A slice here. A cut there. You said. After a few minutes, the man’s face is cut up. Now to accelerate the healing. You said. You use your power and quickly heal up his face. There. You said, pulling him up. Now to get him to Sue. You said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: A few hours later

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
You toss the man on the ground. Here’s your man, Sue. You said. Sue picks him up. Guess you were telling the truth. We’ll deal with him later. She said. You’re not going to execute him, are you? You said. Good god, no! We’re not like the elites! Kim said. If you say so. You said. You turn and leave.

Two days later.

Wait. Let me get this straight. Ash is giving you 65,000 to take down Kyle. Arif said. Yeah. You said. And some mysterious guy pays you 100,000 to sabotage some project they were working on. He said. Yep. You said. And you got someone else to take the blame. He said. Yeah. You said. Ashley won’t be happy when she finds out. She might not even pay you. He said. Sue knows better than anyone not to stiff me. I’ll destroy everything she has. Look at Kyle. No army, elites or anything. Hold up in his mansion. Counting the days until I get there. You said. And when it’s over, what are you going to do? He said. Do what I’m doing now. Work for the highest bidder. I know someone is going to hire me to undo what Sue’s draconian laws. You said. Heh. So work for Ash. Then Kyle. He said. If he has the money. I’ll get him and his goons back in power. I don’t play favorite. I go where the cash is. You said. You know you’re going to make a lot of enemies with that mindset. He said. Let them come. I’ll put them right next to Sue and Kira. Won’t touch Kim since you two are a thing now. By the way…. You said. You hand him a few thousand dollars. Buy a penguin suit and a nice place. You said. A back alley wedding wasn’t going to cut it. I was thinking something romantic. Like a beachfront- Holy shit. What’s happen to me? He said. Love. Arif. It’s called love. You said. Hatred, rage, anger, sorrow, and all the other emotions I’ve felt. But love….. That’s one I didn’t expect. He said.

We’ll explore those feeling later. What I want to know is who’s on top of this while thing? You said. What do you mean? He said. I’m talking about Sue and her merry band. As experienced as they are, they’re not shot callers. Even though Sue is good at barking orders. You said. Wouldn’t it be the general? He said. I’ve seen him, but he only has limited power. He signs off on things, but he’s not moving the army. I noticed it last time. When Kyle was vulnerable, the army or Sue didn’t attack. Like right now. Kyle has no protection, yet Sue, her friends, or the army aren’t moving on him. You said. You think there’s someone else at work? He said. Yeah. And I think Sue knows who it is. But she won’t tell me. So there’s only one thing to do. I got to see if she’s hiding something at her house. You said. Whoa there. Raiding Ash’s house? That sounds like a death sentence. He said. You sound like you’ve done it before. What did she do? Torture? Make you do her toenails? Stress toy? You said. Ash isn’t demented like the girls in f district, but she gets her point across. He said. So temporary slave. Did she at least feed you? You said. I was kept healthy. But she’s a taskmaster. He said. Sue wouldn’t do that to me. She knows I’ll cave in her face. Where does she live? You said. In m district. Not far from the army’s main HQ. You really can’t miss it. He said. You run off to m district.

When you get there, you see the army HQ, and not far off, a huge building. Arif was right. You can’t miss it. It’s like a national monument compared to the other buildings here. You said. You make your way to Ashley’s house and grow. You head inside. Huh. Not like how I imagined it. I expected weapons and plans to litter the walls. Just lights and windows like any other house. You said. You walk around and shuffle through various items. Where do you keep your secrets? You said. (Think like a girl.) He said. (Either in my dresser. Or under my bed.) You said. You walk up some stairs and into the door on the right. A bed, tv, carpet floors….. Again. Not what I was expecting. You said. You start with her dresser. Why does this remind me of my high school years? You said. You open the dresser and see a bunch of bras and panties. C cup bras? In your dreams, Sue. You said. You rifle through the clothing, but see nothing. Damn. Not here. You said. You check the others, but find nothing. Nothing here. You said. You check under the bed and feel something. Hello. You said. You pull out a journal. Bingo. You said. (This better not have wild dreams.) You thought.

“I don’t know what shocks me more. The fact a man won in the arena. Or that he has gone mad with power from winning. As life wasn’t already hard enough for men. Now he’s implementing horrible laws, building a prison….. He’s not going to stop anytime soon. Something has to be done about him.” That’s the first entry. Let’s go further in. You said. You skip a few pages.

“I knew I wasn’t the only one who believe men should be free. Two girls have decided to join me and the army in our fight. Hopefully our message will spread to others.” No not this one. You said. You flip some more.

“We’ve been back the master’s army. I’m not…..proud of what I had to do to achieve victory. I had to….. You know what I am. But I’ll forget as I celebrate tonight.” That’s a good question. What are you, Sue? You said. You flip some more.

“Like the master wasn’t bad enough. Now we got this rouge person running around. He won in the arena, but not by using a weapon. He used his bare hands. I immediately wanted to find this person and asked him to join us. But he shot me down. He didn’t give a reason. Is he disgruntled? Has a vendetta? Whatever he is, we can’t let the master have him.” Getting closer. You said.

“Trying to appeal to his conscious and morality didn’t work. He say he has no inclination of siding with the master. And given his actions, I believe. Turns out he only answers the call of money. All that power he has….. Wasted. At least when this is all over, I don’t have to see high or low of him again.” That’s the last entry. Nothing after that. Wait. You said. You notice that some pages have been torn out. Missing pieces. You said. You do a quick search and find them in a waste bin. You unfold them and read.

“I couldn’t do it anymore. I had to get away. What I’ve done will live with me forever. Why did I have to be born like this? I didn’t ask to be like this! I don’t think I can atone for what I’ve done. But I’m going to bring some good into this world.” Not this one. You said, going to the next paper.
“I was approached by one of my sisters. She still acts the same way now as she did when we were younger. Growing up as a Galloway gives you a sense of superiority. I can still feel that sense as she pulls the strings. She asked me to return. I couldn’t go back to that. Back to being- You hear the sound of a door closing. Shit! You said. You toss the notes back in the bin and the journal back under the bed. You try to open the window, but can’t. What the hell?! Why can’t I open it? You said. You hear the footsteps getting closer. Damnit! You said. You quickly shrink back down and hide just as Ashley walks in.

Ashley sighs as she takes off her boots and flops onto her bed. The door’s my only choice. You said. You sneak out from the bed and bolt to the dresser. The door was in sight when you hear her feet hit the ground. You disappear and reappear behind her dresser as she walks over to the bin. She stares at the papers inside. She’s so focused on those papers. They must mean something. You said. As you step out, you smell something burning. You look to see a fire in the bin. What the?! But she didn’t throw a match. You said. Ashley stared as the fire burn the papers. Like they were burning away a past she wants to forget. When the fire burnt away, Ashley went back to the bed. Seeing your chance, you run out the room and house and head back to o district.

Arif. You said. Find anything? He said. Nothing of interest. But I came across a name. Galloway. You said. G….Galloway? Arif said as his face pales. Yeah. Also made a reference to pulling strings. Plus, some other things. It seems that Sue knows or is related to these people. Think I need to pay them a visit. You said. You notice Arif looks like he saw a ghost. You ok over there? You said. No…. No I’m not. He said. You know who the Galloways are? You said. Stay away from them! Of all the enemies, you don’t want them as your enemy! He said. Can’t be no worse than Kyle. Or Sue. You said. Trust me. These are not the kind of people you want to cross. Compared to Kyle, he’s a saint. Arif said. That’s….quite the comparison. But if you say so. You said.

(You’re going to go looking for them.) He said. (You bet I am.) You said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: continue

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
So find anything? Your dark half said. Nothing. No clues or anything. Arif won’t talk. And Sue will never tell. And it’s not like I can go to Kyle and ask. You said. Why not? Just threaten them all. One of them is bound to talk. He said. You get farther with honey than vinegar. You said. Speaking of Arif, there he is now. He said. You look to see Arif walking down the street and looking around. What’s he doing out here? He said he was with Kim. You said. You see him mutter a few words and out of nowhere, a giant mansion appears. What the?! Where did that come from?! You said. Arif’s been holding out on us. He’ living large and in charge. He said. I doubt Arif would keep a mansion hidden from us. You said as he goes inside. You both run to and inside the mansion.

Whoa. Look at this décor. Statues, paintings, chandeliers, a fountain. You said. And the smell of snob. He said. Sue mentioned the Galloway. If she’s comes from all this…. You said. Hit her up for a loan. He said as he goes inside you. Where did Arif go? You said. You head up the stairs and look around until you find him talking to a lady in black dress with rimstones. Her jet black hair was down to her waist and her eyes were piercing. She must own this place. You said.

I grow tired of waiting, Arif. Have you found him? She said. No, miss. I haven’t. He said. You do know the ramifications for not finding him. She said. Yes, miss. He said. One was bad enough…. We don’t need to. She said. Arif’s looking for someone….? You said. (Or hunting.) He said. Why have you not found him? Are you too caught up with that friend of yours to do your job? She said. She knows about me? You said. (You haven’t kept what people would call a low profile.) He said. No. He just…..livens up the day. He knows nothing of what I do. He said. Your day doesn’t need to be liven. You need to follow what your told to do! She said. Boy, she’s mean. You said. *Sigh* Maybe it’s my fault. I’ve slacked off in my obedience training. Counting you, this is the fifth time a slave’s failed me. She said. Slave? Arif told me he had no master. Maybe he meant Kyle wasn’t his master. You said. How should I go about this? Maybe I should have your friend brought here. She said. N….No. He doesn’t need to be exposed to this. Arif said. My. I am becoming slack in my disciplining. You’ve never raised your voice to me like that. She said. I’d never….. He said. You have been heavily influenced by your friend. I can’t have one of my slaves thinking he’s free. The others will fall suit as well. She said. With a snap of her fingers Arif is gone. What the hell did she do!? You said. But first…. I have a pesky intruder to deal with. She said. You’re suddenly brought in front of her.

I knew I had someone in my home….. But I didn’t think it was you. She said. You’re going to have a lot more trouble on your hands! Where’s Arif!? You said. You care a lot for him. Do you see him as a friend? She said. I don’t have to answer to you! Where is he!? You said. You do see him as I friend. That’s so cute. Let me get a better look at you. She said. You appear in her hand. Now let’s see who’s behind that mask. She said. That’ll be the day. Where is he!? You said. He’s somewhere. But I wonder about this friendship. How far does it go? Does he see you as a friend as well? He’s never raised his voice at me until now. She said. That’s getting off easy. Compared to what I’m about to do. You said. You move to attack her, but your legs don’t budge. What the?! You said. You think I’d just let the most dangerous person have their way in my place? You have no idea what I am or can do. But you’ll find out. She said. She snaps her fingers and you vanish.

Ugh! Where am I? You said. You look around to see that you’re in some basement. You try to move, but your wrist and legs are bound. These aren’t normal chains. What kind of energy is this? It feels…..ominous. ……Arif! You shout. Huh? A voice said. Arif! You said. You see him bound as well to the adjacent wall. W-what are you doing here!? He said. I saw you come here. You look distressed. And after how you acted a few days ago….. You said. *Sigh* If you knew what I knew, you’d be too. You shouldn’t have come here. He said. And leave you here with this bitch? Nah. You said. This isn’t some random woman! It’s a lot more darker than that. I told you to stay away for a reason! He said. Why? You said. ……I’ve seen too many people lost to women like Sandra. I couldn’t see that happen again. He said. Was that your way of calling me your friend? You said. ……You know I don’t do mush feelings. He said. Kim. You said. S-She’s a special case. He said. Well, if you want to see her again, we better get out of here. You said. Just as you said that, the sound of a door opens and you hear booming footsteps. Oh great….. Here comes the lady of the hour. You said. The clacking of heels are heard as she makes her way down.

I hope I didn’t keep you two waiting. She said. She looks at you and Arif. Now…. Who should I break first? My disobedient slave? Or the rambunctious bad mouth? She said. Me. I’m the one who failed you…. Arif said. That you did. And I don’t take failure lightly. She said. Touch him, and it’s your throat. You said. Ohhh….. Such violence. No one has ever spoken to me like that. I can’t wait to see your face when I break you. She said. No! Brake me all you want! But not him! He’s done nothing to deserve this! Arif said. That’s the second time you raised your voice to me today. I think you should go first. She said. She waves her hand and Arif starts shaking. No…. No! NO! It burns! STOP! It hurts!!! He screams. She laughs as he screams, which makes your blood boil. You power started to rise and you try to break your bonds. Hm? Trying to break free? I haven’t seen this before. Come on. You can do it. She mocks. Your anger just kept rising. And so did you power. As you struggled, cracks on the wall started to form. What? She said. You kept struggling and struggling until the walls gave in and so did your chains. WHAT!? She said.

Finally free, you build up energy in your hands. What the…..? Arif said. Y….you’re not….. She said. You disappear and reappear in front of her and blast a huge beam in her face that engulfs her. The beam cuts through the entire house. You drop down and quickly run to Arif. H-h-how did….. What…..? He said. Later! Let me get you out of this! You said. You blast the bonds off him and help him up just as the lady appear from nowhere. H…..How did you survive!? You said. I’m something special. Just like you. And I intend on finding out what you are. She said. I’ll give you all the knowledge you want! You said, powering up. Suddenly the building starts to rumble. This place is coming down. You have to go. Arif said. Like hell I’m leaving without you. You said. Sorry…. But that’s not up for negotiation. He said. What are you talking about!? You said. You made life for me interesting….. And I’ve learned a lot from you. Glad I could call you friend. Remember me. And tell Kim I love her. Teleportis! He said. Before you could question, you vanish. Giving up your life for him? She said. More like taking it back. This is a long time coming, Sandra. He said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: a few days later

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
You reappear in the desolate streets of o district. How did he…..? If he thinks he’s doing some heroic sacrifice, he’s wrong. You said.
