You quickly run back to the mansion just to see it crumble down. ARIF!! You shout. When the dust clears, you grow and run into the rubble and start digging. Damnit! Where are you!? You said. You search, but can’t find him. Not….. Not again….. You said. You take off your mask and tears roll down your face. First Chijinda….. Now…. You said. You hit the ground in anger and the ground splits. You sit there for who knows how long and cry. When you were done, you put your mask back on and hesitantly leave.

You didn’t want to go back to m district, so you headed to Sinclair’s. Just like the first trip, quiet. Except you’re traveling with a heavy heart. While traveling, you phone goes off multiple times. You know who it is, but you don’t have time for her. After a long trip, you get to Sinclair’s. Thought you forgot about me out here. He said. …..Not now. You said, taking a seat. Oh. I’ve seen that look before. He said. I’m wearing a mask. How can you see my facial expression? You said. I can’t. But I know the tone. Sadness. He said. …..He’s gone. You said. Who? He said. Arif. I went to save him and….. It all fell apart. You said. You left him? He said. No. I was going to fight this woman named Sandra and- Wait. Sandra!? He interrupts. Yeah. His owner. She tortured him right in front of me. I lost my cool and blasted the bitch, but that made the place unstable. We were set to go, but she came back. Unharmed. I was set to do her in quickly. But Arif said some weird word and I appeared in o district. I went back and started digging to get him….. But I couldn’t find him. You said. You take off your mask as more tears fall. He was a good man. Kim was very lucky. Few people knew how Arif really was. He said. Is this how it is for me, Sinclair? I’ve lost both of my friends. Is that how it’s going to be for me? Losing people I care about one after the other? You said. There’s always a silver lining. He said. What’s the silver lining to losing a friend!? You said, looking up. Sinclair backs up when he sees your eyes. Y….your eyes…. He said. What? They’re red from tears. You said. No. Not that. Here look. He said, handing you a mirror. You look to see three tick marks in your eyes.

W….. What are those? You said. I had my doubts….. But this confirms it. He said. Confirms what? You said. No time to explain. Take as much time as you need to grieve, and meet me outside. He said, leaving. You sit there crying for a while before finally getting up and heading outside.

So what is it? You said. Do you know what you have been blessed with? You said. Not until you tell me. You said. The optical eyes. You said. Optical eyes? What is that? You said. You see everything. He said. Everything? You said. Yes. Nothing will be out of your reach. You’re stronger, faster, quicker, and all that. He said. I don’t….feel any different. You said. The change isn’t immediate. You have to use them a few times. Which is why we’re out here. First, let’s see you activate them. Close your eyes. He said. You close them. Now open them. He said. You open them and the three ticks are gone. Ok. Now repeat the process. You do so. The ticks don’t come back until the sixth try. Hm. Have to work on that, but good job. He said. Are we really going to train now? You said. Look, I know how you feel. You want nothing but to be alone and grieve. But you’ve been given a gift. A dangerous gift, but a gift none the less. You need to learn how to use those eyes. He said. Are they that important? You said. Absolutely! He said. Fine….. What do I do first? You said. That building. Head to the top and back. He said. You focus and appear on the side of the building. Whoa! Wrong floor. You said. You disappear and reappear on the top. Ok. Now for the bottom. You said. You disappear and reappear on the ground. Hmm. We have a lot of work to do. He said.

For a few weeks, you stay with Sinclair as he teaches you how to use the eyes.

Alright. You both know what to do? He said. Yeah. You and your dark half said. Then get to it. He said. Your dark half rush to you and starts attacking you. You dodge his attacks one after the other. Not like it was hard. Your dark half prefers straight up fights. When you dodge his next punch, he smiles. (Uh-oh) You said. You see the attack coming from behind and block. You see another and block. (Since when does he strike from the shadows?) You thought. You continue to block his attacks until Sinclair says stop. Excellent. It seems you can see people’s attacks from any range or place. He said. Yeah…. You said. Now the eyes can let you see the future. But do you know the saying about doing that? He said. Every time you look, it changes because you looked. You said. Right. That applies to the eyes, but I’ll let you find the loophole in there. He said. As he talks, your phone goes off. Geez. What does Sue want? I’m busy. You said. Maybe she misses us. Your dark half said. The elites have escaped. Sinclair said. How….do you know? You said. I have people on the inside in the army. It’s how I know you destroyed the soldier enhancement project. He said. It’s not like the elites are that big of a problem. You said. It’s not just that. Someone new has shown up in Kyle’s favor. Promising him results and a end to this madness. He said. And I’m guessing Sue wants me to take care of it. You said. Well she is paying you. He said. I think that went out the window weeks ago. You said. I hear it in your voice. The fear and uncertainty. You can’t run from it. You’re going to have to face it sooner or later. He said. I don’t run from my problems….. It’s just…. I’ve been suffering from something. You said. Like what? He said. He sees things that aren’t there. It’s happend multiple times. Your dark half said. Dementia? But that only happens under traumatic problems. And you’re so young. What happen to you? He said. You see the image of Chijinda dead. I…..don’t want to talk about. I’m heading back. You said as your dark half goes inside. Just one more thing. If you really have dementia, come to terms with yourself. Or it will kill you. He said. You take his word and leave.

You get back to o district and head to Kyle’s mansion. You look down the glass window and see the elites talking. Finally good to be back. Yumi said. When I get my hands on those traitors….. And him. Especially him!! I’ll make them ever regret rebelling! Amy said. You heard how the men talked about him? They are all scared of him. Soya said. They should be scared of us! Not him! Amy said. Amy is right. They should fear us. Luna said. Not when he’s kicked your asses 10 ways to Sunday. A girl said as she walked up. She’s new. You said. (At least she’s not dressed in a bikini.) He said.

You said you know. Him. Koyuki said. I know of him. She said. That’s not enough! How do we kill him!? Amy said. You can’t. She said. WHAT!?! Amy said. Pull him apart, sit on, stomp on, all that gruesome stuff…… He’ll just walk off. She said. There’s no way he can survive all that. Yumi said. It’s been done to him. He’ll just regenerate. You can even use that fancy growth tech and you still won’t beat him. He’ll kick seven shades of shit right out of you. She said. S-So we have no chance!? We’re going to be his playthings! Soya said. Playthings? I’m not that sadistic. You said. (I am.) He said. I didn’t say that. There is a way. She said. How? What’s stopping me from ending his sorry life? The suit? Mask? Some tech from m distict? Amy said. None of that. I know how, but I have to find him first. Then you can do what you want. She said. Heh. She thinks she knows me. You said. You disappear and reappear on the ground and head to m district.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: In O district

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
(You know Sue isn’t going to be happy and want to what we’ve been up to.) He said. (Like I need to delegate myself to her.) You said. As you walk, someone calls out to you. You turn your head to see that girl who was talking to the elites. (Quicker than I thought.) You have business with me? Otherwise, get lost. You said. You could say that. She said. Why do I get the feeling you’re not here to converse? You said. What makes you say that? You’re popular. The man who drove back Kyle’s army, beats his elites, and survive the arena. You’re on everyone’s tongue. She said. Then I’m doing something wrong. You want an autograph or something? You said. Why that, when I can get the actual person. She said. Great. Another one of you. Go ahead and say your threat and we can get this over with. You said. Man, you’re no fun. Here I was thinking we could banter back and forth. She said. Waste of time. Either fight or run like the other. You said. Oh come on. We don’t have to fight. Why don’t you just surrender? It’d be much easier. She said. And boring. Are we going to do this? Or not? You said. Fine. I guess I can indulge a little. She said.

You grow and attack her. She block and you duck her attack and punch her in the side. She stumbles and laughs. If you’re going to hit me, put some effort into it. She said. It was to see if you’d flinch and run. But it seems you’re here for the long run. You said. You disappear and reappear behind her and feint a swing and go for a kick. She catches your leg and you bounce up and kick her in the face. She stumbles and hold her nose as you get up. Ow…. That’s…..better. She said as blood runs down her nose. You can leave with a bloody nose, or I can knock you out cold. You said. I’m not done just yet. She said. She vanishes and appears in front of you. You dodge her attack and sweep her feet, but she’s gone. Hmm. You said. You focus and block her attack from the side and she vanishes. You wait her out for a few moments and grab her arm. But she wanted this. She pulls you in close and slams you into the ground. Surprised? She said. No. But are you? You said. She wonders what you mean when she is hit in the cheek that sends her away a few feet. What? Be you were….. She said. That was an afterimage. You said. So you were already up? She said. Yeah. You still want to continue? You said. Rgh….! As much as it pains me to do so….. I’ll let you go for now. But you’re mine next time! She said, vanishing. (And don’t come back!) He said.

That was interesting. Hope I didn’t attach the hero brigade. You said as you shrink down. You head to m district. (Is it wise to spend the night right under Sue’s nose?) He said. (Who’s going to tell her? People are dead asleep at this time. If Sue thinks that I’m that big of a problem, her priorities are fucked.) You said. (That’s not the only thing about her that’s fucked. Her attitude needs adjusting. And I know just the thing.) He said. (You seriously think that would make her less bitchy?) You said. (One good fuck is all she needs.) He said. (And the poor soul who has that job?) You said. (Can’t be that hard to find someone. You’ve seen the company she keeps, so her standards can’t be that high.) He said.


When morning came, you got up and looked outside. Hm. Nobody’s out. Thought life here was suppose to be mundane, but safe. You said. You head to the door, but stop. (What is it?) he said. Sue’s army goons are waiting. You said. (How do you know?) He said. (You didn’t think the street was too empty? They are never that empty. They cleared it.) You said. (Then let’s run through them.) He said. (Have half a mind to do that. But I think Sue is waiting. She wouldn’t leave them hanging. She cares too damn much.) You said. (Then we exit through the window.) He said. You look outside. Nothing on the street. No trebling of a giant. You said. You focus and your eyes change. You disappear and reappear inside the adjacent building. You watch as the team bust down the door and see it’s empty. (We’re going to have to become scarce. Sue or one of her crones will come running.) He said. (Yeah…..) You said. Changing your eyes back, you quickly and quietly leave the building an m district.

One problem after another. Just can’t catch a break. You said. (Comes with the territory of being public figure number one.) He said. You open the door and are immediately rushed by Miley. Where have you been?! It’s been weeks and I started thinking the worse! She said. Got caught up in somethings. But I’m back now. You said. Yeah. You are…. Mira said. Oh…. You said. Miley. I need to talk to him alone. She said. Is everything alright? She said. Yeah. I just need to speak with him. Mira said. Miley runs off.

Jeez. No need to look at me like a pariah. You said. I don’t know how to treat you. You don’t want me to care for you. She said. I never said that. You said. Your exact words were, “I don’t need a worrywart like you.” She said. Ok. That was taken out of context. I meant that as in a clingy mother way. Besides, I deal with dangerous people out there. You said. Is that why you were gone for weeks? She said. It’s not like you were up every single night wondering? You said. Mira doesn’t say anything as she stares at you. Oh my God. You did. You said. Yeah. It’s something you do when you’re worried. She said. Well, I’m fine. No need to worry. You said. Yeah. No need. Shower’s that way if you need it. She said. Are you telling me I stink? You said. Your clothes tell. She said. Oh. You said. You head to the shower and take your clothes off. Fuck. When was the last time I had this? You said. You stay in there for a while and come out. Shit. I don’t have any spare clothes. And I don’t want to walk around like this with a kid around. You said. (She’ll have to learn someday.) He said. (But not from me. Wait. I have an idea.) You said. You fill up the sink with water and put your clothes on. You shrink back down and reappear on the sink. You take your clothes off and toss them into the water. After a few minutes, you jump in and get them all. You disappear and reappear on the counter and grow. You dry them off as best you can and put them back on. Damp are better than none. You said. You walk out.

Ok. Clean as a whistle. You said. Did you shower in your clothes? She said. No. I just improvised. You said. Is that what you call it? She said. Ok. You can quit with the cold stare and angry face. You said. I would smile, but you might think I’m some clingy person. She said. Ok, ok. Another wrong choice of words. You don’t have to harp about it and be a sarcastic jerk. You said. Wow. Can’t worry about you or be a jerk. She said. Alright. You made your point. I’ll stop. You said. Really? You’re going to act like a decent person? She said. Why do you make it sound like it’s impossible? I can be nice and all that. You said. Prove it. One day. No jokes, snide remarks, or anything. She said. Fine. I’ll be an asskisser for a day. You said. Really? She said, annoyed. Starting now. You said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: continue

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
Well, if you’re going to start acting like a nice person, you can’t do it on an empty stomach. Come on. She said. Wait. You can cook? You said. Yeah. Is that a problem? She said. No. But shouldn’t your mom do that? You said. She’s away. Besides. I know how to work an oven, and there are plenty of people who can vouch on how good I can cook. She said. Then it’s a good thing- I mean, lead the way. You said. (This is going to kill me. I can feel the kindness crawling all around me.) He said. You follow Mira to the kitchen and she starts looking around. Let’s see. Soup, bread, meat…. She said. I didn’t hear- Nevermind. Plus, that’s just disgusting on all levels. You said. What? You thought I was on a diet of eating men? She said. Worse when you say it. You said. That’s cannibalism! What made you even think that?! She said. I’ve seen shops selling guys off as food. You said. And you think that’s what I eat? She said. Not anymore. But you can’t fault me for thinking. You said. I’d starve before I even think of doing that. She said. Explains how you keep that slim figure. You said. Ha. Ha. Ha. She said. Here. Let me help. Combine the soup with meat. You said. You put your hand on the soup just as Mira did. You could see the light blush on Mira’s face. Uh… You want to do this? You said. Y-yeah. I got this. She said. Mira puts the meat and soup together and cooks.

Here. She said. You take off your mask and eat. You weren’t joking. You can cook. You said. Told you. She said. You quickly finish eating. Jeez. When was the last time you ate? She said. It’s been a while. You said. Mira gets both bowls and cleans them. While she was doing that, you phone went off. What the? “Kill Ashley.”? You said. (Who did she piss off?) He said. (More importantly, who is this from? Hang on.) You said. You send a response message and wait a few seconds. You get a response. (500,000 to do this. And not ask who this is again.) He said. (How far can I push this?) You said. You send a counter offer, and get a notification. (One million deposited. That quickly. I was just fucking around. This person is serious.) You said. (You think it’s Kyle?) He said. (No. Kyle would send his thugs after me then tell me. But the money’s been transferred. We got a job to do.) You said. You get up, put your mask on and leave for m district.


(Getting Sue’s attention won’t be that difficult. She’ll come running the second she hears about the army being attacked.) You said. (Well, good thing a convoy is moving out.) He said. (Sue probably told them to contact her the second they’re attacked.) You said. You hold out your hand and blast the convoy. You blast multiple vehicles and personal until the convoy is destroyed. Now we wait. You said. After a few minutes, you hear rapid thundering footsteps. Here we go. You said, growing to 100 ft.

Ashley came running as quickly as she could and when she got there, she saw the entire convoy was destroyed. Damn…. She said. Sue starts looking and calling out for any survivors. You slowly creep up behind her. She crouches down and lifts up the truck up to see bodies under it. Shit…. I should have escorted them. They’d still be alive. She said. You quickly grab her and stab her in the side and slit her throat. Ashley stumbles over, but doesn’t fall. She starts gurgling on the blood, but it turns into a growl as the stab wound and slit are healed. (What the?!) You thought. You see those marks appear on her body again. (This….is what I was trying to avoid.) You said. You duck her swing and stab her again, but the wound close as soon as you pull your knife out. (Her healing is like mine. Then I have to keep the pressure on.) You said. You grab her fist and kick her away. As she recoils, you punch her and send her flying. You disappear and reappear behind her and punch her into the ground. When the dust clears, she’s gone. What the? You said. You block a punch from behind and another from the side. You roundhouse kick her and she bounces back up and charges at you. You sidestep her and she blocks you punch. She blocks your other fist and headbutts you. You stumble back and duck her kick. You grab her and slam her onto the ground. She vanishes and dark purple energy ball appear around you. Oh shit…. You said. You disappear as they explode and reappear next to the creator.

Jesus…. What is she? She can do that, yet wants me to bust my ass doing her work. You said. More of the balls appear. Fuck…. You said. You go to move, but can’t. What the!? You said. You see a glowing circle under your feet preventing you from moving. What the hell is this!? You said. As you try to get free, the balls explode; blowing back buildings and parts of the ground.

When the dust clears, you’re still standing. Shit…. That hurt…. You said, seeing your right arm and left leg gone. Your healing kicks in and your cuts, bruises, and missing limbs grow back. Even though you’re fully heal, you’re tiring out. *Sigh* *Sigh* You said. You see the circle again and Ashley appears in front of you. You see her fist glowing. (If you have a plan, now’s the time.) He said. (….Fuck.) You said.

You grab her fist mid-flight. She pulls her arm back, but you don’t let go. You tighten your grip and force her to the ground. You take off your mask and punch her back. She rebounds and you appear in front of her and kick her back. You disappear and reappear behind her and kick her in the sky. She vanishes and you punch her as she moves behind you. She vanishes again and the circle appears again and 2x as many balls of energy. You look at the circle and it breaks. You disappear as the balls explode. When Ashley reappears, you punch her in the stomach and kick her away. When she gets up, you hold your hand to her face and blast her.

After a minute, you see her a few feet away with her arms blocking her face. When she drops it, she drops onto one knee. You pull out your knife and walk to her.

Rgh…. She said as her body was in serious pain. S….so how much…..was it? She said. You stop right in front of her. How much…..did he pay you? What…..is it all…..worth? She said. You grip your knife. ……You know, I thought there was a good person. Under all….that greed. A decent person……wanting to show himself….. She said. Your grip loosens on your knife. You remember how you and Chijinda were good people. To the point were you other detectives at the organization wanted to be like you both. But that was then, this is now. And this world is anything but nice. But I guess greed…..and selfishness are too strong. So what are you waiting for? Kill me. Claim your paycheck. She said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: True nature?

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
You grip your knife and pick her up by the throat. You pull back your arm and shove your knife through her heart. You pull your arm back and Ashley collapse to the ground. You stare at her body for a few seconds. Ash….. I’m….. You said. You look at your bloodied hand and knife and back at Ashley’s body. As a tear runs down your face, your eyes change back to normal. You wipe away the tear, sheathe your knife, and put your mask back on. As you stand there, you hear a crow cawing and see it flying overhead. You turn and leave.

You make your way back to Mira’s house. Where did you go? You just up and left. She said. She sees your hand bloodied and clothes tattered. What happened!? She said. ……I don’t want to talk about it. You said. Mira was going to say something, but closes her mouth. You walk past her and wash the blood off your hand and knife. When done, you sit there on the couch and brood. Mira saw you sitting there and wanted to talk, but you let you stew.

You sit there for hours. You only move to take your mask off. You don’t recognize Miley until she spoke. Big…. Big brother….. Is everything ok? She said. Yeah, Miley. I’m just…… You said balling up your fist, but unclenching it. B…brother….? She said. I’m….. sorry if I’m scaring or worrying you. I just….. want to be alone right now. You said. Miley gives you a quick hug and runs off. Who the hell am i? You said. You sit there until the moon hangs high. Mira comes in to see you still sitting there. It’s late. She said. …..I know. You said. She comes and sits by you. Do you want to talk about it? She said. …….No. You said. You’ll feel better. She said. …..How do I feel better after what I did? Why was this time different? You said. What happen? She said. She places her hand on yours. For a second, you close your hand around hers. I’m…..sorry, Mira. But I need to go. You said. You put your mask on and leave.

The next morning, the army found Ashley’s body. She was buried by her friends and the entire army came to pay respect. They gave her a soldier’s burial. Jets flew over and guns were fired. When the army and her friends were gone, you walk up to the grave. You place your hand on the gravestone. I’m sorry…..Ashley. You said. You put down an olive branch with white flowers on the grave and leave.

You walk back to Mira’s house. On the way there, you sense someone. You stop and turn around, but no one was there. When you turn back around, you see a note at your feet. You pick it up and read it. “I’ve heard of your exploits and power. Come to the skyscraper in o district. Alone. I will be waiting at the top.” (A challenger?) He said. (…..I’m not in the mood to fight. But I need to respond to this.) You said. You head to o district. You get there and head to the skyscraper. You grow and head inside.

It was barely lit. You find a set of stairs. You disappear and reappear at the top of the stairs. You open them to see a young girl no older than 18. She was staring out at the sun. …..You got here faster than I expected. She said, turning around. She walks over to you and stops a few feet. From what I heard, I was expecting a muscular built man. Not someone still in their teen’s. She said. You say nothing. Not much for words, are you? Actions are more your thing. And you’ve been very busy. Survive the arena, beat all 5 of the elites, turn back the master’s army all by yourself. Need I keep going? She said. (Yes. Stroke my ego.) He said. But I didn’t bring you here to tell you what you’ve accomplished. I wanted to see the man himself. And see if what they say about you is true. She said. (So a fight is what she wants.) You thought. Let’s not waste words or time. Come. Show me what they say about you being true. She said. You put your fists up. She comes at you and you sidestep her. You leg sweep her and she hits the ground with a thud. She gets right back up. First one’s free. She said. She punches you, but you block and go for a knee to her gut, but she steps back and steps it with a knee of her own. You grab her leg and she jumps and spins kicks you. You duck and flip her. She catches herself with her hands and flips out the way as you go for a kick to her gut. When she lands, you were behind her, and she ducks your attack. You pull out your knife and she kicks it out your hand. She goes for another, but you catch and toss her again. This time, you appear as she lands on her hands and sweep them. When she hits the ground, you catch your knife and pounce on her with it against her neck. I…..yield. She said.

(Had me worried there for a second.) He said. You sheathe your knife and get off her. I see…. So they rumors weren’t fabrication. You are good. She said. You turn to leave. She wouldn’t want you like this. Even though she hated your reasoning, she wouldn’t want to see you like this. She said. You stop for minute, clench your fist, and keep going until you’re back outside. (Well, that was interesting.) He said. (Yeah….) You said. (Are you still upset over Sue? It was a contract.) He said. (I know, but…. It felt different.) You said. (How? What was different about this one?) He said. (I….don’t know.) You said. (I understand the concept of grieving and all, but we had a job to do. Paid in advance to complete. You knew this would happen.) He said. (I just didn’t think it would get like this.) You said. You head back to Mira’s place.

As you walk, you come to a stop. ……What do you want? You said. What? You aren’t happy to see me? A voice said as the owner came into view. You again. You said. What? Didn’t you enjoy our last bout? She said. No. And i’m not in the mood today. Or ever. You said. Are you running scared? The same person who killed Ashley? She said. (How does she know that?) I’m not scared of you. I’m just not going to. You said. What if I gave you a reason? She said. Good luck with that. You said turning around. Shame. Looks like I have to go play with Mira. She said. You stop dead in your tracks. What did you say? You said. Hm? Oh. I was thinking of having some fun with that girl you’re always around. She seems nice and all. She said. Your bawl your fist up. But her little sister, she’s so energetic. She’ll be overjoyed at the games I have plan. She said. You’re dead! You said. That lit the fire. This should be fun. She said. Before you moved, your dark half comes out. What the?! Who’s this!? She said. She’s….mine!! He said. One condition. You rip her damn spine out! You said. Done. He said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: Kill her

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
You watch as your Dark half fights. He pulls no punches, but she gets right back up like nothing. She didn’t want to say it, but she was being completely overwhelmed. He didn’t hold anything back. When one of his attacks hit the ground, a hole was formed that was deep enough to go to china. And when he was hit, he returned the favor.

Get your ass up! He said. Ugh….. How is this possible? You’re not even….. Is this how you do it? Having someone else do your fighting for you? She said. No. My…..friend here only fights when it’s enjoyable or he’s pissed. And right now, he’s pissed. You said. And that’s not a good thing…. He said. I don’t care if he is or not. But I’m not going down to some clone! She said. Clone!? I see your spine and raise you her damn head! He said. Done. You said. Don’t….count me out just yet! She said. A dark circle appear under him and he can’t move. What the?! He said. If I can’t win the old fashion way, then I’ll win my own way. She said. When I get free! He said trying to budge. The only way out is to die…. She said. The circle starts to glow and a purple beam erupts from it. After it’s gone, your dark half is nowhere to be seen. Heh…. Hahahaha! Now it’s your turn! She said. As she got up, your dark half grabs her head from behind. What?! But how!? She said. You wouldn’t understand. He said. With ease, he rips the lady’s head off.

Bitch got exactly what she deserved. He said, shrinking down. Need to get you your own growth band. You said. Think I’ll keep this one. You want this? He said, pointing to the head. No. Leave it for the vultures. You said. He toss the head and goes back inside you. You take a look at the body before heading to Jessica’s place. When you get there, you enter through the window and look for her. Whoa…. She has a lab in her own home. You said. You see her at a counter with beakers and test tubes. You disappear and reappear on the counter. Jessica. You said. Oh! It’s you. I didn’t know you were coming. I would have worn something more casual. She said. It’s fine. I need something. You said. Anything for my little man. She said. I need- What did you say? You said. I called you my little man. She said. Why? You said. Because that’s why you are. Little and cute! She said, giggling. (The girls just swoon over you, don’t they?) He said. (A wink or a smile, yeah. But this?) You said. She cups you in her hand and bring you closer to her face. So. What does my little man need of me? It can be anything. And I mean anything. You said. She presses you against her massive chest and laughs before letting go. Is that it? She said. N…No. It was….. I need another growth band. You said. Is that it? That will only take an hour. I was hoping for a few hours. You and me. She said. A red tint appears on your cheeks. (What? You don’t know how to flirt?) He said. (…..It’s been a long time.) You said. Come on. Put saving the world on hold. And let me make all your worries go away. She said. Well…. I have a lot of things to do. You said. The master can wait. In fact, why don’t you be my master? She said. (I like this one.) He said. S….sorry. I don’t see myself like that. And I don’t want someone doing everything I say. You said. (Speak for yourself. All my servants will listen to me as if it’s gospel.) he said. Awww! You’re so modest. She said, rubbing your head. You’d bat anyone else’s finger away, but you’re too embarrassed. Hehe! Now let me get started on that device for you. But where am I going to keep you? She said. On the ground? You said. Mmm. No. Wait, I know! She said. She puts you down her cleavage and giggles as you scramble up. I bet your face is red as a tomato! Now stay there until I’m done. She said. (I really like this one! ) He said.

Just like she said, it only took her an hour to build a new growth band for you. There we go. She said. Wow. I thought you were just joking. You said. I wasn’t. She said. You put the band on and grow. Thanks, Jessica. You said. Anything for you. Although…. I have to say…. I like you smaller. She said. I get that a lot. She said. It’s not as fun, but it’s easier to do this. She said. She takes off your mask and kisses you. This was no regular kiss. She was invading your mouth with her tongue. After a few seconds, she breaks it. Hehe! Ever been kissed like that before? She said. N-never. You said, still reeling. First time for everything. She said. You were surprised at her boldness, but you go wide eyed when you see Chijinda standing a few feet away. Where you that surprised? She said. You look again and he’s gone. Y….yeah…. It’s getting dark. I better go. You said. Why not stay here? She said. You see him again. I….think that would be best. You said.

You find a couch and crash there, much to Jessica’s displease as she wanted you to sleep in her bed with her. As you lay there, you see Chijinda on the other couch. He’s….just sitting there. Maybe I should…. No. He’s not real. You said. ……I’m as real as you believe it. He said. Y….you can talk?! You said. Why wouldn’t I? I’m right here in front of you. And speaking English. She said. You’re just…..a figment of my mind. You said, gripping your head as he vanishes. I hope this doesn’t get any worse. You said. You close your eyes and go to sleep. As you slept, you felt something weighing down on you. What the….? You said. You open your eyes to see Jessica cuddling against you. Ahh. My little man…. She said. (I really like her.) He said. You try your best to sleep with her snuggling you.

Zzz….. You said. As you slept, Jessica kissed you. Hehe! Wakey wakey! She said. Ugh…. You said, opening your eyes. Good morning. I take it my snuggling didn’t bother you. She said. Not….really. I did feel you kissing me multiple times and rubbing my chest. You said. I couldn’t help it. You’re so cute. But when you’re small, you’re just adorable! She said. She gets off you and you get up and put your mask on. Aww. Do you have to leave so soon? I got somethings to do. You said. My door is always open to you. She said. Thanks. You said. You disappeared and reappeared outside and head to m district. When you get there, you feel the ground shake. Oh great. You said. The shaking gets more violent and guys leaving. It would take the army a while to get here. You said. After a few minutes, you see the cause of it. (Amy…. And her friends.) You said. You grow to 100ft. (See the fire in her eyes. Complete hatred for us.) He said. (So do the other three. Except Soya. She’s fucking terrified.) You girls lost or need something? You said. …..The master wats to see you. You will come along. Koyuki said. “I will come along.” Ha. Kyle wants me, he can come get me himself. Not send his attack dogs. You said. You really don’t know how this works. We’re in charge here! Amy said. Spat that line before. Don’t you have people to torture? Or cities to topple? Maybe learn to smile? You said. You!! Amy said. Seethe all you want. You and your goons aren’t threatening when knob knees over there is shaking like crazy. You said. Soya! Luna said. Sorry! He’s just- A man! Like every other one! Amy interrupts. Right…. You guys are causing a scene and the army is on there way. You said. You think we can’t handle that? Luna said. No. But I don’t want to be in the crossfire. You said. Rgh! This is useless. 5 of us, one of him. We can kill him! Yumi said. You disappear and reappear in front of her and punch her straight in the nose. Uhh….. She said as she hits the ground. …..Anyone else? You said. YUMI! Luna said. You look right at Soya and she’s terrified. (Girl’s about to piss herself.) He said.

…..I think I’ll take you up on that offer. Just to see what he wants. Just keep your friends in line, Koyuki. You said. You leave for the mansion. H..h….he just….knocked Yumi out cold. Soya said. Yumi!? Yumi!! Luna said. …..Something has to be done about him…. Koyuki mutters.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: Asking a favor

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
You kick open the front door. There’s this thing called knocking. Kyle said. Do I look like a Jehovah Witness? You said. No. I’d have you killed on the spot. He said. Yeah. You sent your thugs after me. What do you want? You said. Speaking of them, where are they? He said. They’re coming. Although Yumi is…..out cold. You said. Why am I not surprise? He said. She couldn’t keep her mouth shut. So what do you want from me. You said. I’ve heard that you’ve been contracted by army to ruin me. He said. I have, but that bridge has been burned. Or will be. You said. Really? I’ll make you a counter offer. I’ll double whatever they’re paying you. He said. (…..Let me negotiate.) He said. Really? This isn’t chump change like last time. You said. Name your price. He said. My offer for them was ninety thousand. You said. That high? He said. I’m that good. Remember. I survived your arena. You said. …..Yeah. 300,000. He said. That’s a commitment. Can you back that up? You said. 100,000 now. The rest later. He said. You take the money. Heh. So what do you done? You said. Bring me the heads of the army. He said. Figuratively? Or literally? You said. Bring them here. Alive. He said. Done. You said. You leave the mansion.

So I have bring in the leaders of the army? No problem. You jump down and head into their base. You grow to 100ft. Damnit! We’re way behind schedule. Kira said. It hasn’t been easy. Ever since Ashley…..died, we’ve been lost. Kim said. I know it was him. Who else could have done it? Kira said. There’s no proof of him doing it. Even if he’s the most capable. Kim said. Talking about me behind my back? You said. What the?! Where the hell have you been?! Kira said. Doing my own thing. I heard what happen to Sue. How are you going to handle this? You said. You’ve been gone for weeks, our friend was killed, which I know you had something to do with it. Kira said. Why would I want to kill Sue? We had our differences, but not worth killing over. If you want to honor her, then take the fight to Kyle’s mansion. I basically blazed a trail for you. What happen to making Kyle suffer, Kim? You said death would be too good for him. You said……I was racked with grief when I found out that Ashley died. Combined that with Arif’s sudden disappearance, I couldn’t do anything. Plus, Ashley’s death hit us a lot harder than we thought. When she died, morale sunk and some men went back into slavery. She said. (Wimps!) He said. So basically you lost your figure head. And I lost my paycheck. You said. Are you serious right now!? All that’s going on, all that is happening, and you’re worried about some money!?! Kira said. I told you from day fucking one that this was YOUR fight, not mine. I have no stake in this war with Kyle. Unless you have cash, we have nothing to talk about. You said. Well, it’s a good thing I did have the money. But you’ve been gone while we’ve been suffering. So I don’t think you deserve a damn cent. Kira said. So you’re backing out of the deal? You said. The deal was to help. You haven’t been doing that. So the contract is null and void. She said. Then it’s a good thing I took Kyle’s offer. You said. You punch Kira’s lights out and subdue Kim before she could move. Lights out. You said headbutting her. She slumps down unconscious. (Easiest payday ever.) He said

After tying them up, you carry them to O district. (What are we doing here?) He said. (There’s one more we need.) You said. (That bitch who was with Sue?) He said. (Right.) You said. Ugh….. What happened? Kira said. Look whose awake. You said. You evil, spineless coward! Untie us! She said. Nah. I like you just the way you are. You said. So you’re going to leave us here? Someone will find us! She said. Counting on it. Now, go back to sleep. You said, knocking her out. (Now it’s just a waiting game.) You thought.

You sit and wait for fifteen minutes until you see her coming. There she is. You said. (Still wearing nothing but a jacket to cover those orbs of hers. And those knee high boots. And I think a mini skirt. Damn. She’s confident in herself.) He said. (Guess when your kind tower over another, you get to wear whatever.) You said. (Shit. Imagine the stone age. It must have been 5x as worse.) He said. (Given what’s going on now, I think most would go back to the stone age.) You said. You see her get close to them and sneak behind her.

Kira? Kim? How did you get like this? She said. No response from either. Unconscious….. Hang on. She said. As she unties them, Kira stirs. S…Susan….. She said. Don’t worry. I’ll have you out. She said. No… It’s a…. She said. You hit her in the back of the head and she hits the ground. Trap. You said. You quickly tie her up with the others. All three. Time to cash in. You said. You carry all three to Kyle’s mansion.

You toss them onto the ground and shrink back down. Wow…. Part of me didn’t believe. He said. Never doubt me. Now the rest of my payment. You said. Ohhh….. My head…. Kira? Kim said. She takes a look at her surrounding and sees you and Kyle, but her eyes focus on Kyle. You dirty, rotten, megalomaniac! Rgh!! When I get my hands on you!!! Kim said. (Jesus….. And I thought she was the calm one.) You thought. (It’s always the quiet ones.) He said. Kyle hands you the rest of your money. They’re all yours. You said. As you turn to leave, you see Chijinda standing near the door way. …..Feel good about yourself? He said. You shake your head and he’s gone. You continue to leave.

(With Kim and the other two gone, it’s open season on m district.) He said. (Wouldn’t be surprise if Kyle has his army move out right now.) You said. You keep going until you see Chijinda standing against a building. Cash money in pocket. I wonder if that what kept you from saving me? He said. This is different. You said. Really? How so? He said. They got the short end of the stick. They have to deal with that? You said. Short end? I wonder if that’s what I got? He said. What happen to you was….. You said. Was what? He said. Was….. You said. Mmm. You’re never one not to have an answer. My death sure has change you. He said. I’m still the same person. Just not going to do something suicidal for nothing. You said. So after you found my body, why didn’t you just leave the school? He said. I….owed it to you. You said. And not them? He said. These clowns haven’t done anything for me. You said. The money they promised? It was quite a lot to be there for them. He said. I got a better deal. I follow the money. You said. And if Miku offered money, would you have joined her, and forget why we were there to begin with? He said. Ah….! You said. I thought not. He said as he disappears.

(Arguing with a figment of your imagination?) He said. (I think it’s slowly getting worse.) You said. (I can tell. First seeing, now talking.) He said. (Sinclair was right. This dementia will kill me. I took Chijinda’s death hard, but I didn’t think it was this bad.) You thought.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: At the mansion.

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
With the lost of Kim, Kira, and Susan, the army had no one left to call on. An attack seem imminent. They prepared as best they could and waited, but the attack never came. Kyle’s army didn’t show up, even though m district is completely vulnerable. You got a suspicious feeling, so you went to the prison to find out.

(Why are we here?) he said. (Something’s not right. M district open wide, and Kyle not attacking? Something’s going on.) You said. (I didn’t think you cared.) He said. (I don’t. But I’m not going after Sue’s friends again. They know I’ll come for them again, and they won’t be nice about it.) You said. (So question Sue’s friends?) He said. (They won’t tell us a damn thing. But I think I know what’s happening.) You said. You head to the medical wing and see notes with formulas and equations. It looks….like someone trying to break down something. You said. You look on the wall and see a picture of you and your blood type with equations all around. You also see a video of you fighting. (Looks like these clowns were researching us.) He said. You pull down all the pictures, equations, and other data and start a pile. You walk out, and blast an energy wave at it; starting a fire. You walk out with the alarm blaring. You head to Jessica’s mansion.

When you get there, you force open the door and call out for her. You are hugged from behind. Nice to see you again! She said. Not now. You said. Why? What happened? She said, letting go. I went to that prison, and I found pictures, equations, and whatever else there about me. You said. What? She said. Are you studying me? You said. No! I wouldn’t even. It’s someone else. After first meeting you, I wouldn’t do that without your permission. She said. So it’s someone else? You said. It has to be. I stop all my research on you after you confronted me. She said. ….Sorry about barging in here. You said. Well…. I know how you can make it up to me. She said, smiling. (Great…..) You thought. She grabs your hand and takes you to a examination room. Really? You said. I’d be lying if I said I wasn’t interested in learning about you. She said. Jessica….. You said. I promise to burn all of it when I’m done. Please! She said with her eyes like puppy dogs. (The infamous puppy dog eyes….. Damn.) Ok…. But right into the fire. You said. You sit down on the table. Ok. Blood sample first. She said. She takes the blood sample and puts it under a microscope. Ok… The cells are dividing at a rapid rate. Faster than normal. That explains the healing. Jesus…. All the cells have tripled. It’s like they’re trying to make a clone of you. She said. Jessica comes back over to you.

Ok. Let’s test your reflexes. She said. She hits your knee and you kick. Perfect timing. Ok. Let’s test those your sight. She takes off your mask and covers one of your eyes. Ok. Read as far as you can see. L, M, N, A, K, E, O, C. You read out. Good. I don’t have a projector, so I’ll mark 20/20. Now to test feeling. She said. That’s not a test. Hey! Whose the scientist here? She said. You. You said. Right, she said blindfolding you. And this is a test how? You said. You’ll see. ….Ok. You feel that? She said. I do, but what is it? You said. Heh heh! Take a guess. She said. Soft, firm, round….. Am I touching your ass? You said. No. She said. Is it your breast? You said. Maybe…. She said. (And I thought Chijinda was a perv.) You thought. Ok. Do you feel….this! She said. Jessica hops onto you and kiss you. (This woman…..) You thought. She removes the blindfold and rubs your face as her tongue moves around in your mouth. (I’m pretty sure I’ve seen where this leads to next.) He said. Now. For the test of stamina! She said. Ok! That’ enough. You said. But I’m not done yet. I need to see if you tire out. She said. (If that isn’t a lowkey innuendo….) He said. I have to be somewhere. Burn that data. You said, getting up and leaving. Damnit…. So close… She said.

(I say you should have done it.) He said. (Call me old fashion, but I don’t think sex should be frivolous. Should be two people in love with each other.) You said. (So you want your first time to be special.) He said. (……And if I do?) You said. (I think Mira’s heart might stop if you tell her that.) He said. (Shut up!) You said. As you walk, you hear something. Huh? You said. You look around and see no one. …..Hm. You said. Over here. In front. A voice said. You look to see a robed and hooded woman right in front of you. (Where the fuck….?) You thought. (Think she’s wearing anything under there?) He said. You have quite the reputation. I had to see you for myself. She said. I don’t do autographs. You said. Why autograph when I can get the real person? She said. Jesus…. Another one? You said. I can assure you, I’m way different. She said. Heard that before. Raincheck. You said. Is this the same guy who killed Ashley? She said. (How….?) You thought. Or the same man who saw his friend died and went on to get revenge. I’m sure he- You punch her in the face and send her flying back. Grrr…. You said. Hm. Not bad. She said, behind you. How did she? You mutter. It’s been a while since I’ve been hit like that. She said. You swing behind you and she’s gone. But you swing wildly. You have no discipline. She said. And what makes you qualified in that assessment? You said. From just looking at you, I can tell you’re hoping one hit is enough. You said. That’s because most people go down in one. You said. Well, I’m not like most. She said. She appears in front of you and you block her fist. You go for a punch, but she sidesteps and takes your legs out from under you. You catch yourself on one hand and spin kick her, but she grabs your leg and tosses you back up. Using the momentum, you bounce back to elbow her, but she catches it and throws you into a building. You disappear and reappear behind her.

Heh. What do you say we get serious for a second? She said, turning around. (This woman….. What is she? She’s able to keep up with me like it’s nothing. And to see where I’m going to strike next….) you thought. Come on. Let’s make this interesting. She said. You disappear and reappear behind her, and when she blocks, you punch hit her from the front. She sent back, but vanishes. You wait a second and block a kick from behind. Using your arm as a platform, she jumps and kicks you with her other foot. You grab her leg and toss her away. You disappear and reappear behind her and go to punch her. She vanishes and you wait. You block a punch from behind, but don’t see the real attack is from above as she comes down with her knee on your back. Heh. She said get up.

Ow….. You said. This is what has everyone afraid? She said. You try to push yourself up, but it felt like a plane crashed into you and a building fell onto you. Hmph. Now I see why your friend died. She said. ….! And he was such a good person too. What was his name again? She said. Your anger starts to take over as you get up. Oh? On your feet? She said. …..Don’t you dare….. SAY HIS NAME!!! You shouted. As your power increased, the ground started to shake. W…what the?! She said. You appear right in front of her and she barely has time to block your fist. You follow it up with a few more punchs; forcing her to jump back. He’s….different. He’s attacking with reckless abandon. She said. You appear behind her and she vanishes as your fist hits the ground; creating a giant crater. He’s not holding back any longer….. She said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: a few days later

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
You charge at her and she ducks your fist. You go for a kick and she barely blocks it. She attacks you and you disappear and reappear behind her with your arm pulled back. What?! She said. You hit her and she is sent flying back. You disappear and reappear behind her and kick her into the sky. You build up energy in your hand and disappear. You reappear above her and blast her into the ground. When the beam hits the ground, the explosion clears the surrounding area. When the it dies down, you land on the ground.

Your power starts to die down. (Destructive…. See what happens when you just cut loose and hold nothing back?) He said. (Quit trying to tempt me.) You said. You look around. Going to be hard to explain this. Sinclair can foot the bill. You said. When you take a step, your body freezes. What the!? You said. You see a dark circle under your feet. Then you see her appear right in front of you. You….! How did you survive? You said. Wouldn’t you like to know. I am not easily impressed, but you…. She said, with her hand running down your face. Have caught my attention. Let’s see who behind there. She said. She slowly removes your mask, and gasps. My…. A lot younger than I thought you were. You can’t be out of your teens. She said. So? You said. And your face? Did you make out with a cheese grater? She said. Crack your jokes while you can. When I get free….! You said. You’re not going anywhere until I say so. Now hold still. She said. Her hands start to glow as she reaches for your face. When her hands, touch you, you don’t feel anything happening. W….what are you doing? You said. Getting rid of those nasty scars. She said. You could feel the scars being removed. There. All done. She said. Why….did you…. She said. Let call it a whim. Now, let’s see who you get your power. She said. Her hand phases through you and she pulls out your dark half. So….this is how you get so powerful. All your bad qualities made human. She said. Grrrr! Get your hands off me! He said. So when your anger rises, he gives you your powers. She said. You….are far from the point! Rgh! Damnit!! Why can’t I break free?! He said. Heh heh…. She said. You try to break free, but can’t move. All your power comes from him. But he said that’s not true. So just in case…. She said. She says some sort of incantation and you feel something placed on your back and you feel weak.

W…what the hell did you do?! You said. Oh, you’ll find out soon enough. And I’m taking your friend here. She said. Grrr! Keep pissing me off! When you let go of me….! He said. Heh heh… Bye, handsome. She said, vanishing. The circle disappears and you’re free. What….is that woman? I can’t let her escape. If she’s working with Kyle, then she’s on her way to the mansion. You said. You try vanish, but can’t. What the?! Why didn’t I move? You said. You try again, but nothing happens. What in the!? You said. You try to fire a energy beam, but nothing comes from your hand. M….my powers…. What the fuck did she do to me!? You said. (It’s like she sealed them. Wait. If my speed and strength are gone….) You thought. You pull out your knife and stab your leg and the wound doesn’t heal up. (Shit…. Even my healing. I’m in a lot of trouble.) You said. With your powers gone, you know it’s going to be open season on you. Whatever that bitch did, I need to find her. And him. But first…. Get this cut looked at. You said. You quickly made your way to Mira’s house.

When you get inside, look for any peroxide, bandages, or stiches you could find. Ok…. You said. You spray the cut, stich it closed and roll a bandage over it. Now to find her. You said. You get up and open the door, but Miley hugs you from behind. Miley…. You said. Big brother’s back! She said. Heh. I don’t know if I should be happy or surprised about that. You said. It’s not like that…. I always know big brother will come back. She said. And don’t forget it. You said. You’re not going back out already? You just got back. She said, letting go. I have something to do. You said. Is it dangerous? She said. You’re not going to gatekeep me, are you? You said. …..Maybe. She said with a pout. Miley… You said. Someone needs to look out for you. She said. Don’t I always come back? You said. Hurt. She said. But not badly. I’ll be fine. You said. …..Ok. I’ll let you pass. She said. Thanks gatekeeper. You said, leaving.

I’ll be walking into the lion’s den. Best pay a visit to the army. You said. You head to m district and head into their armory. The soldiers didn’t even question or stop you when you took a few of their grenades. (Flashbangs. Pretty much useless for them. But I still got my growth device. Goes sideways, toss this and find the exit.) You said. You walk right out and head to the mansion.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: continue

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
You crack the door open and peek through. You silently creep in and close it. Better hurry. You said. You scour through the mansion; looking through each room, but coming up empty. Damn. All these rooms…. All empty. …..But this mansion is nice. Should be mine. What the!? What am I saying?! You said. You continue to search, but come up empty. Damn…. Where is she? You said. (She’s not here…. Where else would she be?) (First her, then Kyle, then the army. No one is going to stop me.) You thought. What the fuck? I didn’t….just think that? You said. Looking for something? A voice said. You turn around to see the cloaked woman.

You didn’t waste any time following. She said. Where is he? You said. What? No banter, jokes or insults? Someone’s being serious. She said. I don’t have time for that today. Where did you take him? You said. That prison the little jokester is so fond of. Him and his girls are there swooning over the gift I gave them. She said. You-You gave him over to Kyle!? You said. I don’t see why not. She said. Do you have any idea what they’re going to do? You said. Cut him open, run test, find out how to make your power their own. She said. (I still remember Beth…. If Kyle’s thugs become like that….. I’ll just kill them like the rest.) (What the hell?!) You thought. But enough about them. Let’s talk about us. She said. We have nothing to talk about. You said. I beg to differ. Why don’t you just give yourself over to me? She said. And be your slave? You said. You hurt me. I’m actually a nice person. I haven’t killed anyone in the last two months. She said. I’m jumping for joy. You said. I don’t want you as my slave. I want you to be….something more. She said. Something…..more? You said. That’s right. Someone like you need a special position. And I promise to reward you well. She said, coming closer. (What is she? Her words are like honey, but I can taste the vinegar.) You thought. Come now. There’s no need for us to fight. A handsome man like yourself shouldn’t be doing that anyway. Plus, I’m a lot more fun that girl you spend all your time with. She said. (M-Mira.) You said. She removes your mask and puts your hand on her chest. (Shit. Those must be at least double Ds.) You thought. All natural. And all yours if you become mine. She said. She wraps her arm around you and pulls you close. When her head was close, she felt a sharp pain in her side. Ugh…! She said. She looks to see your knife jammed into her.

She looks back at you….and smiles. You’re such a bad boy. She said before kissing you. And I love discipling bad boys. She said. (This girl is insane!) You thought. You pull out your knife kick her away. You’re not seriously going to do this? Without your…..powers. She said. You think I depend on my powers to get me through a tough situation? You’re in for a shock. You said. You run to her and she grabs your arm. You drop and catch your knife in your other hand and she moves back just as your knife cuts a piece of her cloak. You quickly close the distance and kick her. She block and shifting your weight, you balance off her and kick her with other leg. While she stumbles back, charge her. She sidesteps and sweep your feet out from under you. You catch yourself with your hand, rebound back up, and jump back with your elbow right into her face. You spin around and stab her right in the heart. (Got her!) You said. Before you could pull your knife out, you are suddenly bounded by shadow like tendrils. What the?! You said.

Heh…..hehehe…. I have to admit. Even with your powers locked, you are good. But…. She said, pulling out your knife. You see all the stab wounds heal and close up. Without them, you aren’t going to kill me. She said. (W….what is she?) You thought. You, on the other hand, are quite killable. No powers, no strength or speed, no regeneration. She said. Grr…. You said. A stab in the neck, the heart, or multiple and you’re dead. She said. So what are you waiting for? You said. You have any idea how hard it is to clean out blood? Besides Amy is hellbent on doing it herself. She said. (Shit. Amy’s already jacked up on whatever shit she took to become better. If they get what I got….) You thought. But maybe…. A little pain will do you good. She said. She stabs you in the leg. That’s for stabbing me. Then in the arm. That’s for turning down my offer. The in the side. And that’s for not kissing me. She said. You didn’t scream once. You weren’t going to give her the satisfaction. Hm. One more? I guess so. Even things out. She said. When she goes to stab you, you grab her hand. What?! How are you?! She said. Your heart starts beating fast. Then faster and faster, and your power starts to rise to the point you break free. What? She said shocked. You pull her close and punch her and send her crashing into the wall. You pick up your knife just as she appears in front of you.

H….How are you… But I sealed them.....! She said. You disappear and reappear in front of her and she vanishes. You follow after her and kick her. You disappear and reappear behind her and she vanishes as your fist hits the ground. She reappears behind you and you grab her hand and roundhouse kick her. Ugh….! She said, stumbling back. You swing your knife upward and slice her across her chest. ARGH!! She shouts. As you go to stab her, your chest starts to heart and you clutch it; which makes you drop your knife. You go to pick it up, but she starts to get up. So you leave your knife behind.

When you get to a safe distance, you fall over and cough up blood. I knew…..i’d hurt, but not like this. You said. You writhe there for a minute before getting up. I have….to find him. You said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: Head to the mansion

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
You get to the prison and sneak inside. I’ll have to blend in. If they spot me, I can’t fight them. You said. You cough up blood again and take off your clothes. You knock out a guard and take his clothes. Wow. For someone who preaches that males are worthless and inferior, they still give them jobs like this. You said. You walk through the place, looking for your dark half. You look into each cell and come up empty until you come across a lone cell. Hey! Hey!! You said. In the dark corners of the cell, you see glowing red eyes and see him coming up. There you are. Holy shit. They slapped a collar on you? And where did you get that mask from? You said. I’ve always had it. What took you so long? He said. That bitch again. Ugh…! You said. The hell’s your problem? Wait. Your heart…. You didn’t….. He said. It was either that or get stabbed in the neck. You said. We won’t be able to break out with you like this. He said. Like hell. Let’s get you out. You said. You start lockpicking the cell. Damn. They went out on keeping you locked up. This tumbler is hard. You said. They got public enemy number 1. It’s only right they go this far. He said. You break the lock open and the cell door. Ok. Don’t move out. Got to get that collar off first. You said.

You!! A enforcer shouts. (Shit!) You thought. Bring him to the meeting room. And be quick about it! The master is waiting. She said. Ok…. Let’s play along here. Get in front while I work this. You said. You escort your dark half while trying to hack the collar. Damn it. I’ve shutdown the alarm, but I need a screw driver to get the bolts out. I’d pull them, but my powers are still gone. You said. And I can’t do it either. I get this painful shock. He said. You reach the meeting room and see Kyle with is elites and some scientist. (Damn…. Whole goon squad is here.) You thought. (Like I said, public enemy number 1.) He said. (You can still hear my thoughts?) You said. (We are the same person. Two halves of the same coin.) He said.

Bring him here. Kyle said. You do what he said. (This doesn’t happen often, but I don’t know what to do. Can’t fight, but I can’t leave you here.) You said. Well? Kyle said. Primary blood test showed extreme regenerative nature. We theorized that it’s high enough for limb regeneration. Even if subject is decapitated, his head would grow back. (Even I didn’t know that last part.) You thought. So what about abnormal strength and speed? Amy said. He was highly uncooperative, but we speculate that his muscles and bones are hardened, which probably explains the strength. We still need to run a lot more tests. She said. From what I’ve seen, it blows what amy was given out the water. Luna said. So how do we make it ours!? Amy said. I’d rather not discuss that in the presence of…..extra ears. She said. (Shit. That’s me. But I can’t leave.) You said. (Can’t fight either. Your body is still suffering.) He said. …..You’re relived. Kyle said. (Go. Get stronger however you can.) He said. You turn and walk out. Looks like it’s time to head back to Sinclair, but first…. Let my body recover a little. You said.

You make your way back and put your old clothes on and cough up blood. Argh….! You said, clutching your chest. You put your mask back on and head to Mira’s house. When you get there, you manage to open the door before falling out. B….big brother! Miley said, running up to you. She crouches down next to you. Mira! Come quick! She shouts. Miley grabs your hand just as Mira runs up. What happened!? She said worried. He just came in like this. He’s bleeding, coughing up blood, and his heart is pounding like crazy. Miley said. Get all the medicine we have. Hurry! She said. Miley runs off. And here I thought……you didn’t care. You said. You thought wrong. She said. That’s…..doesn’t happen a lot. You said. Miley comes back with a medical kit and extra medical supplies. Her and Mira pick you up and move you to the couch; where they started to work on you.

Ok. Hold still. Mira said. She rubs peroxide on your last wound. You clench your teeth in pain as Miley rolls a bandage over it. Ok. That should do it. Mira said. All that’s missing is the hospital bed. You said. Is he going to be ok? Miley said. He’ll be fine. Mira said. And just in time to. I need to go find someone. You said. Not in your condition. You’re still recovering. Mira said. I’m healthy as a horse. See, look. I can stand. You said. You get up and wince back down. As a horse. Right. You’re on bedrest indefinitely. Mira said. Indefinitely? You said. Until I say so. Then you have to get pass Miley, who you appointed as gatekeeper. Mira said. And I’m not so easily swayed. One look of pain, and back on bedrest! She said. Either of you have a phone? I need to call 911 about being held hostage. You said. Does a hostage get the care of two loving girls? Mira said. ……No. Wait. Two loving girls? Are you saying you love me? You said. What?! No! I mean…..! I meant it as a metaphor. Not that I don’t love you, just….. She said, going red in the face. Uh-huh. You said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: To the prison

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
You spend the next two day recovering. Mira and Miley both attended to your wounds; although you hated being treated like this. It reminded you of the times you’d spend in the hospital after being investigation when sideways. And it reminds you that you’re still human.

Come on, Miley. I can get my own drink. You said. You can barely stand. She said. Not true. Look. You said. You get up and stand….only to grip onto the couch arm. You were saying? She said. ….Fine. You said.

When night came, Mira changed out your bandages. Wounds are closed up. And no sign of infection. I’d say a day or two before you’re healed up. She said. And finally get off this couch. You said. Don’t act like you don’t like being waited on hand and foot. Surprised you didn’t make us wear bikini’s while doing so. She said. One, I’m not handicap, I can do things myself. Two, I’m not lazy. And three, that’s just wrong. I don’t want to see you or Miley in a bikini every time I see you. Especially Miley. She’s like, what,13? 14? I’m not some pervert like….. You said. Pervert like…..the master? Mira said. Not like Kyle. Although he has 5 of them with him at all times…. You said. Then like who? She said. …..Chijinda. You mutter. I’m right here, you know. He said, appearing on the couch arm. What did you say? Mira said. …..Nothing. It’s late. And I’m tired. You said. You aren’t trying to sneak out again, are you? She said. One time. And I get put lockdown. You said. For your own good. She said.

When Mira left, it was just you and Chijinda. So…. Kyle’s learning all your secrets right now. And here you are. He said. I can’t do anything about that. You said. Why not? You said. Because my body couldn’t handle anymore. I’d be captured to. Or worse, dead. You said. Isn’t that a better solution than Kyle finding out about your powers? He said. Sounds like you want me to die. You said. Don’t act like that hasn’t crossed your mind. You still haven’t come to terms with my death. He said, getting up and looking out the window. This is only going to get worse. He said. What? My onset dementia? Or the world? You said. Both. I suggest you find a solution soon. Or it’s not going to end well. For anyone. He said. You grip your head and he disappears. Shit…. You said. You close your eyes and go to sleep.


In the middle of the night, your phone goes off. What the….? You said. You look at the message. “Get up. Head to Sinclair’s.” It said. Sinclair’s. That’s beyond the o district. Travelling that path at night. Not a good idea. You phone goes off again. “Hurry your ass up.” It said. Jesus… You said. You put your mask on and head to the door. You turn the knob slowly, open the door, and leave. You get to the highway that leads out of O district. This is going to be a difficult trip. Plus, Sinclair’s place isn’t in the safest of place. But someone wants to meet. You said. You start walking along the highway.

Morning time. At the prison.


Hey! Wake up in there! An enforcer said. Your dark half growls lowly. I said wake up! She shouts. You dark half appears at the bars and grab her by the neck. Ugh! She said. You know how easy it is for me to crush your neck? He said. W….why hasn’t….the collar kicked in yet? She said. You clowns really need to change your design every once in a while. Anyone good with mechanical work can crack this. You said. You….wouldn’t dare! She said. I would. He said. He bashes her head against the bars repeatedly until her face is bloodied. He lets go of her and her body hits the ground. You got off easy. Kyle and his girls are going to get a lot worse. He said.

At Mira’s house.

Mira comes out of her room with a yawn. When she walk into the living room, she notices you’re not there. Oh…. Oh God no! She said. Mira looked all around, but doesn’t find you. Wait. What if he’s…. She said. Mira quickly checks under her foot and sighs happily knowing she didn’t step on you by accident. Miley walks in seeing Mira worried. What’s going on? Hang on…. Where is he!? She said. I…. I don’t know. He must have snuck out during the night. Mira said. No….! I was suppose to gatekeep him. I should have slept standing in front of the door. Miley said, nearing tears. Mira was on the verge of tears as well. I should have kept him close. I don’t think I could look myself in the mirror again. She said.

One day later.

Finally here. This place makes o district look clean. You said. You head for Sinclair’s building and head inside. Hey, Sinclair. You here? You said, opening the door. Looks like he’s not. You said. You look around and find a note. “If you’re reading this, then I assume you made it. I know why you’re here, and I can’t teach you anything else. But my associate can. I think it’s time you two finally meet. As for me…. I’m sure we’ll see each other again one day.” It said. Associate? You said, as your phone goes off. “I feel it’s time we meet. Head deeper into this hellhole.” It said. Place is already dangerous enough during the day, but at night? Well, came too far to go back. You said. You cough up some more blood. Damnit…. You said. You head out and back into the street.

You walk slowly and with caution. Feels like I’m being watched. You said. You keep going until you see a old, rotting corpse. Holy shit…. He’s been ripped in two. And his insides are gone. Like they were slurped right out of him. You said. You heard roaring. That sounded more animalistic that how Kyle’s thugs and cronies do it. You said. You feel the ground start to shake. Jesus…. It’s like the earth is about to open up. You said. As you regain your balance, you see multiple buildings topple over. What the….. Holy…. You said, seeing a preteen girl. What caught your attention was how savage she looked. Her hair was unkempt and there was dried blood on around her mouth and there was this feral look in her eyes. I think she was way too into the whole monster thing. You said. When she sees you, she grabs you and holds you in front of her face. Shit…. You said. You can see the hunger in her eyes and know what she’s going to do. Have to….reach for my armband…. You said. She brings you closer to her slightly open mouth. Come on, come on! You said, trying to get your arm free. She flashes her teeth are even they are stained with blood. Fucking hell…..! You said. Just as you got to her mouth, one of your eyes changed. Ugh…..! You said, vanishing. She closed her mouth; expecting you to land on her tongue, but felt nothing there. She looks at her hand to see you’re not there.

You reappear on her shoulder and punch her right in the jaw and sent her crashing into the ground. You land on the ground and your body is hurting all over. You cough up blood, have a searing pain running through your head, your body is hurting like crazy to the point that you can’t move. You stay on the ground even when the girl slowly gets back to her feet. She looks around for you and sees you lying on the ground. She slowly makes her way to you. As she reaches for you, she is suddenly tackled by another girl and started laying into her with repeated punches to the face. You see her get up and turn to you before blacking out from pain.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: continue

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
Argh….. You said waking up. You rub your head to soothe the pain. You see your mask is off and is nowhere to be found. You also take in your surroundings and see you’re in a building 5x bigger than you’ve seen before. Who….brought me here? And what do they want? You said. You feel the ground shake. Oh…. Great. You said. You quickly got up and hide. As the footsteps got closer, you see the woman again. Wait…. I’ve seen her. Right before I blacked out. You said. She’s wearing a green low crop and knee high heeled boots and she has emerald green eyes that look like they glow. She long black hair that partial covered her left eye. By the way she’s looking around, it must be for me. You said. You see a worried and frightful look on her face. Best leave while she’s panicking. You said. You take one step out of your spot and she turns around facing you. What? How did she hear me? You said. She runs over to you and smiles. Shit…. You said. She reaches down for you and her long, slender fingers wrap around you and lifts you up to her face. (How do I get out of this?) You thought. She starts to move you closer to her, but it wasn’t to her mouth. It was against her chest. Huh!? You said. She was holding you against her chest, but not in a smothering way. It was more of a mother embracing a long lost child. (Why is she….doing this?) You thought. After embracing you, she lets up.


Uhh…. You said. She then starts to gently rub your head with her finger. You’re…..quite friendly. You said. She hugs you even tighter. Oh….. Ok. Very friendly. You said. She lets go when she hears the pain in your voice. Did you….bring me here? You said. She nods. Are you a mute? You said. No. She just prefers action over words. A voice said. You see a man in a open, brown trench coat walk out of the shadows. When you looked at him, you felt his piercing black eyes look through you. Set him down, Em. He said. Em didn’t want to and looked at him with a pleading look. Now, Em. He said. Reluctantly, she puts you down on the ground. Is she usually like this? You said. No. But I don’t think that’s the reason you’re here. He said. No. I came to- Find Sinclair and get more powerful? He finishes. H…How do you know that? You said. He pulls out a phone. Wait…. Are you the one whose been sending those texts? You said. I have. I’ve been watching you. You’re fighting is sloppy. And you hold back you’re true potential. He said. What do you know of my powers? You said. I know you have a dark half. And he told you to get stronger and come back. He said. Ugh…! You said. I know you came across Heather and she sealed your powers and took your dark half. And he’s being tested on right now. He said. You….know all this.? You said. I do. And I can help you get more powerful. 20x more than you are now. He said. 20x…. You said. You think for a minute. (Becoming stronger…. Just like my dark half said. Plus, if Kyle and his croons get what I got….) You thought. Well? He said. …..Yes. You said. Good. We can start now. He said before punching you in the gut. Ack….! You said. It felt like behind hit by a train going at the speed of a jet. You fall over on the ground.

Seeing you there, Em wanted to pick you up. No. He needs to learn on his own. He said. You struggle to get up. Your muscles are hurt from that one punch. You fight through the pain and grit your teeth and get up. Good. Seems like this won’t be a waste. Come. Oh. And My name’s Luke. He said.

Two days later.
Come on. Get up! Is this the same person who took on an army of giants by himself?! Luke said. Your body was hurting all over as you push yourself up. Again. He said. He vanishes and you block his punch. You dodge the next one and get hit by the one from behind and fall to the ground. (He’s so fast. He puts me to shame.) You thought. That’s enough for today. Em. He said. Em quickly picked you up and you felt your body slowly heal. You look up at her to see a heartwarming smile. You’d speak if you weren’t so hurt.

One week later.

*Huff* *Huff* You said. You’ll never hit me moving that slow. He said. You charge him again and he hits you in the back of the head. You hit the ground unconscious. *Sigh* Luke said.


Two weeks later.

You have to stay alert. He said. You wonder around and hit a wall. Don’t trust your eyes. Use your other senses. Luke said. You move your head a few times and block a punch and sent flying through the wall. Ugh…. So much pain…. You said. *Sigh* Getting there…. I think. He said.


One month later.

You punch him and he dodges it. He comes back and you block it and the one from behind. Then the side. Good…. You’re learning.

Two months later.

Always stay on your toes. Keep focus on the punch and the one coming after that. He said as you dodge his attacks. You block his punch and his kicks. He keeps attacking and you dodge all of his attacks. It stops when you catch his fist. Very good. He said. …..What’s next? You said. I’m going to teach you something extremely useful. Close your eyes. He said. You do that. Empty your mind. Focus on your other senses. He said. You concentrate as he talks. Now. Extend them beyond yourself. Connect to the world around you. You breath in and out and focus. Em looks on worried. Luke waits a few seconds before punching you. You move your head out the way. (Good….) Luke thought. He attacks you again and you dodge it without effort. When he attacks again, you dodge and attack him. He dodges it. Excellent…. He said. He vanishes and appears in front of you. You sensed him and where ready to dodge when…. (It’s your fault he’s dead.) A voice said. (Ugh!) You said. With your mind occupied, Luke hit you and sent you flying into a building. Ow…. You said. Em quickly ran over to you as you got up. I’m fine…. You said. Something broke your focus. Luke said. I heard….a voice. You said. Didn’t I say find a way before it gets worse? Chijinda said.
