Your eyes go wide as your head throbs in pain. Em looks on worried while looks into your eyes. (Widen eyes, pupil shaking, head pain, hearing voices and staring off…. Sinclair was right. He does have dementia.) Luke thought. Luke elbows you to the head. Ugh…! You said hitting the ground.

Watch over him. He said. Em picks up your body and looked at Luke. He’ll be fine. He said.


Back in Prison.

Master. I think we’ve done it. We’ve found out what gives him his strength. A scientist said. And? Kyle said. It’s his blood. Not only does it give him his strength and speed, but the cells multiple at such a rate that any wound suffered is healed. She said. Any wound? So what if he’s stepped on or something like that? He said. That’s actual worse. The body explodes when under massive pressure. Since his cells multiply at a higher rate, and this is going to sound ridiculous, he’ll reconstruct himself. She said. Reconstruct? You mean he’ll build himself together? He said. Right. Although I think I see why. In all the test, he’s showed violent tendencies. But in one where he got stabbed with a dagger, the blood that was on the floor moved. She said. Moved? He said. Yes. It was like a blob. It moved all the way to the wound and reentered his body. She said. Something like this…. It can make a force not to be mess with. Is there a way for us to use this for us? Kyle said. At the behest of Amy, we’ve started but we’re going to full go into this without your approval. She said. Do it. With this power, we’ll be unmatched. He said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: A day later

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
How are feeling? Luke said. I’m fine…. Although Em really didn’t want me up and moving. You said. I told you not to coddle him. Luke said. Em looks annoyed and rub your head gently just to spite luke. Em! He said. I’m fine. What’s next? You said. I’m sure Sinclair told you that you have special eyes. He said. Yeah. He taught me how to use them. You said. Today you’re going to be learning more about it. First, activate them. He said. You activate them, but only one eye has three ticks and it hurts. Argh! You said. Em quickly grab you and her hands start to glow. The pain quickly disperses and your eye change back. *Huff….* You said. Em. Luke said. Really not wanting to let go of you, she puts you back down. What happened? Luke said. I activated them, but only one eye changed. And then there was this blinding pain. You said. Strange…. That shouldn’t happen at all. And blinding pain. That should only happen when…. Wait a minute. He said. Luke scans your over. A seal’s been placed on you. He said. A seal? You said. A barrier preventing you from using your powers. No wonder you haven’t been performing well. He said. (So that’s why.) You said. How did you get that seal on you? He said. I came across a woman in a black hooded robe. She placed it on me and I haven’t been able to use my powers since. You said. Black hood…. Heather. He said. Is there a way to undo it? You said. It’s going to require blood. You said. How much blood? You said. Not yours. It requires the caster’s blood. He said. I’ll do that when I go back. So what now? You said. Take the day off. We’ll pick right up tomorrow. He said, disappearing. Whoa…. You said as Em picks you up and hugs you tightly. Em…. You’re….crushing me..... You said.

At night.

So… How did you get your powers anyway? Luke said. I wasn’t born with them if that’s what you’re looking for. It was….out of necessity. You said. Necessity? He said. Well at the time, but it was mostly out of jealousy. You said. Necessity and jealousy? That’s a bit confusing. Luke said. ……I use to….hang out with this group. There was something off about them, but we all have that about ourselves. Blake, Joana, Jasmine. Jasmine was like Em here. Except Em takes it to a whole nother level. You said as she smiles, taking it as a compliment. They would do things without me, and when I’d ask, they dodge the question. Joana really wanted to tell me, but she didn’t. When they finally told me they had powers, I was mad they didn’t tell me. It wasn’t because I was the only one without. I was mad over the fact they didn’t tell me. You said. I guess you didn’t hang out with them anymore. Luke said. No. I didn’t cut them off. Just…..keep them at a distance. One day, I was approached by one of Blake’s enemies. He read me like a book. He knew how I felt. And he offered me something. A vial filled with blue liquid. He said I will become more powerful than ever imagine. You said. And you took it. He said. As angry as I was and told myself and them I didn’t care, I was jealous of them. You said. It’s not like they rubbed it in every chance they had? Luke said. No. It had the opposite effect. Especially Jasmine. Damn mother Teresa to me. You said. Seems like you share something with this person, Em. Luke said. Em’s smile just gets bigger.

One day, we got called to investigate disappearances at a school. We found out what’s been going on. Plus, a lot more. We came across this….thing. Horns, tail, red skin. She looked at me with this….hungry gaze. She was making light of what she was going to do to me. You said. ….Succubus. He said. What? You said. You came across a succubus. She was going to take your life energy by fucking you. He said. T….that’s what she meant?! I was so damn scared of her…. I took the serum. And blasted that bitch back to the beginning of time! You said. That’s a bit extreme. So that’s how you got them. And this….Chijinda. Your long time friend? Luke said. He was. I couldn’t get to him in time…. But I made their leader suffer for what she did. Yet I still blame myself. You said. (That’s where it’s coming from. His guilt.) You knew this Chijinda for a long time. And in that time, you’ve both known each other right down to the detail. Do you think he wound want to see you still hanging onto him dying? Luke said. That’s exactly what I keep trying to tell him. Chijinda said. It’s not easy. I still see you there like that….. How can I just forget it? You said. I never said you had to forget. I said come to terms with it. People die. And there’s nothing we can do about it. He said. But why did it have to be you!? You said. Life’s cruel like that. He said. Still doesn’t mean I have to like it. We talked about all the things we were going to do. How we were going to be the best detectives. Outshine the real and fictional ones. You said. And in came the monkey wrench. You can’t prepare for everything. Remember Murphy’s law? He said. The one time it kicks in….. It’s against me. You said. What did I always tell you? No matter what, keep going. You think Narue would want to see you like this? He said. N…narue…. As hard as it was, she was able to keep going. If Narue can do it, so can you. He said. …….God damn it, Chijinda….. I tried. I gave it my all and it wasn’t enough. You know I wanted to running after you. You said. I know. And I also know that a man isn’t an island. You needed a bigger team to get into the base. He said. So….you never blamed me? You said. No. I knew who the to save that for. He said. Hearing that, you feel like a heavy burden’s been lifted as he fades away.

So? Luke said. I’m better now. Everything has been settled. You said. Then rest up tonight. We’ll continue tomorrow. He said getting up and leaving. Em picks you up and hugs you tightly. Em…. Crushing…. You said. Em puts you back on the ground.


As moon hanged high, you slept with Em close by, snoring lightly. Suddenly, your eyes open and you sit up. You look over to Em and walk past her. You head out to the dilapidated bridge and head back to m district.


After a day’s travel, you get back to m district. Still a dump when you left. You look down on your leg and see your knife is gone. You set out to find it. You head to the mansion and go through the door. You look for your knife. Well, what’s this? A voice said. You turn around and see heather. And just where did you run off to? Didn’t see high or low of you for months. And I’ve been looking. All I had to remember you by was this knife. She said. She pulls out your knife. You activate your armband and grow. Hm? You want this back? I think I can part with it…..for something more worthwhile. She said surly. You walk up to her and snatch your knife away before she notice. What? How’d you- Urgh! She said as you stab her in the stomach. You pull your knife out of her and she puts her hand over the wound. You….! She said. You then stab yourself and pull your knife out. After a few seconds, the wound is healed up. So…. You figured it out. Who told you? She said. You sheathe your knife and disappear.
Heh….. It’s begins… She said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: continue with training

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
You reappear at the prison and kick open the door. You head to the meeting room and find an enforcer napping. You walk up to her, grow, and grab her by the throat. What the?! Oh shit! She said. Your look right at her as your eyes change and she stop struggling as her face goes blank. What do you wish of me, master? She said monotone. You hold out your phone and hit record. As you say. Disengage collar locks. She said. You end the record and she falls back asleep. You shrink back down and head to the cell.

You walk up to one of the many cell and bang on the bars. Ugh…. Can’t move…. So much torture. A man said. You slide you phone inside and the message plays. Disengage collar locks. It said. The man’s mind collar disengages and falls to the ground. I…it’s off…! He said stunned. You then disappear and reappear and watch from a safe distance. You wait 15 minutes until you see a crowd of men running out of the prison; Combined with Kim and the other two. And then you see a lone figure standing in the entrance. You know who that is. You disappear and reappear in m district and head into the army base. When the soldiers saw you, they all just moved out your way. You take a few grenades from the armory. You toss the strap across your chest and leave.

Before heading off to confront them, you had two more stops to make. You head to Jessica’s place and enter the front door. You head into her lab and found her looking through a microscope. I didn’t sign up for this…. She said. When she turns around, she leaps when she see you. Ah! Oh. It’s only you. We need to put a bell on you. Actually…. That’s not a bad idea. She said as a lewd smirk spreads across her face. You point at the table. Oh…. I know I promised you I wouldn’t do any scientific research on you. But someone rated me out that I had data. The master told me to break down the genetic code and turn it into a serum. He’s wants to give his girls what you have. I dragged my heels as long as I could on it, but he said if he wants me to see you alive again, I’d better hurry. She said. She quickly envelops you in a hug; your face mashed into her breast. I’m so sorry! She said. You pull her arms off you and motion to all the data. I can get rid of it. I’d be more than happy too. But I did make some of serum and his elites already taken it. She said. Now….it’s interesting. You nod your head and disappear. Please…. Make him suffer before killing him. She said.

You reappear at Mira’s house. When you head in, you head a voice. Brother!? A voice said. Miley comes running out her room and runs into you for a hug. Big brother’s back! She said. As she shouts that, Mira comes running. It… You’re back…..! She said. Where did you go!? And how did you sneak out from under my nose?! Miley said. You open and close the door. Oh… I knew I should have put the combination lock on. But Mira said that’s going too far. She said. He was on bed rest, not house arrest. But that’s in the past. She said. Mira comes closer and puts her hand on your face. I’m just glad you’re back. She said. For a minute, you feel it leaving. Wait. What are you doing with a those….grenades?! Mira said. That was when the tv screen change to show Kyle and his elites. It quickly came rushing back like a speeding train.

I know you’re watching this. Somewhere out there. I don’t know how you manage to pull off a prison break from the inside, but that doesn’t matter. They’ll be brought right back. But first, I think it’s time we finally settle this matter between you and us. How about we meet in the arena? Since it all started there, no better place for it to end. He said.

That was the master. You can’t go there. It’s a trap and you know it is! Mira said. It is a trap, but they work both ways. I’m not letting you go there! If the master wants to pick a fight, then I’ll do it! Miley said. You stop Miley and put her to the side. No! I’m not letting you go! You just got back! She said. You hesitate to do this, but you flip your mask up as your eyes change. Ugh….. Feeling…..sleepy….. She said before falling out. Miley! Mira said. You pick her up and place her on the couch. ……She’ll be fine. You said. A…..are you seriously going to meet him? Mira said. …..Yes. You said. T….then promise me one thing. Come back to me. She said; tears in her eyes. You place your hand on her cheek. Ah….! She said. …….Take care of yourself. You said. You head out as you put your mask back on.

You make your way to the area and before entering, you see Chijinda standing to the side. You’re not completely consumed. So I know you can hear me. You’re doing what he wants you to. And you know what’s going to happen. And you know what you must do. He said. You slowly nod. Miley was wrong. He’s not out to kill you. He wants to humiliate you. Show the world that no matter what kind of power a man has, he’s powerless against the “superior race”. He said. You hold open your hand and a ball of energy forms. You know it’s the only way. Don’t get distracted. The longer you wait, the more it will mature. And so will they. He said as he vanishes. You close your hand into a fist and walk inside.

When you get inside, the heavy doors close behind you. Didn’t think you show. I’m actually surprised. Kyle said. You see him sitting in his arena throne. Full circle is what they call it? It started here, only fitting that it should end here. Don’t fret. We’ve learned all we need to know, and I promise we’ll put it to good use. But I think a demonstration is in order first. He said. The arena is empty. Who and how would watch? That’s when lights flashed on and shined down in the arena. The first ever televised arena match. You really should take that mask off and smile for the people back home. He said. Chijinda was right. But he’s going to be the one humiliated.

All throughout the F, M, O and any tv, everyone was looking at this.

As Mira placed Miley on the couch, she looked over at the tv and see you. Oh….. Oh, no. She said.

Ok. That’s the last one. Jessica said, throwing the paper into the fire. Jessica walked pasted her tv and sees you. What the? Oh…. God….. The master has gone too far. She said.


Let’s not keep the crowd waiting. Girls. He’s all yours. Kyle said. You look at the giant, heavy metal doors as dents are put into it. Then it comes flying off its hinges and fly past you. Man. I’m never going to get use to this strength. Yumi said. Man. It’s going to be 10x as easy to put men in their place! Luna said. Not before we take care of him! Amy said. You only notice that there was only four of them. Soya wasn’t with them. You’ll deal with her after this. You grow to 100ft. You take out your knife and point. I don’t need an invitation! I’ve waited too long for this! Amy said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: A worldwide spectacle

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
This is a long time coming! You’re going to wish you feel in line like the rest of your kind! Yumi said. Shen she comes running towards you, you sidestep her and punch her right into the ground. Grrr! I’m going to rip that mask off your face and shoved that knife where it doesn’t belong! Amy said. Amy charges at you and you punch her square in the nose hard. The impact of the blow made her eyes roll back and she fell down. You think you’re better than us!? Luna said. You disappear and reappear and slice her throat. You push her down as she gargles on the blood. Which only leave you and Koyuki. You disappear and reappear in front of her. She stares you down as you stare at her. I’m going to take my time breaking you. But first, I’m going to expose your face to the world. Your bloody, broken and beaten face! She said. Ugh…. Get in line, Koyuki. I’m breaking him first. Amy said, getting up. Man. Regeneration as well? Oh, I’m going to enjoy this. Luna said, getting up. We’re going to have so much fun with you, death will be a mercy. Yumi said. And it won’t be granted either! Amy said.


Past the o district border.

Em was in a panic as she was worried about where you were. Calm down, Em. You’ll work yourself into a storm. Luke said. She looks at looks at Luke bewildered. He couldn’t have gotten far. Especially with his-Ugh…! Luke said. Em looks at Luke. I sense….a dark presence. And it’s growing. It’s coming from…. Em. Looks like we’re heading back to civilization. Luke said.

Back in the arena.

You pull your knife out of Yumi’s chest and kick her down. He…. Hehehe…. It doesn’t matter in the end. We’ll just get right back up. Yumi said. You were a little fascinated as how quickly their bodies have adapted to your powers. Their regeneration is getting quicker; almost instant like yours. You pull out a grenade and pull the pin. You shove it into her mouth and stomp it down her throat. Mmmph! She said. You wait until the last second to jump out the way as the grenade explodes. You look to see her headless body. After a few seconds, it stands up and her head grows back. She takes a deep breath. No way…. I was a little worried, but I lived through that? I should thank you for this gift…. After we’re done showing you your place in life! She said.

So even limb regeneration. It’s progressing quicker than you thought. Their stamina has gone up as well as their tolerance for pain. You want to see more. You pull out your knife and appear in front of her and she stopped your stab. Not this time…. She said. You headbutt her back as you see Amy and Luna come too. Grrr! That was a cheap trick, coward! Afraid to fight me head on?! Amy said. All you did was punch her from behind. All the pain you give me, I’ll give it right back! She said. When she took that first step, she disappeared and reappeared in front of you. She hits you right on the jaw. He…. Hehehehe! I don’t know how I did that, but I’ll take it! She said. Now it’s speed. How much more will they improve, you wonder? You grip your knife and disappear and stab her in the side. Ugh…! She said, pushing your arm back. I’m going to carve my name into you with that damn knife….! She said. You kick her away and charge her. Amy catches your arm and headbutts you. You stumble back and get hit from the side by Yumi. When you turn, you are hit in the face with a flying knee. So now they are coordinating attacks. This has become more interesting.

Back at Mira’s.

Mira was sitting on the couching watching the entire fight go down. Please, please, please don’t die. She said. Her heart was beating quickly to where she thought it would come out of her chest. Which is the same story for Jessica.

You stumble back in amazement at how better their coordination is getting. First, they were hitting each other, now they are covering each other and almost in perfect synch. Don’t get tired just yet! We’re just starting. Luna said. Now is good time to knock them down a little, so you gesture them to come get you. You think I need an invitation!? Amy said. She comes charging at you and you sidestep her. You go for an uppercut and she moves out the way and goes for a punch to your head. You duck and punch her in the gut. Ack….! She said. She clenches her gut and you knock her out.

Rgh! Don’t get cocky! Yumi said. Both her and luna come at you and you catch their fists. You grab them both by the neck and bonk them together a few times and throw them away. Grrr! Have your fun while you can! Luna said. Quit attacking blindly. Koyuki said. All four of them looked at each other and nod. Picking themselves up, Yumi, Luna, and Amy surround you. It was a tense few seconds until they attacked. You dodge their attacks; a little surprised they haven’t hit each other yet. Damn it! Hold still! Amy said. You continue to dodge until you sock them all in the head; knocking them out for a few minutes. Which leaves only you and Koyuki. You disappear and reappear right in front of her. As well as she hides it, there is a burning hatred for you. I wanted to let Amy have her way, but it seems like that needs to change. This is a long time coming. She said. You roll your eyes and kick her back. When she steadies herself, you gut punch her in the stomach. As she knells over, you punch her to the ground and kick her in the stomach. If you had a quarter for every time someone said you had this coming, you’d be rich.

When she gets up, you knock her back down. You put your boot on her neck. All that talk only to end up there within 15 seconds. Being in this embarrassing position, Kouyki started to growl through her gritted teeth. Grrr!! Get off of me!! She said. You hold her there as she struggles. You hear rapid footsteps and back hand Yumi to the ground. If it wasn’t for them having your blood injected into them, you’d kill them by now. Rgh!!! Amy said. She came at you with a head full of steam. You swing with your knife and she catches your arm. She tries to wrestle it out of your hand. As you both struggle, Luna shoulder tackles you. When you shoved her head first into the metal doors, you see Amy about to slash you with your knife She swings with so much force that the blade cuts through your mask. Amy sees half of your mask fall off before being punched and sent into the wall. You pick up your knife and the rest of your mask falls off. Finally…. Kyle said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: continue

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
Finally….. The man behind the mask. Kyle said. You put your hand on your face as you sheathe your knife. Damn…. That hurt. At least I can finally see who you are. Amy said. With your mask gone, you had no reason to hide anymore. So you pull down your hood. N….No way. A kid!? That’s who’s been giving us all this trouble?! Yumi said. He can’t be no older than 15. That’s the thorn in our side!? Luna said. I don’t care if he’s a kid! He was well aware of his actions! I still plan on breaking him! Amy said. You roll your eyes. Grrr! Let’s see you have attitude in the next few minutes! When I get my hands on-Ugh!!! She said. She took too long talking and you got bored. So you rammed your arm through her stomach. When she looked at you, you punched her hard enough on the head that her skull caved in and she hit the ground with a thud. You won’t get away with that! Yumi said. You catch her fist and throw her into Luna and they both crash into the wall.

You…! Koyuki said. You catch her fist and she catches yours. You headbutt her and pick her up by the throat. She beats on your arm as you hold her. You grab Amy by the throat as well. She’s back on her feet already. The regeneration is getting stronger. As well as their strength. Koyuki’s pounding is starting to hurt a little. You throw koyuki away into the wall. Rgh!! I hate you!!! She screams as she claws at your arm. As you hold her, you sense something within her. It’s faint, but there. An energy source. It’s forming not in only Amy. But the other three. It won’t be long before they can do the same things you can. And as somewhat interesting and fun as that would be, you prefer to be the only one like that. So if anyone is going to out your powers, it’s going to be you. You pull out your knife. GRRRR! Do your worst! I’ll be back up in a minute! She said. Your knife starts to glow bright and you stab her in the gut. She smiles smugly at you, until she couldn’t feel her arms. Or legs. Like they we completely cut off, but they were still there. W…..what did….you do to me….? She said as she evaporates.

Yumi, Luna, and Kouyki looked on in stunned silence. A….Amy…. What did you o to her!? Yumi shouts. You monster! Bring her back!! Luna shouts. They both charge at you from the sides and you disappear as they got close. They come to a screeching halt. Then they felt like they were being attacked from all sides. When the attack stopped, you appear behind them; with your eye changed, and you look over at them. In the next second, they are engulfed in black fire. The fire rages for a few seconds before dying down and every trace of it and Luna and Yumi are gone.

You…. Just what the hell are you!?! Koyuki said. As you turn to her, you can see it. The unmistakable look and smell of fear. You smile and appear right in front of her. You hold out your hand and she flinches. ……Die. You said as a huge beam of black and red energy consumes her. The beam goes through the wall; complete taking off that part of the arena. ….Heh. You said. You shrink back down and reappear next to Kyle and grab him and lift him up by the neck. Nighty nighty, sweet prince. You said, knocking him out. You look at the seat he was sitting in. …..Hmph. You said. You grab Kyle and head out to m district.

When you get to the border, you stop and drop Kyle onto the ground. You look around and see your dark half in the shadows. Saw the whole thing. Is it weird that for once I pretended to be in your shoes? He said. You just stare at him. Oh. That’s right. Your heart, mind and body are taken over by darkness and anger. He said, walking over. I dreamed of this. When you finally let it all out. Nothing can stop us. Not even the elites. And they jacked so much blood from me and stole our powers. But carbon copies can’t beat the originals. You’ve proved that. He said. He kicks Kyle in the head. No one could beat us, and with the display you showed, no one will want to. By the way, where did you learn that black fire from? Even I was astonished by that. He said. You continue to stare at him. You know, I had plans for each one of the elites. But you brought me this clown, which is better. Unless he isn’t for me and is for Kim. Right? You said. You nod. Knowing how much she hates him? I can’t be more proud of you. And with Kyle out, that leaves a power vacuum that needs to be filled. So let’s claim our long over due reward. He said. He goes inside you, and instead of feeling the evil magnify, it starts to dissipate.


Ugh…. Ohhhh…. You said. You look around dazed and a little confused. (Why did you do that? I was finally consumed by the evil in my heart like you wanted.) You said. (I want it to come naturally. Not because you spent a month or two without me.) He said. (But what about what you said a few minutes ago?) You said. (To get close. You were still in fight mode. And it was all true, don’t worry. Just wish I had ten minutes with the elites and Kyle. Speaking of him….) He said. You look at Kyle and pick him back up. You head to M district HQ. When you get there, it looks like they were in the middle of an evacuation. You walk into the grounds and all of the soldiers stop dead in their tracks. You drop Kyle on the ground and walk away.

You’re about to leave m district when you hear the clicking and booming footsteps. You look and see Em running up to you. She quickly grabs you and hugs you tightly. (A friend of yours? She needs to learn personal space.) He said. EM! A voice shouts. Letting you out of her grip, you see Luke. I told you to stop coddling him! He said. Em looked furious at Luke, but a sharp look from him made her back down. Drop. Now. He said. She does just that. Luke looks into your eyes.

I can see the anger and evil in your eyes, but it’s going away. As well as the dark energy. It’s still there, but not as much as before. He said. (So I take it you know these two?) He said. So I guess Kyle has been taken care of. Which leaves a nasty vacuum that the army will try to fill. He said. …..If the army wants to fill that vacuum, then let them. That has never interested me. You said. Really? And his mansion? He said. He won’t be needing it anymore. But it is a shame to let it go to waste. You said. So you’re going to move in? He said. Why not? You said. You head back to the mansion.

(It’s all ours now.) He said. (Koyuki was right. We would be in the lap of luxury.) You said. You walk through the mansion an it has everything needed for living. More bedrooms than I like. Lot of redecorating to do. This color scheme is horrendous. You said. Don’t think of remodeling just yet. Just because Kyle and his crones are gone doesn’t mean you’re done learning and getting better. Luke said. I know. I’m waiting on you. You said. I’m ready whenever you are. You’re fighting is still sloppy. He said. Then….let’s fix that. You said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: The person behind the mask

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
Weeks go by as Luke trains you. During that time, M district slowly rebuilt. You didn’t keep close tabs on m district as you didn’t care that much. And it would seem Luke knew more about you than you know. As he was not surprised when he saw your dark half for the first time.

Very good. Now the black fire is related to your emotions. The stronger your hate, the more intense it is. Luke said. What if I use it on someone I don’t hate? You said. The fire won’t burn them. He said. Your eyes change back to normal and the fire goes away. I have to admit. You struggled at first, but you always manage to come out at the end. He said. If at first you don’t succeed, try try again. You said. Unless you’re someone who’s utterly incompetent. He said. Well, there’s that. Kira and Kim still think they run the world? You said. Apparently. M district is coming along well. And they are still trying to convince others that men are equal. He said. I take it the change is happening slowly. You said. Some are willing to give it a try. Others…..got there heels digged in. He said. At least they didn’t implement any draconian laws for killing a guy. You said. Seems like it. We have guesses. Luke said. We don’t get visitors at all. Let’s roll out the red carpet. Em. You said. She nods and you and Luke disappear.

After waiting a few minutes, you see 5 guys and 2 preteens and a teen. When they get closer, you quickly take out the 5 guys and Em knocks out the girls. Let’s make sure they can’t start any trouble. You bind them and wait. This blonde one looked pissed when she came in. I think she’s a former punishment enforcer. Weren’t they all rounded up and awaiting trial? Luke said. Guess this one broke free. Besides, her defense wouldn’t hold anyway. They say those trials they give are fair, but they’re really kangaroo courts. Showing that anyone who worked with Kyle gets a life sentence. You said. So what are we going to do with our esteemed guesses? He said. Find out what they want first. If they have bad intentions, let Em have them. You said. She gets all the fun? Luke said. I’m sure she’ll let you do something. You said.

You wait a few minutes before they come to. Ohhh…. Make the ringing stop….. One said. Ugh…. I’m seeing triple. What hit me….? Another said. Ice will do that knot well. You said. Oh…. Oh, shit….! One of them said. When the rest of them saw you, you swore they all pissed themselves. Except the blonde girl who just gritted her teeth and narrowed her eyes at you. You jokers know you’re here uninvited. Legally, I could kill you. You said. Wait, wait, wait! We’re not here to cause any kind of trouble. One of them said. Yeah. Far FAR from it. Another said. So you’re not trouble makers. And you none of you look like you work for the army. You said. Which brings us to the question: What are you guys doing here? Luke said. Y…you know….. After the whole fight with the elites and all…. You sort of became a household name. One said. Don’t try and sweet talk me…. Who are you, again? You said. T…tom. Guy to my right is Dante. To my left is Cody. Old guy over there is Hank. And the big guy right here is Bruce. He said. Sweettalk isn’t going to work. Out with it. You said. Ok, ok. It’d…..just be in our best interest….if we were, you know….your go to guys. Tom said. My go to guys? You said. They want to join you. Luke said. Join me? In what? I’m not some ruler. You said. Not in that aspect. More of like enforcers. Luke said. ……I can see why you five would. But what about you three? You said. W…well the thing is…. We’ve sort of known these guys for a long time. And we really didn’t want them coming here, and wondering what happen. One of them said. So that’s your story and your friend here. But I know blondie’s story already. Running to avoid that trial. Am I right? You said. She grits her teeth even more. And what Tom said, does that apply to you two as well? You said. Yeah…. We’ve lived through the master’s reign scared they were going to be enslaved or worse. If you take them, we want in too. The other said. And blondie here choses the lesser evil. Still evil, but not as. You said. She turns her head away from you.

…..Fine. I’ll take you on. Em. You said. She unties the girls binds and you do the same for the guys. I can tell you this right now. It’s not going to be easy. If you’ve been or seen army boot camp, that is gentle compared to what you’re about to do. You said. Well…. It could be worse. We could be-Ugh!! Tom said, feeling your fist in her gut. When you back up, he falls down. First lesson. Learn how to take a punch. Luke. Em. You said. With pleasure. Luke said. Em smiles evilly.


One week later.

Still standing. Still alive and breathing. So you’re committed. You said. Y….yes, sir. They said through broken ribs. Today you’re going to get familiar with weapons. I take it at least one of you has shot a gun before? You said. I’ve fired a few. Hank said. Good. Now each of you take a weapon that catches your eye. You said. Walking up to the table, they look over the selection of weapons. From pistols to rifles to shotguns to lmgs. Dante picked first and went with a sniper rifle. Hank went with an assault rifle. Cody, Tom and Bruce chose pistols. …..Alright. Targets are out there. Fire when your ready. You said. You watch as they fire and fumble to reload. The only one to stand out was Hank.


Well it wasn’t the worse shooting I’ve seen. Tom, this isn’t a contest. Shoot like you have some sense. Cody, your hesitation to fire will end up killing you. Dante, if you’re going to use a sniper rifle patience and timing is key. Bruce, don’t fire blindly at a target. Hank. You did well. You said. Y…yes, sir. He said. Don’t let it go to your head. Always another chance to fail. You said. You turn around and contemplate. ……I’m surprised. Weapons at your fingertips and none of you took the chance to shoot me in the back. Even after a berated you. You said. What….would be the point of doing that? Cody said. To see it if you’d take an opportunity when you see it. Not always good to do so. But I wonder, was it out of fear that none of you did it? Or was it something else? You said. (Fear.) he said. Regardless, you’re done with me for today. Luke however, has plans for you. You said.


The next day.

Ok, you three. Looks like Em hasn’t been the nicest to you. Look like hammered shit. You said. She’s a lot meaner than she looks. One said. Right…. I never caught your names. You said. Kate. And my friend is Sam. She said. And blondie here? You said.I think her name is Kris. Sam said. Ok... Kate…. You’re well endowed and all. Are you sure you weren’t one of the enforcers like Kris here? N…no, sir. I was just blessed. She said. Let’s see if your skills are too. Have any of you killed before? No need to answer, blondie. I know you have. You said. She grows lowly. Killed? Like in general? Kate said. Yes. I won’t judge. You said. No. Sam said. Not at all. Kate said. Ok, we’ll cross that bridge later. Do you know how to throw a punch at least? You said. Not like you can. Sam said. Very well. That’s your task. Hit me with all you’ve got. You said. A-attack you? Kate said. You’re…..not going to attack back? Sam said. No. Just hit me with everything. You said. Showing no hesitation, she blondie throws a punch and you catch it. You bend her hand and force her down on her knees. You punch her in the nose and break it. She hits the ground as blood gushes from her nose. You really thought I’d just be a punching bag? Never believe every word you here. Understand?! You said. U-understood. They said. Get this trash on her feet so you can learn. You said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: Aftermath

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
I’m shocked. You all manage to survive the month. You said. We’ve survived that hell of a prison. We can survive this. Tom said. You’re far from finish. And my seal of approval is easier to come by than Luke’s And you all know he’s a harsh teacher. You said. My bones are still hurting. Cody said. Changing things around. You’re going to first aid. Each of you. You said. What are we going to practice on? Dante said. You pull out pistol and shoot him in the side and he hits the ground. Each other. Best way to learn is by doing. Tom. Get the bullet out. Dante, you sow it close. Cody, you’re disinfecting. Bruce, you hold him down. And Hank, you’re on bandage duty. You said. Y-yes, sir! They said. You watch over them as they perform to get the bullet out. Within 8 minute, Dante is patched up. He’s going to be ok, it seems. You said. Would have been done sooner if Tom didn’t forget to cauterize the blade. Hank said. And time is important. You said. You shoot Hank in the gut. Again. Until you can do it from memory. You said. Y-yes, sir! They said.

Later that day.

Ok you three. Unlike the other four, you have size on your side. But before I go any further, have any of you seen Godzilla? You said. I’ve seen it once. Sam said. Same here. Kate said. I know you lived it, Kris. You said. She grits her teeth. What was the one thing present in every movie about him? You said. He destroyed cities. Sam said. Right. And that’s what you’re going to be doing. You said. What!? Both of them said while Kris smiled a little. If you’re having reservations. Express them. You said. We’ve…..never leveled a city. We’ve seen them, but usually stay clear of them. Live and let live. Kate said. Hm. Kris. Demonstrate. You two, watch. You said. Kris walks to the abandoned city and starts to demolish it. Stomping, bulldozing, and toppling everything in her way until there was nothing left. Jesus…. Kate said. So much destruction. Sam said. I need to know if that is something you can do. You said. I…. I….don’t think I can. Fighting is one thing, but that…. Kate said. Y…yeah. I can’t do that. That’s just….wrong. Sam said. Very well. Kris will do that from now on. We’ll move on. You said.


Two weeks later.

Have to admit. I didn’t expect you lot to get this far. Thought Luke will kill you for failing. You said. So close to it. He said. You pace the line back and forth before punching Dante in the gut. He doesn’t flinch. Heh. You said. You start pacing again. You throw a punch at Tom and he dodges it. Hm. You said. You pull out a skeet disk and throw it. Fire. You said. The guys pull out their weapons and fire at the target; completely destroying it. Good. Now to put everything you’ve learned together. You said. Yes, sir! They said. You’re going to assault and take out one of the army bases in m district. Sam, Kate, Kris. You’re clearing a path through. Kris, I want controlled destruction. Towers, antennas, satellites, take them out. You said. Yes, sir! They said. Guys, you’re leading the attack in. Kill anyone who shoots you. You said. Yes, sir! They said. Go. I’ll be following you after you in 5 minutes. You said. Determined, they set out to the nearest base. Think they got this? You said. Time will tell. Luke said. After waiting the five minutes, you head out. When you get there, you see antennas broken and towers toppled. In the base, you see dead soldiers everywhere. Bullet holes no lower than the chest. You said. (Give Annie Oakley a run for her money with that kind of aiming.) He said. You walk into the HQ and see more dead soldiers. Make shift defenses. They were taken completely by surprise. You said. You head further in until you find them with prisoners. They surrendered when we cornered them. What do we do? Bruce said. Luke, are you in the mood for skull collecting? You said. I got plenty that will keep me busy for days. He said. Release them and let’s get out of here. You said. They holster their guns and follow you out. Let’s go. You said.

Back at the mansion.

No one injured or anything. And it was your first assignment as a team. No infighting or bickering, clash of opinion or anything. 100% professional. Excellent job, all around. You said. (B+. No diversity in their killing.) He said. Thank you, sir. They said. In light of this, I have something for you. You said. You show them the armor. Body armor? Ante said. Able to block any bullet and withstand a great deal of pressure. You said. So if we get stepped on or sat on, it’d keep us safe? Tom said. Yep. You’d still feel the brunt of it, but you won’t become a stain on the ground. You said. The guys quickly rush up and put on the armored clothing. Girls, I made the same for you. You said. You did? Sam said. Might as well. Just because you’re bigger doesn’t mean you invincible. You said. Is that why you asked my about my chest measurements? Kate said. As functional as they are, they have to be comfortable. Last thing you won’t is to be uncomfortable in them. You said. T….thank you. Kate said. Kate and the other two put on their armor. You can even wear clothes over them. It’ll feel like they aren’t even there. You said. Hey. What’s this symbol? Cody said. It’s our brand. A fist within a shield. You said. Nice. Dante said. I have one last thing to give. I just need to go get it. You said. You disappear and reappear at Jessica’s house.

You go inside and find her inside her lab. Hey, Jessica. You said. Oh. I was wondering when you were going to come by. She said. I’ve just been…..busy. You got those things I wanted? You said. Over there. I finished them a few days after you asked. She said. That was a month ago. You said. When I said I finished college in two weeks, I wasn’t kidding. She said. You strap the device onto your arm and turn it on. All the features you asked for. She said. Thanks, Jessica. I owe you. You said. Really? She said getting up and sauntering her way over. Come on, Jessica. Are we going to do this again? You said. You said you owe me. And I aim to collect. She said. She puts her arms around you. You hid so many secrets from me. And I hate secrets. She said. I couldn’t trust you and if I did tell you, you wouldn’t believe me. You said. I knew you were special in some way. I’m hurt that you wouldn’t trust me. Keeping secrets is a bad habit. She said. Jess…. You said. She kisses you on the mouth and her tongue starts to invade your mouth. She holds the kiss for two minutes and breaks it. Done? You said. Not yet. This goes a lot deeper than just that. She said. She fiddles with your armband and watches as you shrink down. Her titanic finger wrap around you and she brings you to her face. Now for round two. She said. She starts assailing you with her lips. This goes on for a few minutes.

Done now? You said. You said. For now. We’ll pick right up from here next time. She said. You disappear and reappear back at the mansion. She’s going to be the death of me. You said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: continue

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
You stand in front of Mira’s door. Haven’t been here in a while. I know she watched and saw everything. You said. (Who cares? She likes you. If she can’t accept you for who you are, then there’s always Jessica.) He said. (You’re just saying that because of her breast are a little bit bigger than Mira’s.) You said. (……And if I am?) He said. You sigh and open the door. Before you could even close the door, you’re rushed and hugged by Miley. Big brother! You’re back! She said. You say that as if you’re not expecting me not to come back. You said. As Miley lets go of you, Mira comes out of her room. Mira. You said. H…hey…. She said. You don’t have to be on eggshells around me. You’re the last person I want scared of me. You said. Scared? Why would she be scared of you? Miley said. It’s….complicated. But I’ll explain as best I can. You said.

You tell them about your powers and everything about you.

So you have a person inside you? Mira said. He’s like me. Just imagine all my bad things wrapped up in one. You said. And your powers….. That beam I saw… She said. One of many. Pretty much basic to what I really can do. You said. Can you show us? Miley said. …..Here. Hold out your hand. You said. Miley holds out her hand and you create a ball of energy. You place it in Miley’s hands. Whoa…. Mira look! She said, excited. So that’s….what you do? She said. I don’t go around blasting people or things. I’m not some psycho. You said. The energy ball dissipates. Awww. Miley said. Why didn’t you tell me any of this? She said. You wouldn’t believe me if I told you. And I don’t know if you were trustworthy. Imagine my powers in the hands of a megalomaniac. Kyle would be a saint. You said. Oh…. She said. Can we get powers like that?! And fight like you?! Miley said. I don’t think you’d want that. Nasty side effects. You said. Like? She said. Well, you could go from nice and cute to mean and hatefilled. And there’s a chance you might get you a evil dark half too. Who’d want nothing but mass genocide and destruction. You said. (Slander.)He said. If that’s the case, I don’t want that to happen. Mira said. I do. I’d get to be super strong and protect you. Miley said. I can protect myself, Miley. Plus, there’s already someone who does that. You said. I can do it better. She said. Oh boy. You said. Your eyes change and you look at her. You want nothing to do with my powers, Miley. You said. Her face goes blank. I want nothing to do with your powers. She said. Now sleep. You said. Miley falls asleep and your eyes change.

You…..can mind control? She said. Yeah. Didn’t want to, but she’d be all over me about it. You said. She can get like that. She said. Mira….. I……owe you an apology for how I acted before. You said. What do you mean? She said. How I kept you at arms length. I wanted to let you in, but….. You said. But what? She said, getting closer. ……I’ve already lost two people I cared about. My best friend. And a brother. Not by blood, but we were close like it. He was a pervert, but I still loved him. We did everything together. Hell, we’ve been in the same hospital room. Then….. One day, he’s killed. On the job. I couldn’t get to him quick enough. I blamed myself. I stopped the people and their plans, but it didn’t bring him back. You were one of the first people to accept me. If I let you in, and something happen to you….. You said.

This is the first time Mira has seen you vulnerable. And show emotion towards her. So you….kept me away…..to protect me? She said. People know they can’t come after me, so they go after people close to me. I already lost two people I cared about. I didn’t want to make it a three or even four. You said. You….care about me? She said. I do. I just didn’t want to show it. Took me in and cared for me. Nobody else did that. You said. Mira puts her arms around you. Mira? You said. She then kiss you. You know how long I’ve waited for you to say that? She said. A long time. You said.


Later that day.

I don’t get it. Why didn’t you want to rule? Luke said. I’m no ruler. Imposing my will onto the masses? This isn’t medieval times. You said. Stronger than me. I’d take over everything and erase Kyle’s name from history. He said. And hold daily blood sport and demand everyone provide you one skull per month. You said. Per day. He said. And they called Kyle a tyrant. You said. As you both talk, you sense something. (You feel that?) He said. (Yeah. An energy source. Faint, but it’s there. Thing is…. I’ve never felt this one. It’s almost ominous as it’s mysterious.) You said. Hey! What are you doing with one of my skulls!? Luke said. Oh, shit. Got to go! Tom said. Good nature hijinks. Don’t kill him. You said. He’ll wish I did! Luke said disappearing. (Let’s go.) You said. You leave the mansion and trace the energy to m district.

Wow. Rebuilding’s look nice. You said. (Think we should use of reputation?) He said. (Prefer to be discrete, but no one will stop us if I just walk in.) You said. You continue on and keep a low profile; even though people knew who you were. (I never get tired of seeing scared faces.) He said. (Draws attention.) You said. You look around and see a clothes store. (Of all the things in this world.) He said. You slip inside and the owner backs against the wall. That how you treat customers? You said. He starts to sweat like crazy. You pick out a shirt that it black and has a red snake with its mouth open, black pants, and boots. You change into them and put money on the counter and walk out. (I think he pissed himself.) He said. You continue to trace the energy until you get to o district. You look around and see a group of women. Some of them have markings on half there body, while others have on black hoods. They’re standing in a black circle with Kyle in the center. What the hell is this? Kyle?You mutter. You quickly hide and listen in.

Is everything ready? One of them said. Ready. Everything is prepared. Another said. Then let’s begin. She said. The group starts chanting. (Should we save him?) He said. (I don’t know. That ominous feeling has skyrocketed. What the hell are they doing?) You said. Are you sure this is going to work? A voice said. T-that voice…. You said. You look to the left and see Kira and Kim. What are they doing here? You said. You pull out your phone and start recording. Positive. Not the first time this ritual has been done. Another voice said. (That voice….) You said. (Miss indecent.) He said. You look back at the circle and see Kyle is gone. Then it starts to glow purple. After a few seconds, you see someone coming out of it. S….Sue!? You said. (Did these girls just bring her back from the dead?) He said. When it was done, Ashley opens her eyes. Ash! Kira said, hugging her. Argh…. My head. Kim? Kira? She said. Who else? Kira said. But… Whose life did you use? Ashley said. The masters. After Kim was done with him. Kira said. Which is why it took so long. Kim said. Wait. The master’s? How did you even get him. It’s a long story. Kira said. You put down your phone.

(What the fuck is going on here?) He said. This….changes everything about her. You said. You duck back into the shadows and head back to the mansion.


You enter and see Tom being bandaged up. Told you he wouldn’t like it. Dante said. Damn….. Didn’t think he’d care that much. Tom said. I take it Luke didn’t like the joke? You said. Outright hated it. Broken every rib. And said that was getting off easy. Tom said. Where is he? You said. Dusting the skull. I don’t think he should be bothered right now. Tom said. Right…. You said. You walk away; still lost for words at what you saw. (What was that? I never believed in black magic, but that looked like it.) You said. (And you saw the other ones. Like Sue, they had markings on half their bodies.) He said. (Sue got onto me about my powers. And here she is part of some secret sect.) You said. (You think her friends are in as well?) He said. (Kira and Kim? No. They were as surprised as me. But Sue’s keeping a secret. One I plan on finding out.) You said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: continue

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
Later that day.

You head into m district. Sue’s never far from this place. You said. (She had a house close to district.) He said. (She’s probably on a tour of to see m district is finally safe. Girl might break out in tears.) You said. (Then have an ulcer from hearing you took over.) He said. (If I recall…. There was only one base that could hold Sue and her friends.) You said. You head to that base. You acquire yourself a uniform of a soldier and sneak in. (I don’t think stealing a uniform’s going to work anymore. Our face was plastered all over tv.) He said. (Sue hasn’t seen it. Just need to stay out of her friends’ eye sight. You said. You head into the base and find them.

You’re kidding me?! Of all the people who could have done this, it had to be him. Ashley said. He did remove the master. Did what we couldn’t do for months. So it’s not all bad. Kim said. I’m more concerned why. He didn’t do it to help us, not out of some kindness, or anything like that. Who knows why. For all we know, he could have taken the title and prop himself up as the new ruler. Trade one tyrant for another. She said. I don’t think being a ruler is for him. Remember, he wanted money from us to kill him. He’s not some despot. Kira said. If that’s the case, then why did he take the mansion? Or left that god-awful prison still standing? Ashley said. The prison has no use to him. We’ve been using it ever since the master was removed. And as for the mansion….. Not like the master needs it anymore. Kim said. So all he’s done is claim the mansion? No thing else? Ashley said. Nothing. He went in there and hasn’t come out. Kim said. Can you blame? That place is like 3 five-star hotels wrapped into one. Kira said. So where do we go from here? If he took money from us, what’s stopping him from taking money again to do the same to us? Ashley said. Nothing. And I doubt we could raise an army against him. No one would want to fight against him after what he did in the arena. Kira said. So where just waiting until someone gives him enough money to lay waste again. Ashley said. (Mass destruction, death, and chaos…. I’d do it for free.) he said. (And make no bottom line, charity case.) You said.

Welll…. What if you and your friends….. Kira said. NO! I’m not asking them for help! I want nothing to do with them ever again! Ashley said. (Trouble in paradise?) You thought. Why not? You told us about your….gift. And you saw the footage of him fighting. Kira said. It’s not…..that simple. Why is that? Kim said. ……What I am and what I can do comes at a heavy cost. I’ve paid for it with my humanity and soul. The things I’ve done, the things I’ve seen….. I don’t want to go back to that. I’d take the master’s tyrannical rule over going back to those people. She said. (Sue isn’t bubby-buddy with those other girls we saw.) You said. (She straight up hates them.) He said. (Still doesn’t help us.) You said.



Then…. What do we do? Kira said. Only thing that left….. Go over there and offer a peace treaty. Kim said. You want us to extend an olive branch? After everything he’s done!? Kira said. What choice do we have? If we fight him, we’re dead. And all we’re doing here is waiting until he comes here to do it. And Ashley doesn’t want to use…..that. Kim said. (They really think someone is going to offer me money to wipe m district off the map.) You said. (You know you would do it for money.) He said. (…….I would.) You said. Ashley…. Kira said. I feel the same way, Kira. And it makes my stomach turn, but we either make the first move. Or he does. Ashley said. (Am I really that hard of a person to like?) You said. (Means we’re doing it right.) he said. You quickly leave and take off guard’s clothes and leave.

Back at the mansion.

You look like you’ve made a discovery. Luke said. I did. Put on your Sunday best. We’re having guests. You said. Guest? You said. Sue and her friends are coming. They think I’m just waiting here for someone to pay me to take them out. You said. Are you? He said. No one has come by to offer me to. Unless you’re willing. You said. At your rates? I’m good. He said. Tell the guys we’re expecting company. You said.

An hour later.

Sir, those people you were expecting have arrived. Dante said. On my way. You said. You walk to the front and see Sue and her friends. And here I was thinking you girls forgot about me. You said. Let’s cut the banter and get to the reason we’re here. Kira said. Back that attitude up, or you’re going to see the moon. You said. Kira. We didn’t come her to let emotions fly. Kim said. ……Fine. She said. Good girl. Now, why are you here? You said. To offer a truce. Ashley said. Really? An olive branch? What brought this along? Scared I might target m district next? You said. You know you will! He’s probably already been paid to do so! Kira said. If I was, would I be here talking to you? And I just might do it if you shout at me again! You said. Kira. Kim said. But he’s…. Fine. Kira said. So you want peace between me and you to ease your paranoia? You said. Concerns…. Kira mutter. So I don’t mass genocide m district and you and your friends and whoever else protects it. You get what you want. What about me? What do I get out of this treaty? You said. Name your terms. Ashley said. You really did skip the first day of negotiating class. You said. Just say- KIRA! Kim said. Rgh… Kira said. (I’m going to have so much fun.) Fine. I won’t harm m district or anyone there. In exchange, I get to move in and around m district. Freely. So no surveillance. Two, stay out of my business. You don’t ask what I’m doing or anything. Don’t interfere with what I’m doing if you see me. You said. Done. Ashley said. (Cave so quickly. Really wants this peace.) Then we have nothing more to discuss. You know the way out. You said. Come on. Ashley said. Her and her friends leave.

You trust them, Sir? Bruce said. Hell no. Tap all their communications. You said. Yes, sir. Let’s go, guys/ Bruce said. Bruce and the guys leave. What about us? Sam said. Wait on the outskirts. Just in case they need a quick exit. You said. Right. Kate said as they left. You two can hold down the fort while I’m gone? And not get on each other’s nerve? You said. I don’t start anything. That’s Em. He said. She rolls her eyes. Right…. Try not to kill each other. You said. You disappear.


You reappear in O district. Where is she? You said. You hear the sound of someone singing. (Singing? Out here?) He said. You follow the sound until you come across Heather. I knew you’d come after me sooner or later. She said. I’ve been busy. You said. That’s right. You dethroned the loathsome wanna be king. We really should celebrate. Just….the two of us. She said. (That ominous feeling is back.) You thought. I’m not here to fraternize with you, Heather. You said. Oh, come now. Stop being so uptight. Live a little. She said, wrapping her arms around you. (Ugh….! Why do I feel so much pressure?!) You said. A cute hero like you needs to be rewarded. She said. You push her off. Enough! What’s the meaning of this!? You said, tossing her your phone. She looks at the recording. There’re people on their wearing the exact same thing as you. And Sue coming out of that circle. What’s this all about? You said. You mean you don’t know? Ashley didn’t tell you? She said. Tell me what? Sue doesn’t tell me anything. She wouldn’t tell me the time of day if I asked her. You said. Not even Luke? She said, surprised. How….do you know Luke? You said. Heh…..hahahaha! Oh, this is going to be fun. I’ll be watching with interest. She said, blowing you a kiss and vanishing into the darkness.

What….the fuck? You said, picking up your phone. (Well…. That was a bust.) He said. (Someone knows something. Heather won’t talk. And Sue sure as fuck won’t tell me anything.) You said. (She mentioned Luke’s name. So he must know something.) He said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: Truce

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
(What are we doing at Sue’s place? I thought we were going to question Luke?) He said. (A back up plan. Just in case Luke won’t talk. Sue’s bound to have something here that reminds her of her past.) You said. You pick the lock and open the door. She could be back at any time. Better hurry. You said. You scour the place and find a box. When you open it, you find a black robe. It’s the same one Heather wears. You said. Under it, you see a note. What the hell is this? These words make no sense. Ba…. Bastilka? Zultra? Cratil? What are these? You said. (Someone who doesn’t English well?) He said. You look around some more and find another note. This I can read at least. You said. “Finally…. I’ve finally left my old life behind. The pain and suffering….. No more. I can start a new life out here. It said. Pain and suffering? What did Sue go through? You thought. (I thought she was a punishment enforcer turned good.) He said. (It must be something. Just listen to the tone of the note. Whatever pain and suffering she went through, it made her want to leave.) You thought. You hear the sound of a door closing. Shit…! You said. You hear Ashley’s footsteps get closer. You pull out your knife and wait. When she steps through the door, you grab her. What the?! She said. You quickly slit her throat and push her away. You quickly pull out your phone to record the marking that form on her arm and travel across half her body. (Done.) You thought. You quickly leave before Ashley sees you.

You stop when you get to a safe distance. There. Concrete proof. No way Luke will deny this. (Now for the hard part.) You thought. (And that is?) He said. (Confronting Luke. And this is only going to end one of two ways.) You said. You head to o district and wait. Now, it’s just a waiting game. You said.

An hour later.

Em, you need to calm down. Luke said. Em looks at Luke worried. I keep telling you to stop babying him. You can’t act like this every time he’s gone. He said. EM looks at Luke serious. You’re doing him no favors being this protective. I’ll find him. Luke said.

Back in o district.

…..I knew you’d come eventually. You said, getting up. You being this far out in o district… What are you doing out here? He said. Collecting stuff…. Like this. You said, throwing your phone to him. Care to explain all that? You said. He watches the videos you’ve recorded and the audio of Heather mentioning your name. …..I see you’ve been busy. He said. How does Heather know you? And what was all that ritual that brought Sue back to life? You said. There’s a lot you don’t know. You’re no where near ready for this. He said. Fighting 4 bitches who stole my powers don’t count? You said. They have nothing on the people in these videos. Ashley alone is more than enough for them. So what is she? What makes her so threatening? You said. Like I said, you’re not ready to know. He said. Then let’s see if I am ready. You said. Are you serious? You think you’re ready to fight me? He said. I know I am. I win, you tell me everything. You said. …..Very well. He said. (Best to hit the ground running.) You thought. You charge and both of your fists clash. You both disappear and clash all over. He blocks your kick and you block his punch. He grabs your arm and throws you at a building. You stop yourself and leap back. He ducks your elbow. You shift your weight to your left leg and spin kick Luke legs out from under him. While in the air, he vanishes. You sense him out and block his attack. You push his arm away and he grabs yours as you punch. He toss you over his shoulder and slams you into the ground with force. When the smoke clears, your gone. Where….? Luke said. He senses you out and blocks your attack from the front. You smile a little. What? He said. He looks behind him and sees you a clone ready to attack. Tch…! He said. He pushes you behind him and your clone hits you into the ground.

After the dust clears, you stand up. A clone. Nice touch. He said. Not a clone. An afterimage. You said. Afterimage? Even better. You almost had me. He said. (I get the feeling he’s just toying with us.) He said. Let’s end the warmup and get to the real stuff. He said. I agree. No holding back. You said. You unleash your power. (So this is his energy when he powers up. It’s higher than I thought it would be.) He said. I’m not done yet….! You said. You power up more. (W…what?! It…. It just keeps climbing!) Luke thought. As you increase your power, your muscles expand. The ground starts to shake violently. (It’s still rising…! There’s no limit to it! Is…. Is this what those girls felt when they fought him?!) Luke said. A bead of sweat runs down Luke’s face. GRRRRRR! Let’s do this! You said. You stop powering up and charge him. Ugh….! Luke said. He dodges your punch. You spin kick him. Luke barely had time to put up his defense as he gets hit and sent through multiple building.

He’s gotten faster. And stronger. Luke said. As he gets up, you appear in front of him. You punch him and he blocks it. You attack him again and he blocks all your attacks. (I…. Can’t believe this….! I’m being overwhelmed…! I was worried about hurting him. But he’s going to do that to me if I don’t retaliate!) He thought. You break through Luke’s defense and send him flying with a punch to the face. You disappear and reappear behind him and he uses the momentum to leap of your leg and behind you. You turn around and block his kick. You ground yourself and are pushed back. When you let your arms down, you see Luke is up close. You dodge his attack and attack back. He intercept your punch with another. You both clash all over the area; destroying buildings and the ground along the way. Both of your fists meet again and the force behind it pushes you both away.

*Huff* *Huff* *Huff* Luke pants. *Huff* *Huff* You pant. I haven’t…..been pushed like this in years. You’ve done what no one has done. He said. Luke stands up. But…. I haven’t lost a fight before…. I don’t plan on starting now! He said. Luke rips off his tattered coat and not only can you feel his power increase, you can see it. A dark purple aura surrounds him. He’s finally getting serious. (Ugh….! I increased my power too much in one go. My body can’t handle this forever. I have to hurry….) You said. You ready yourself as Luke finishes his power up. Now…. Let’s continue. Luke said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: Looking for answers

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
Back at the mansion.

Em was pacing around on edge. She was worried sick about you. She didn’t care that much about the others. Luke was on her mind as well, but her main focus was you. She knew you were out there somewhere, and she doesn’t know what state you’re in. You could be dead for all she knows. She calms herself down. The last thing she wants to do is panic. She would wait, but not for long.

Back in o district.

You’re sent through a building and skid to a halt. You block Luke’s attack and kick him hard enough to send him flying. When he stops himself, you appear behind him and he intercepts your fist. You both push each other off. It’s been too long since I’ve had a real challenge. I’ve forgotten what it felt like to bleed. He said. (He’s enjoying this. Almost as much as I am. My body’s going to give soon from the sudden power rise. Have to end this.) You thought. You charge at him and disappear. Where….? Luke said. You reappear behind him and Luke feels his body being assaulted. Ugh…! He said. You kick him and send him flying into the air. You disappear and reappear and dive down. Before you made contact with him, he vanish and you crash into the ground; making a huge crater on impact. You step out of the crater as Luke reappears in front of you.

I have to say. I’m really enjoying this. Been way to long. He said. Ugh…. You said. Looks like your body is finally catching up. Such a rapid change has its consequences. ….Argh. He said. (Let me take over. I can handle him.) He said. (No. Me and him.) Looks like I’m not the only one feeling those consequences. You said. After all we’ve done to each other, our bodies we’re bound to tell us when soon. So…. How about we end this. He said, pulling back his right fist. Couldn’t agree more. You said, doing the same. You both charge at each other. You both punch each other in the face. Ugh…..! You both said.

You both held that position for a few seconds before you fell back on the ground. Heh…. I….win….. Luke said as he fell down too.

A day later.

Your vision is blurry and your body aches. It takes a minute for your vision to clear up. You see you’re hooked to an IV machine. Where… Am I? You said. You take in your surroundings. I’m…..in the mansion…. How did I get here? You said. (Finally awake.) He said. (Did…..you carry me here?) you said. (No.) He said. (I take it I dropped first. So Luke must have.) You said. (You did, but Luke went down after you did.) He said. (He did? So who brought me here?) You said. (Em did. The look on her face something. She couldn’t run fast enough back here with you both.) He said. (And I guess the guys were the same.) You said. (Right. But Kris was the one who was the most worried out of everyone.) He said. (Kris? Her? Thought she only tolerated me.) You said. (Seems like she had a change of heart. The girl didn’t leave your side for 6 hours straight.) He said. (And I take it Em didn’t like that much.) (Not a bit. She didn’t take kindly to someone else playing guard dog.) He said. You get out of the bed and hold your side. As you do, black markings appear on half your body. What the? You said. All the soreness in your body is gone. You quickly run to a mirror just in time to see the markings vanish. What the? You said.

(Tell me you saw that?) You said. (Saw what?) He said. (The markings. Black ones just appeared on me.) You said. (I didn’t see anything. Everything went dark for a second.) He said. Ok. Now you need answers now more than ever. Luke’s probably out cold. So that only leaves one person left who can tell you anything. You climb up and out the window and head to M district.

(M district? What are we doing here?) He said. (Getting some damn answers. Sue’s going to talk even if I have to destroy this damn place to loosen her lips.) You said. (Wouldn’t that violate the treaty?) He said. (Not on paper. Not official.) You said. You push past multiple people to find her. Sue! You said. Huh? Oh. It’s you. She said. Can the fucking attitude, Sue. You said, growing. What do you want? She said. You’ve got some explain to do. You said. Like what? She said. You toss her your phone with the video loaded. Care to explain that? You said. She watches it and her eyes go wide. And the conversation with Heather? You said. H-Heather!? She said. Yours and Luke’s name where mentioned. Why was that? You said. …..I have nothing to tell you. She said tossing your phone back. Grrr! You said. You grab and headbutt her. Then you kick her knees out from under her and uppercut her in the chin. Ohhh….. Whail on me all you like. I’m not saying a word. She said. That was just to get your attention. You said. You build up energy in your hand. You point it at her. Then at a portion of the city and fire. The ball hits a building and explodes; consuming everything in that area.

You animal!! She said. She gets up, but you knock her back down. How many was that? 5,000? 10,000? You said. You could see the anger on her face. So are you going to talk now? You said. Fuck you!! She said. Vulgar…. You said, throwing another energy ball into the city. The explosion is 2x as bigger than the last one. You’re suppose to be their protector, Sue. The one they can count on. And yet, here you are. Watching as they die. Screaming. Wondering where is there guardian? On her knees watching them die. You said. You….!!! YOU!!!! She said through gritted teeth. She gets up to punch you, but you grab her fist and headbutt her back down. M district dies because of you. You said, building up energy. You see markings appear on her arm and her eyes start to glow a bright purple. Hmph. You said. You blast her and she swats the beam into the air. I’m going to rip you apart!!! She said. Let’s see what the protector of m district can do. You said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: continue

1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.content:
Back at the mansion.

I said I’m fine. Luke said. Em looks at Luke with a little worry. It’s not the first fight I’ve been in and got hurt. Just check in and make sure he’s ok. Luke said. Em nods with a smile. And don’t start with Kris again. If she’s there, then she’s just as worried as you. He said. Em’s smile turns annoyed as she left. That demon’s going to be the death of me. He said.

……I know you’re there, Orex. Stealth isn’t your strong suit. He said. In a puff of smoke, a tall, muscular built guy in a black, open duster and black boots and pants with a black hat appears out of the smoke.

For someone dressed in all black, sneaking isn’t your thing. Luke said. ……You almost lost to him. He said in a gruff voice. I wasn’t in no real danger. I was having fun. Been a long time since I had a real challenge. He said. Your fun put the others on edge. You rarely get serious like that, and to get there against an outsider has the others a little shaken. He said. I was indulging him and myself. I might have gotten a little carried away, but I wasn’t in any real danger. Luke said. Your body says different. Soreness, bruises cuts. He said. Point of a fight. He said. If he was our quarry, you wouldn’t dare let him injure you like that. He said. But he’s not. He’s one of us. Luke said. You told him? Orex said with surprised. No. He’s not ready to know yet. Which is would explain why he’s been so active. Luke said. Does he know who his parents are? Or what he has? Orex said. He’s starting to get wise to it. But he doesn’t know anything. Luke said. You think Heather might tell him? Orex said. Heather won’t tell. She’s more likely to do what I did. When he’s strong enough, I’ll tell him everything. Luke said.

Back in m district.

You punch Ashley from behind and shove her face into the ground. This all ends if you tell me what I want to know. You said. The only thing I’ll tell you is how slow or quick you will die!! She said. (A complete 360 from how she usually acts.) He said. This is all on you, Sue. You said. You put your arm around her neck and hold her an you shoot multiple energy balls into the city. NO!!!! She said as multiple explosions happen across the city. All those lives, Sue. All of them you swore to protect. Ended in a blink. Your precious little city burns as you watch. You said. RGHHHH!!! I’LL KILL YOU!!! She said. (Mad as hell. And you didn’t want me on the loose.) He said. She headbutts you, making you lose your grip on her. While you stagger, she punches you in the gut. You catch her fist while bent over and uppercut her. You punch her again and tackle her to the ground. You can end all of this, Sue. You said. It’ll end when I kill you!! I’m going to wear your bones as jewelry! And trap your soul in a locket and wear it around my neck! She said. (That’s some voodoo mystic shit. Hell, I just grind the bones to dust and make a suit out of what’s left.) He said. You fire off more energy balls into the city. So much destruction and death, Sue. You said. (All before lunch.) He said. ARGHHHH! She screams. You see the markings on her body start to appear all over her. (That can’t be good….) You thought. She pushes you off her and is immediately in front of you ready to strike. You catch her fists and she kicks you in the gut. Ugh….! You said. The force of the kick broke at least two ribs. She kicks you back and pulls her arm back. Shit…. You said. You dodge her punch just in time, yet the wind behind it left a cut on your side. You take her legs out and as she falls, she disappears. You look around and see her in the air and she comes crashing down.

You manage to move out the way just in time. She’s just being reckless now. You said. You wait for the smoke to die down, but she appears right in front of you and punches you through the chest. Ack! You said. DIE!! She said. You catch her other fist and put your other hand right to her gut and blast her. When you stop, you see her a few feet away; surrounded in a purple bubble. The hole in your chest closes up. RGH! I’ll stop that regeneration of yours!! She said. You ready yourself when Susan appear and place her hand on Ashley’s forehead. Aubaza. She said. Ugh….! Oh…. Ashley said as her markings disappear and her eyes stop glowing. She hits the ground with a thud as she passes out. She picks her up and disappears.

(Well, Ms. No clothes saved us.) He said. (But what did she do? You heard what she said? Aubaza? Sue just stopped fighting and collapsed.) You said. (So I guess we can scratch Sue off the list.) He said. (She wasn’t going to talk anyway, but had to try. Shit…..) You said. Looking around at the destruction, you shrink back down and head back to the mansion.


Back at the mansion.

You open the door and are immediately picked up and hugged. Ugh…. Nice…to see you too, Em. You said. EM!!! Luke shouts. Uh-oh…. You said. Em ignores Luke and hugs you tighter. Em…. I still need to breathe….. You said. Hearing you, Em loosens her hold on you. Thanks…. You said. Put him down! Luke said. Em nuzzles you for a second before putting you down.

You look like shit. Luke said. Not easy out there. Everyone wants a piece of you. You said. You look…..sadden. Luke said. Em perks up when she heard that. I said sadden, not hurt. Luke said. I’m fine. Sue’s just gave me the run around. Calm Em down. She’ll listen to you. You said. I’ve been meaning to do that. Luke said. Em just rolls her eyes.


A few hours later on the roof.

Did not see this coming. Not any of it. You said. Come on. You can’t be prepared for everything. Tell me we’d be fighting giantesses and a despot, I’d call you crazy. Your dark half said. I guess…. But I feel better when I am. Still a detective deep down. You said. I’d say our new position is better. Can’t get a mansion like this on a detective salary. He said. Still have upkeep. I don’t think a detective will do well here. You said. So back to mercenary work? He said. I prefer bounty hunter, but it’s all the same. Pays more too. You said. You look out at the m district. ……We still got a lot to do. People to kill. And….. You said. Hey, you know what happened wasn’t your fault. He said. But it happened. And I still don’t know anything. You said. Well…. You remember what Sinclair said? About those eyes of yours? He said. You mean when my eyes change? You said. Yeah. He said they could see into the future. So maybe they will give you the answers you need. He said. …..The thing about looking into the future is that it changes every time you look. I could make things worse. You said. Or better. He said. I don’t like that kind of power. And yet….. Sitting here wondering isn’t helping. And no one is telling me either. You said. So….? He said. You think for a moment before your eyes change. When they do, you are shocked.

After a minute, they change back. Find what you where looking for? He said. ……Yeah. And that’s the worse part. You said. Time will tell. He said. …..I guess so. In the meantime, get ready. We have a lot to do and accomplish. And people counting on us. You said. Don’t forget people to kill. He said, going back inside you. Yeah…. Let’s leave our mark on this world. You said.
1111111111111111111111111111111211111111.title: Seeing the truth

12.content:
