Every person has story. Whether it be about greatness, vengeance, courage, or whatever. This is the story of the man people came to know as Devil Dog. A notorious mercenary and witch hunter who wasn’t liked by people. This is his story. Luke said.



O district witches building. In the holding cells with dad giving worship to the witches.

There’s got to be a way out of here. There’s always a way. You said. You look over your shoulder to see your dad doing his daily ritual of worshipping the witches. The grizzled old man never had an ounce of dignity or self-respect. Now you know why grandpa escaped. Dad, get off your damn knees. Have some dignity. You said. I must do this every day to show my gratitude to the divine witches. He said. How can you even do that? They don’t even treat us right. Matthew was brutally ripped apart limb from limb and they didn’t even let him die. They brought him right back. You said. That’s the glory of our benevolent masters. They won’t let us die. He said. Now I see why grandad left you behind when he left. You said. Grandpa was a fool! All he wanted to do was get out. He didn’t see the benevolence of our masters. Dad said. He saw how brainwashed you were and how evil those bitches are. The only time you put up a fight was when grandpa tried to take me and you wouldn’t let him. You said. I did so he wouldn’t fill your head with lies. The witches aren’t evil like he said they are. He said. Yeah, keep telling yourself that. You said.

You wait around a few hours until you see your buddy luke. Neither of you have that much love for the witches. Luke was a troublemaker who gives the witches daily headaches. Luke. What are you doing out? You said. Ah, looking to see if I can start some trouble. You want in? He said. Better than being with dad here. You know how to break the seal? You said. This low level magical lock? Easy. He said. You hear luke mutter some chants and the lock disappears and the door opens. Let’s go before Bertha checks in. He said. Yeah. Don’t want to be hers for a minute. You said. The masters won’t approve of this. Dad said. Yeah, yeah. Go back to your daily worship. You said. You and luke head to the main interior. Ok. Time for a little hijinks. You ready? He said. Just don’t go overboard with witchcraft. You know what that stuff does to non-witches. You said. I know. Just be ready. He said. You take up a position next to the stairs. After a few seconds, you can hear the ground shaking footsteps get closer. You look and see its Viola. A known hot head who disregards the slaves as playthings or dirt. She’s in her usually slightly revealing witch clothing. She steps near you with her boot. Now! You said. When she takes her first step on the stairs, luke says a few witchcraft words and the stairs turns to a slide and Viola slides all the way down to the ground hits the wall. You and luke start laughing until Viola sets her sights on you both. You insects! She shouts. Uh-oh. Split up? Luke said. Yeah. You said. You head right while luke head left. When I catch you both, you’ll beg for death! Viola shouts. You ran a good distance and come to a stop. I don’t hear Viola’s mammoth sized stomps behind me. I must be in the clear. You said. You get a good look at your surrounding and see you’re in a different section of the building. You don’t know anything about this part. Where the hell am i? You said. You walk around to learn about your new surroundings. Hmmm. Seems like I’m well out of the zone I should be. You said. As you walk, you feel your body being constricted. What the hell?! You said. Then you are lifted in the air and land on something soft. Well, what is this? A voice said. This isn’t going to end well. You said. When you get a good look at your captor? She has long, burnette hair, black eyes, and marking on the left half of her body, and is wearing a hoodi. When she’s done eyeing you, you don’t feel constricted anymore. Are you ok? She asked. You stonewalled her when she asked. When she sees that you aren’t talking, she moves her index finger to you. You brace to be hurt, but instead, she’s stroking your back to comfort you. There? Feeling better? She said. I…..i……I do. You said. You see a smile spread across her face. See? That wasn’t so bad. She said. You’re at a loss for words. A witch just comforted you. A witch! Not a single witch you’ve seen has ever been comforted any man before. By that shocked look, I can tell you never been shown any kindness by a witch. She said. ……No. I haven’t. You said. Well, let’s start off with the basics. I’m Leah. She said. …..My name is……Alex. You said. Ok. Good. Off to a good start. She said. …..It’s not that I can’t talk. It’s just that I’m talking to a witch. You said. Oh, I see what’s the problem is. I don’t expect you to believe me yet, but I’m not like my sadistic sisters. She said. Sadistic isn’t a big enough word. You said. I know. My sisters have a cruel tendency. She said. ……How can you call any of them sisters? You said. It’s a bond that is tight. When born into witchhood, you accept a bond with your sisters. She said. …….You sound proud of it. You said. I didn’t get to choose who I was born to or what I was born into. I had a lot of standards to live up to. She said. Standards? I didn’t know witches had them. You said. We’re not born powerful beings. Day in and day out of practicing witchcraft. She said. ……But from those markings on your arm, you’re a siren. The most powerful kind of witch. It should be easy for you. You said. It was actually. It’s what the expectation of what I had to do. I HAD to powerful! I HAD to know magic! I HAD to be mean and cruel just to be recognized by my sisters! You can see you’ve upset her. Any other time, you’d disregard it. But with Leah……you feel a little sorry for upsetting her. So you set out to make her feel better. ….Hey. I, uh…..didn’t mean to make you feel bad. I just assumed you were like the rest. You said. It’s fine….. If I sounded mad, I didn’t mean it. She said. …..Look, uh, I have nobody for today. If you want to…….i’ll be yours for the entire time. You said. Well….. I wasn’t expecting my turn for a while, but if you’re insisting. She said. You don’t know if you’d just signed your death warrant or not. You’re really hoping Leah is nice as she says she is.
12.title: The man himself

121.content:
When Leah gets to her room, you see it’s not what you expected. It’s just like a normal teenage girls room, except leah’s walls are tinted pink. Not what you were expecting, huh? Leah said. …..Not at all. You said. As leah removes her hoodie, you see she’s just wearing casual clothes. After she gets comfortable, you wonder what she wants you to do. Alright…… Let’s get this over with. What do you want me to do first? You said. Nothing. She said. Nothing? You said. Yeah. I’m not going to tell you to do some demining task. To get some cheap, sick thrill out of it? I don’t think so. She said. So if you’re not going to make me do some demining shit, what are you going to do? You said. Nothing. I said I’m not cruel like my sisters. She said. Leah sits you down on her bed and sits by you. How do you put up with them? You’re nothing like them from what I’ve seen so far. You said. Even though I don’t agree with my sisters on everything, they are somewhat of a family to me. She said. You don’t have know any regular people? You said. I do, but they don’t know I’m a witch. They think these marking are tattoos. She said. You can see she’s quiet after saying that. You know that witches can live for hundreds even thousands of years. Who knows how many friends Leah has lost to time. Have you ever told anyone? You said. Only one person. Apparently, he heard the myths and stories about how cruel we are. I never saw him again after I told them. He thought I was no different, yet I never was mean or cruel to him. She said. You can see she’s sad about reminiscing. Even though she’s nice, she’s been defined bad just because of her horrible sisters. (Great job, Alex. Now I’ve gone and made it even worse. I better do something to fix this. This will be the first time I do this willingly.) You thought. You jump down and land on the ground. You make your way to her feet and see she’s painted her toes with an aqua blue color. You start to rub her heel. Leah had felt something rubbing her foot. It wasn’t something irritating, but was something gentle. She felt her problems and sorrows all going away as she started to relax. You hear a Leah let out a moan of delight, which tells you that you’re making her feel better.

After a 10 minute massage on both of her feet, you look to see a smile on her face. (Never thought I’d want to see a witch smile for once.) You thought. If you’re plan was to make me feel better, it worked. Leah said. I do what I can. You said. You aren’t tired or anything? You said. I’ve been doing this and other crap for years. You said. It shows. You knew what you were doing. She said. You are suddenly lifted into the air and land in Leah’s open hand. I think a reward is in order. She said. Leah kisses you right on the forehead. I…..uh….wasn’t expecting that. You said. Leah holds out her hand and the marks start to glow. Then it stops after a few seconds. Here. She said. Leah gives you a purple yang symbol. When you take it, it lodges itself on your left hand. I give those to the men under my care. She said. Everyone gets one? You said. Well, yours is a little more special. I imbedded a little bit of my magic into it. Just in case you get into trouble. She said. That seems like special treatment. You said. Well….you are cuter than most men I’ve seen. Leah said while blushing. ……Cuter than most? I.... I….. I don’t know what to say. You said. You and Leah are blushing just from the friendly exchange of words. ……How about you…..stay here……with me for a while? She said. I’d…..like that. You said. With staying with Leah, the time just ticks away. Everything bad just goes away while with Leah.

3 months later. Back in your cell with dad.

That’s it. I’m getting out of here! You said. There’s no escaping our benevolent masters. Dad said. Dad, get a grip! Have you been blind these last few months?! When I came back from Viola and had bruises and scars all over, you said it was generous. How? You said. You’re alive, aren’t you? Our masters won’t let us die. He said. You know what, dad? I’m done trying to convince you of them. Live in your fantasy world if you want, but you’re going to live in it without me. You said. Since Viola was the last one who had you, she forgot to put the spell lock on. All you do is push open the door and walk out. The outside world is a harsh one! You won’t last without our masters protection! Dad said before you leave the holding area. You head over to where luke is being held. Luke? You in there? We’re getting of here. You said. Finally had enough? He said. Something is off with luke. The way he said that was like he waiting for you to finally decide. Yeah. We’re getting out of this hellhole. You said. Then what are we waiting for? He said. Luke grabs the bars and easily bend them. Luke….. You said. Come on. Luke said. Since the witches don’t go looking for escaped men, getting to the front door was easy. Shit. There’s no way to open that heavy door. You said. Stand aside. Luke said. Luke puts one hand on the door and open it with ease. (What the hell has happened to luke?) You thought. You were stunned that luke easily pushed the door open. You coming? He said. ….Yeah. You said. You and luke step outside for the first time. So this is what o district looks like. It’s a wreck. You said. Let’s go. M district is waiting for us. He said. ……Yeah. I might not be all sunshine out here, but I’d take hard living over slavery any day. You said. You and luke head to M district, leaving behind the witches and never going back.

Ok. We’re here. Luke said. Finally. That was a long walk. You said. And we’re in luck. It’s still day time. Luke said. Why is that considered luck? You said. The giant preteens don’t attack m district that much during the day. Most of them only come at night. He said. Are they always preteen? You said. The occasional teens and adults, but most of them are preteen. He said. So what do we do now that we’re free? You said. Anything. Live how you want to live. He said. I’ve got nothing to my name. No house, no money, nothing. I might as well join the army. You said. Well at least it builds structure. I don’t take well with authoritative people. He said. So what are you going to do? You said. Like I said, anything. He said. Well….. Get busy living or get busy dying, I guess. You said.
121.title: Escape

1211.content:
2 years later.

Man, I’ve been in this army for two years and only been seen one preteen attack. You said. Count yourself lucky. I’ve lost many close friends to those preteens. A soldier said. It’s just that as dangerous as most men make them, you think they’d be more frequent. You said. It’s all about timing. Just be glad you lived though one of their attacks. They aren’t known for sparing us. Another solider said. This might sound stupid, but is there a chance we’ve manage to kill one? You said. Not even close. Bullets bounce and missile just tickle them. A soldier said. Well, there was a rumor that was floating around last week that we got lucky and did do one in. Another soldier said. Anything to raise morale, I guess… Come on. We’re still on the clock. You said. I don’t see the reason for looking for survivors of this attack on this part of M district. Those giant bitches never leave anyone alive, and if they do, they enslave them. A soldier said. There could be. That’s how we found Alex here. An angel or someone was looking out for him. Another soldier said. You and the other three soldiers look through the carnage of the attack. Shit. Crushed cars, bodies, bloodstains, and destroyed buildings. Yeah. This was the work of preteens. You said. Damnit. They just keep coming. At this rate, they’ll be at our front door in no time. A soldier said. As you all continue to search, you hear a rumbling. Is that someone’s stomach? You said. The three soldiers nod their heads. Then the ground starts to shake. Oh boy! A soldier said. The ground starts to shake more violently until you hear a monstrous roar. Damn. What do they prove by doing that!? You said. As you all look around for her, she right in front of you. Holy….shit! Preteen! A soldier said. She has red hair that’s in a ponytail, wearing some kind of weird black clothing, and has red eyes. You see she’s on her knees and look down right at you all.

Ohhhh. I knew coming back would be worth it! She said. Worth it? So you did all this?! A soldier shouts. Sure did! All by myself! She said. What do you get out of doing this, huh?! What do you get out of making us suffer!? Another soldier shouts. Knowing that you can’t do nothing to stop me! That’s what I get out of it. Watch. She said. The girl places her index finger on you. You struggle to get her finger off you. See? I’m not even pressing down on him. I’m just resting my finger on him and he can’t get it off! She said. She then lifts her finger off you. Brat….. You said. So why don’t all of you do the sensible thing and just surrender? She said. No way! I know what happens to captured men! It ain’t happening! A soldier said. He starts to fire his weapon, but the bullets don’t penetrate her skin. Seems like you’ve made up your mind. She said. The girl’s giant hand looms over the soldier and she slams it down on him. Mike! Another soldier said. You bitch! The other soldier said. Both of them shoot at her face, but it doesn’t even faze her. She grabs both of them and proceeds to crush them in her hand. She then wipes the bloodstains off on her clothes. (The way she just killed all three of them. Nothing to any girl, but they would laugh as they do it. She kept a calm face while doing it.) You thought. You just sat there and watched as I killed them. Does that mean you’re smarter than they were? She said before she looms her giant hand over you. Or do you want to join them as stains? She said. (This brat’s a witch. A regular girl would tease then threaten. She’s just up and threatened me.) You thought. Well? She said impatient. (I’m not going back to that insane place, but I’m not dying today!) You thought. Just before she could do anything, she’s suddenly hit right in the face and comes toppling down onto the ground. Making friends with the locals? A familiar voice said. Luke? You said. It’s been a long time, Alex. Luke said.

You haven’t change in two years. I see the witchcraft is treating you well. You just knock this brat out cold. You said. I was going for decapitation since she was a small witch. He said. It seems like I’m plagued to be haunted by these witches forever. You said. Escaping is one thing, it’s staying away that’s the tough part. Luke said. It is. We didn’t get childhoods, luke. They bred us to serve them. You said. They do. I still hear the laughs of them. Luke said. What right do they have to just do that? You said. You sound like you want revenge. Luke said. I’d be lying if I said I didn’t. I want every single one to pay. You said. You’re talking about going up against powerful, magical beings. If revenge is what you want, then you’re going to need an edge. He said. Like what? You said. Magic can only be stop by magic. If you want revenge on them, then you’re going to have to do what I did. He said. You mean…..take the book that has all witch spells? You said. Precisely. Luke said. Breaking out was one thing, but breaking in? You said. We have our ticket right here. Luke said. She’s not just going to help us willingly. We don’t need willingly. Over the past two years, I’ve been experimenting with a few high level witch spells and mastered a hypnosis spell that will get us in. Luke said. Luke, do you know what high level spells will do to non-witches? You said. I know. I’ve seen it happen right in front of me. Luke said. ……If it can get us in, than do it. You said. Excellent. Luke said. Luke walks to the girl’s ear and says the hypnosis spell. The girls eyes shoot open and are now a glowing yellow. When she looks around and sees luke she kneels before him. Master, what do you command of me? She said. Luke? Master? I don’t like those words in the same sentence. You said. I do. It’s about time someone finally realized that. Luke said. Gets a witch under his control and now he thinks he’s hot shit. You mutter. Come on. We got a ride there. Luke said.


A few minutes later.

You and luke are sitting on the young witch’s shoulder. This sure as hell beats walking. You said. The only way to travel. Luke said. A few minutes later, the girl comes to a stop. Why did she stop? You said. We’re here. She said. Just then, a building appeared out of thin air. The building was invisible?! You said. Yeah. That way, no prying eyes will find it. Luke said. The witch heads inside the building. Ok. We’re in. What now? You said. The book should be in one of the witch masters possession. Luke said. So how do I get it off them? You said. It won’t be on them. It will be on a pedestal. He said. Any traps I need to worry about? You said. Not at your current size. Oh, and when you find it, look for the growth spell. It will make stealing the book easier. Luke said. Growth spell? Ugh. Just what these bitches need. You said. You are placed on the ground and start looking. I only know a few witch masters, but I know there’s more. You said. You move around until you find one if the master’s rooms. The smell of incents. This is the place. It shouldn’t be hard to find a pedestal. You said. You look to your right and see a pedestal, but when you climb it, the book isn’t there. Damn. Then this one doesn’t have it. You said. You climb back down and look for the next one. While looking, you came across the holding cells and see your father. Oh, Dad. You said. Well…..look at this. Come crawling back? He said. I didn’t come back to be a blind servant like you, dad. I came here for a different reason. You said. Then why……you said you were never coming back, yet here you are. He said. When you get a good look at him, you can tell he’s starting to wither up. Seems like the witches spell is under way. They’re going to slowly turn you to bones. You said. It’ll be an honor. He said. (Blind man….. I should just leave him. If he wants to die for them, fine. But he is my only father…..) You thought. Look, dad. We never saw eye to eye on this witch stuff, but there’s a lot to life we’ve missed out. You said. What kind of life is that without our masters? He said. Freedom, dad. Freedom. Where you can dictate whatever you want. I’m going to do the same thing grandpa did. I’ll unlock your cell lock, but you decide if you want to leave. Just know that there is a life beyond serving these bitches. You said. You say the enchantment and the lock pops off. I hope to see you again dad. You said before leaving.
1211.title: Living....mostly

12111.content:
Where is that damn book? There aren’t that many head witches hear. You said. As you explore the halls, you’re hoping this is the last time you do this. You know how dangerous these halls are. Men who walked them are not the same after they do. You come across another head witch quarters. Ok. Same plan as las time. You said. You find the pedestal and climb it, but don’t see the book. Damn! Another dead end. If the first head witch doesn’t have it and the second one doesn’t, then who has it? You said. Quite the mystery. Luke said. Luke? Where’d you come from? You said. From thin air. He said. Oh. More witchcraft. I can’t find that book. There are only two head witches here and neither of them has it. You said. Maybe one of the regular witches have it. Luke said. That could take forever. You said. No it won’t. Thanks to some information i....obtained through some peaceful means. Luke said. Yeah. Peaceful. You shock down and threatened Dave when he stole your money. You said. Oh! You know me so well. Anyway. Turns out, neither of the masters have it. A witch named Leah does. Luke said. Leah? You said. Yeah. Apparently, she’s the best witch in generations. Learned summoning at the ripe age of 90. Luke said. 90? In witch years that’s…..toddler, right? You said. Yeah. It usually takes longer to learn it, but she learned it at that small age. Luke said. If she learned to summoned demons and monsters at a toddler’s age, who knows what else she knows? You said. All the more reason. Find where she lays her head and take that book from her. Luke said. I know where she is. You said. You climb back down and head out.

As you go down the hall, you wander which way to go. Damn. Where is she? You said. Then you see a door on the right is open. When you peek in, you see it’s Leah’s room. When you look around, you see Leah is asleep on her bed. Oh boy. This just got worse. You said. You start climbing up places and start looking around and find it on her dresser mirror. Ok. Here it is! You said. To your luck, it was already open. Ok. Growth spell. Growth spell. It better be in this big, black book. Here it is. I hope I can say these words. You said. Before you could say the spell, you hear something. You stop dead in your tracks. You look to see it’s only Leah tuning over on her side. I need to get out of here. But first that spell. You said. You find it again and say the spell. Giga gardum giantism. You said. You suddenly feel your body expanding. Those better be the right words! You said. You jump down to the ground. After a two minute wait, you suddenly expand to the same height as women. So this is what it’s like. I hope there are no side effects. You said. You look over at Leah as she sleeps peacefully. She won’t be an easy one, but I’ll be ready. You said. You grab the book and run outside.

You head to a safe spot in o district. That was somewhat easy. I wonder if there is a shrink spell. You said. To your surprise, there is. Hmmm. Simi status. You said. You start to shrink back down. That was an easy spell to say. You said. I see you have the book. Luke said. Again with the coming out of thin air? You said. Yes. Beats walking. So. How are you going to do this? Luke said. The witches aren’t dumb. If I kill one, they’ll know I stole their book and come down like lightning. No. I need a cover. You said. Something to fool them? Luke said. Yeah. Something they wouldn’t bat an eye at or look into. I know. A mercenary. You said. Like a bounty hunter? Luke said. Yeah. They always get there targets. You said. But that’s a lonely life. You’ll be hated by everyone. Luke said. I know, but it’s the perfect cover. Like you said, we can live how we want. This is the life I’m going to live. You said. *sigh* The one time my words are used against me. Luke said. Luke. I know you care about me, but I’m doing this. You said. …..Then you’ll need a new name. He said. A new one? You said. If you go around with your regular name, the witches will know it’s you. You need a new one. He said. How about…..Devil Dog? You said. I like it. Strikes fear into people. Make it a name people remember. He said. But….i don’t know the first thing about being a mercenary. You said. Just do cruel, mean, unethical things for people who will pay you. The attitude will come on its own. Luke said. Ok. Then who do I go after? You said. M district. Look for someone who’s desperate and willing. Luke said. Ok….. I guess this is my new life as Devil Dog. You said.

You head out and reach m district. (Ok. Just find someone desperate and willing.) You thought. You look around and see a guy is looking angry. You look like a guy with a problem. You said. I am. I need someone who has nothing to lose for something dangerous. He said. How dangerous? You said. Killing a woman. He said. I’m listening…. You said. Recently, a mother and her daughter came through here and laid waste to us. Just a regular day in m district until you come to find out your own son is dead. I want that mother to know what it’s like to feel the loss of her own. He said. You want me to kill her daughter? You said. Right in front of her! I’ll give you all the money I’m carrying right now if you can pull this off! He said. ……Done. You said. Really?! Thanks! They live in F district. He said. How will I tell if it’s them? You said. The daughter has pink highlights in her hair. Here take this. He said. He hands you a boot knife. From my time in the army. That on top of all my money. Make her death as brutal as possible. He said. Ok. You said. You head out for F district. If I head there on foot, I won’t last. Maybe something in this witch book will help me get to a rooftop. You said.

When you get to f district, you remain low and out of sight. I’m in the dragon’s den. If they even catch a whiff of me, I’m a goner. Where is that spell? You said. You look through the book and find the one you’re looking for. Here it is. Let’s see….. Teleptis. You said. You suddenly appear on the rooftop you were looking for. I think you and me will be the best of friends. You said. You look around and spot your targets. Here they are. Brat can’t be no older than 13. Mother looks to be in her mid-30s. Ok. Time to go to work. Teleptis. You said. You teleported right over to their building. You slip right under the door and make it inside. Huh. Fancy living here. Let’s paint these walls red! Whoa. Where’d that come from? Anyway. Better even the odds here. Giga gardum giantism. You said. You quickly grow to 100ft. You go looking of the mother. Just when you’re about to pass a door, it suddenly opens. Acting on pure instinct, you immediately grab the mother and force her to the ground before she could act. You found some heavy string and tie her arms together. Stay here. You said. You quickly find the daughter and do the same to her. With both of them tied up, you sit them together in the middle of the living room.

Rgh! I don’t know who you are, but you will regret this! The mother said. If I were you, I’d zip it before this situation got worse. You said. Mommy? The daughter said terrified. It’s alright honey, everything will be alright. The mother said. No. It won’t. A certain person sends his regards. Come here, brat! You said. You grab the girl roughly by her hair. No. No! You stay away from my daughter! She said. Mommy! The daughter shouted. Watch closely. You said. You pull out the knife and slit the young girls throat. NO! The mother shouts. You toss the lifeless body to the floor. The mother’s expression goes from sadness to anger. I swear…… I promise you…..I WILL find out who made you as tall as women. And when I’m done with them, YOU’RE NEXT!! I WILL KILL YOU!!! She said. Save it for someone who’s scared of your ass. Because I’m not. You said. You will be….. I’ll make sure the last emotion you experience is fear! She said. Blow it out your ass. You said before leaving. With it being dark already, it will be easy to get back to m district. You make your way back to m district and say the spell that shrinks you back down.

When you get there, you find the guy pacing back and forth in the street. The daughter is dead. You said. Really?! Thank you! Maybe my son can finally sleep easily now. Here. Just as I promised. He said. He hands you 100 dollars. 100 dollars? Just like that? A guy could get use to this. You said.
12111.title: The start of Devil Dog

121111.content:
So how was your first job? Luke said. It was…..amazing! I slit that brat’s throat like a hot knife through butter! You said. (His attitude is changing. One of the effects of being exposed to witch magic.) Luke thought. And look! I got 100 dollars easy. Just imagine what I could get for killing someone important! You said. Slow down there. You only did one contract. Luke said. More will come. You said. As you and luke continue talking, a random guy approaches you. I hear you can get things done. He said. That’s right. You said. Well how’d you like to make a small fortune? He said. Depends on how much? You said. 500 dollars. All you have to do is kill someone for me. He said. Who am I killing? You said. This guy in the army. He’s scum. He goes around harassing people. Our life expectancy is already short. It doesn’t need to be difficult. He said. Where can I find the bastard? You said. Around this time, he’s usually giving people shit right about now. Show him that we already have enough problems. He said. Gladly. You said. He’s not far from here. Just listen for him. He said. I’ll be right back. You said. You head out looking for him.

As you walk the streets, you can hear someone arguing. That must be him. You said. You follow the voice until you see a guy in military uniform giving another guy shit. That’s him. You said. As you approach him, you pull out your knife. Before he even acknowledged you, you stab him two times in heart and he drops dead. Can’t say I’ll shed a tear for this guy. The other man said. Life’s already difficult. He was just making it worse. You said. You’re becoming quite the killer, Devil Dog. Luke said. Comes with the territory. You said. Quite. Here. Just as I promised. The man said. He hands you 500 dollars. Nice. You said. I’m sure we’ll do business again soon. Devil dog. The man said before leaving. My name will spread like wildfire! You said. Yeah. Before you get an ego, I have something to tell you. I found a witch. Luke said. A witch? Where? You said. She’s in o district. Can’t tell what she’s doing there. I hoe you’ve been practicing with that book. Luke said. The only way to kill a magical being is with magic. You said. Well, yeah, but there are other ways. Luke said. Like dropping a house on her? You said. No, that’s fairytale you tell children. You can kill her with magic or you could either rip her heart out or burn her to death. Luke said. Rip her heart out? You said. Yeah. Anything less than those three won’t kill a witch. Luke said. Easier said than done, but I guess I have to start somewhere. You said. You head for o district.

When you get to o district, you spot a woman looking through some destroyed buildings. (What could she be searching for?) You said. When you get closer, you get a better look at her. I don’t see any marking, so she’s not a siren. That’s good. You said. You pull out the book. Ok. Which spell to use? This one sounds good. Icic bella spikies. You said. Suddenly, ice spikes appear and shoot into her back. Ouch! She said. With a simple wave of her hand, the spikes are removed. She moves her head side by side to see who attacked her, but all she sees is a man just standing there. You get a really good look at her. She has red hair and eyes, wearing what looks like a dark black jumpsuit, and D breast. You also see what look like guns holstered on her hip. Oh. Just a shrimp. Hmm. We’re not allowed to, but nobody is here so…. She said. You’re wondering what she’s talking about until she quickly press down on you with her index finger. Unlike the last one, she was trying to kill you. You were expecting your body to give out, but instead, you’re just in complete pain. When she finally pays you attention, she sees you haven’t exploded into a gory mess on her finger. Huh? You should be dead. She said. After a few more minutes of being pinned under her finger, she finally lifts it off you. She then grabs you and starts looking you over.

You’re a tough one, aren’t you? She said as she poked and prodded you. (If she wasn’t a witch, this situation would be nice.) You thought. She then rubs her thumb all over you. (Really. Now is not the time for my imagination to run wild.) You thought. I don’t see or feel any magic in you. Maybe I wasn’t pressing hard enough. She said. (I’ll be a smear on the ground or her hand if I up and fight her. I need to be smart about this.) You thought. Hmm, what kept you from popping like a zit? She said. Maybe I was just lucky? You said. I wouldn’t call it lucky. Maybe I should just squeeze the life out of you. She said. She starts to squeeze you in her hand, but she stops after a few seconds. But I don’t want to wipe the blood off on my clothes. She said. Perhaps you could let me go? You said. Yeah, no. She said. Worth a try….. You said. While she ponders what to do with you, you quickly open the book. (Got to find a fire spell! There’s one!) You thought. Pyrus val. You said. After you said the spell, the woman catches on fire. AHHHHHHHH! She said. You manage to jump down onto the ground before you were caught in the flames. You watch as the woman is burnt to ashes. She burnt nicely. You said. You see her two guns fall to the ground. Ah. Those will be a nice trophy. You said. You say the growth spell and pick up the guns. I like this shiny black color. You said. You say the shrink spell and head back to m district.

Hey luke. Look at my new toys! You said. You show luke rhe guns you found. Those….you actually did it. Luke said surprised. I didn’t fight head on. She was distracted about how I didn’t die when she tried to crush me with her finger. All I said was a fire spell and she lit up like a charismas tree. You said. The guns you now have only belong to an Umbran variant. Luke said. Umbran? You said. Yeah. They aren’t easy to kill since they can temporarily stop time. Luke said. Well, she didn’t stop time. These will come in handy. You said. The bullets these things shoot are deadly. A normal person would only survive one shot from these things. Luke said. If that’s so, then my business will flourish. You said. You’ve only gained a small amount notoriety, all right? And you’ve only killed one witch. There are plenty more out there. Luke said. Well then, I best get to work. With my name starting to get out there, there are people who will need my expertise. You said. (He’s changing. Soon he won’t be the same Alex. This is what I feared would happen if he was exposed to the dark magic of the witches. I only hope it’s just his attitude and not his behavior.) Luke thought.
121111.title: Mercenary work

1211111.content:
A few months later.

Heh heh. This is the high life. You said. I don’t think forcing that man and his child onto the streets signals good. Luke said. He didn’t have the money, so I asked for his house. You said. You know, you’re one sided deals is one of many reasons why people hate you. Luke said. Better to be hated than loved, right? You said. I’m thinking all this is going to your head. Luke said. Maybe it is. But like I said years ago, Get busy living or get busy dying. You said. You know the men are dying because of your little stunt with that convoy, right? Luke said. What doesn’t kill them makes them stronger. Unless they like the sound of living in fear. You said Well, they won’t be living in despair that much. Luke said And why is that? You said. M district army has recently finished a satellite that can pick up any incoming female attack. Luke said. I see. What the point of destroying a town if you don’t kill people in said town. You said. Right. Takes out half the fun of rampaging. Luke said. So does the public know? You said. No. They are keeping this a secret from them. They don’t want those giant hags to catch wind of this. Luke said. Not telling the public. Isn’t that the best thing to do? You said. The army doesn’t want to take any chances of the news getting out. Luke said. As long as it doesn’t interfere with my work. You said. Speaking of work, how’s the witch hunting going? Luke said. Third witch this week. Wanna see the heart? You said. You show luke the heart of the witch you ripped out. Wow. A witches’ heart is black. It is. You want it? I already have more than enough in my collection. You said. Nah. I have my own collection. Luke said. Oh, yeah. Your collection of skulls. Guess the sharks eat good tonight. You said.

As the days go by, you and luke watches as mass amount of men evacuate from one part of m district to the next. Those girls are mad as fuck. You said. I told you it’s not as fun when you have no one to kill. Luke said. It’s not. You said. Then your phone goes off. Hello? You said. I’ll make this brief. I have a job for you. A female voice said. Can you pay? You said. Handsomely. She said. What do you need done? You said. The only joy my daughter had is now gone. She said. By that, you mean having fun in m district. You said. Precisely. As I said, I can pay you a lot. Just take out whatever thing those bastards have and you could live like a king. She said. A king, huh? Any retirement plans, Luke? You said. Well, I was hoping to spend my golden years near a beach. Luke said. Consider it done. You said before hanging up. Live like a king. I could have anything I want. You said. The thought of anything does seem a little enticing. Luke said. You could even find that lucky lady. You said. Well….i….wouldn’t mind having a significant other….. Luke said timidly. There we go. Find you a nice, proper lady who will like you collection of skulls. You said. She might find that creepy. Luke said. Come on. We got work to do. You said. You and luke jump down to the ground and head to the strong point of the m district army.


Wow. This part of m district seems more advance. You said. Of course it is. This is where the heart of the army is. Luke said. Hey, look. That satellite in that machine there. You said. That looks like what’s giving them headaches. How should we proceed? Luke said. Hmmm. A few soldiers on guard is all they have around it. You said. We could kill them before anyone notices. Luke said. Heh. We could. Get ready. This has to be perfect timing. You said. Iceicles! You both said. All the soldiers on guard are suddenly frozen in ice. Hmm. Human Popsicle. We’re not going to smash them? Luke said. No today. Still picking ice out of my hair from the last guy. You said as you approach the console. Ok. System check. Function. Shut down. You said. The satellite withdraws into the huge machine. Ok luke. You’re up. You said. Luke approaches the machine, picks it up with one hand and toss it directly into the ocean. I think that’s a new record. Luke said. Let’s go. You said. You and luke leave m district and head to o district. This is going to be good. Luke said. You pull out your phone and call the woman back. It’s done. No more heads up for them. You said. Excellent. She said. And as for that payment? You said. The money’s already been transferred. She said. Luke? You said. Luke checks the account. It’s here. He said. Pleasure doing business with you. You said before you hang up. This is a lot, Devil Dog. We could buy out Paris and still have enough for huge mansions for the both of us. He said. She wasn’t kidding. You want to watch the destruction tonight? You said. Got nothing better to do. Luke said. You and luke wait until night time and watch as preteens and a few teens lay waste to multiple parts of m district. I love it when it all comes together. You said. If you aren’t hated, you are now. Luke said. Not like they can do anything. Hey, how about that blond one? You said. The shy one? No, no. Luke said. Aw come on. Didn’t you say you like blonds? You said. Well….. Luke said. Just go to her. She’s not going to hurt you. She’s not even joining in the death and destruction. …..you’re right. I hope. Luke said. Luke starts to approach the shy blond girl. When she notices him, she gives him a warm and comforting smile. She picks luke up and she asks him his name. Luke stutters out his name to her which makes her smile. Heh. They are getting along good. You said.

The next day.

You see luke comes stumbling into your makeshift hideout. So how did your moonlight rendezvous go? You said. …..I gave up on women after the witches, but I think I’ll give them another chances. Luke said. She was pretty young. You didn’t…..you know. You said. Nah. Luke said. I think I smell love in the air. You said. I…well…..we…..her….Luke said. You’re so easy to read. You said. Enough about me! What about the witches? Luke said. I’m thinking about expanding my hunt. Globally. You said. Take it to other nations? Luke said. Yeah. He witches aren’t just here. They are all out there. You said. …..I won’t stop you, but if you do this, you’ll be hunted for as long as you live. Luke said. I know what I signed up for. Not only will be hunted by witches, but also by humans as well. You said. If you’re serious about this, then let me tell you about other witches. The Russian witches are part of the military. Determined, deadly, and vicious. They specialize in upfront, in your face fighting. The French witches are a part of society. Being born a witch means you will enjoy the finer things in life. They are more adapt to magic than anyone else. The Japanese witches are a part of the government. Anything government related equals them. They specialize in horror. They will literally make your worst nightmares come true. You skipped Germany. You said. Oh, yeah. The witches there are just thugs. Watch your back, as they are unrivaled in the arts of shadow. Luke said. And the Middle East? You said. No witches there. They tried, but it’s too inhospitable. Luke said. Then I’ll pack up for the trip. You said. How are you going to cross the ocean? We don’t have or know anyone with a boat. Luke said. This book. I’ll just teleport there. You said. I guess you’ve thought of everything. Luke said.

After a few hours of packing your most personal things, you and luke are standing in the outskirts of O district. You sure you don’t want to come along luke? Witches wronged you just as much as they wronged me. You said. I’d love to…..but….. Luke said. The girl. You said. I haven’t felt attached to someone in forever. Luke said. Feels good, don’t it? You said. I’ve never experienced this before. ……How long are you going to be gone for? Luke said. I didn’t know you cared. …..I don’t know. Months, years. I don’t know. You said. I know what you’re trying to do. Don’t make me say it. Luke said. I might not come back at all. You said. Alright! Alright! …..Be careful out there. Luke said. Goodbyes aren’t your thing. Don’t worry luke. I’ll be back before you and your lady friend tie the knot. You said. You give luke a bear hug. Aw, come on! You know how I feel about this. Luke said. Which is why I love to do it. You said before letting go. You pull out the book. Take care, luke. Teleportis. You said. You suddenly vanish into thin air. …….Goodbye……Alex. My…..friend. Luke said.
1211111.title: A different Alex

12111111.content:
You appear in grassy field. Hmm. From the smell in the air and that really awful scent, I think I’m in France. You said. You see a flyer just lying on the ground. What’s this? You said. The flyer says that there is a Gala happening tonight. Hmmm. A Gala. Hosted by a lady named Vicky. If the witches here are a part of society’s elite, that’s where they’ll be. But I have no idea where it will be held at. Plus, I doubt that a guy could get in there. You said. You get an idea. If my name hasn’t made it to Europe, it will. Time to do what I do best. You said. You head out to Paris.

When you get there, you feel like you stick out. I look nothing like a Frenchmen. That could be bad for me, but I’ll worry about that later. First off, I need to settle somewhere. You said. You walk a few feet to find a perfectly vacant building. This’ll do nicely. You said. You go into the building and climb to the 3rd floor. You go into a room with the door is slightly opened. This one will do. You said. You set up your stuff. Ok. Everything is set. Now I just need to get that information. You said. And what would that be? A voice said. You turn around to see a guy standing in the door way. That’s a bit personal. And you reek of cologne. You said. And you reek of bacon. He said. Heh. Nice one. I wasn’t expecting my first conversation to with a French person to be in English. You said. Let’s just say I wasn’t fond of learning it. Anyway. I hear you’re looking for information. He said. I am. But I know how this works. What will it cost me? You said. Only your skills. Word has got out here about you. He said. Maybe it has. Alright. No bullshit. I need to know about a Gala that’s happening tonight. I need to know where and how to get in. You said. I could tell you where, but as for getting in. You might have to hit the streets. He said. Then I’ll have to work fast then. Just tell me what you want me to do. You said. On the outside, France looks like utopia, but look really good and you’ll see the dirty underside. Late night wheeling and dealing, corrupt people, and people willing to sell out their own. He said. The point? You said. Straightforward. I can respect that. I need this guy killed. He’s not as important as one of the Ladies, but he has some power. He said. What’s the story? You said. This guy is not as squeaky clean as people here want to believe he is. He does things on the down low. And nobody can and won’t stop him. But you…..you can kill. That’s what I want you to do. Although you might be casted in a negative light when people find out. He said. I’m use to it. Just tell me where the guy is. You said. Right now, he’s enjoying a day off in the south of France. Cut his vacation short. He said. …..Gladly. You said. You head to the south of france.

When you get there, you are surprised at how beautiful it looks. Heh. I’ll have to refer this to luke when he’s going on his honeymoon. You said. You look out in the field and see a person. That must be him. You said. You make your way to him and as you get closer, the scent of cologne gets stronger. Ugh. That smell is horrible. You said. You see the guy is having a smoke and after he toss the cigarette away, you snap his neck. That crack sound. ……Music to my ears. You said before going back to your hideout.

He’s dead. You said. Excellent. One less degenerate in the world. He said. I held up my end, Frenchman. You said. The Gala is being held by Lady Vicky. The most affluent woman in France. Her word is basically law. She does this Gala of hers every year. He said. Why? You said. It’s like a gathering of the social elites to see who can throw the best one. Lady Vicky undefeated when it comes to it. Her Gala’s are the fanciest, prestigious, and highly envied by all. He said. So where is this Gala being held at? You said. Lady Vicky resides near a lake on the outskirts of Paris. You can’t miss it. He said. Wait. I think I’ve seen it when I got here. Huge, white building? A castle in the form of a mansion? You said. That’s Vicky’s place. He said. Ok. Now I just need to know how to get inside. You said. I don’t know how good this will do you, but I heard a rumor that Lady Vicky had hired out some mean looking guards. The thing is, they are men. She said. Men? What good will they do in a place filled to the brim with giant women? You said. I heard they aren’t just any regular men. That they kill giant women as if it was just like killing another man. He said. Hmm. I think I found my way inside. If Vicky is hiring out dangerous people. I just have to make her hear my name. Then all I have to do is walk right in. You said. But the guys Vicky hired kill giant women. Have you? He said. More than my fair share. I only have a few hours before this gala begins. I need to work fast if I want my ticket. You said. How are you going to do…..whatever it is you do in only a few hours? He said. When you’re as good as me, it only takes a few hours before people know who you are. But I don’t have that kind of time. I’ll need a boost. I have a favor to ask Frenchman. You said. I think I know where this is headed. He said. You bet your ass. I need you to spread the word. Start rumors, stories, whatever you can think off. You said. I guess it’s the least I can do. He said. Good. While you do that, I’ll be working. You said.
12111111.title: Hunt them down

121111111.content:
Damnit. I’ve pulled eight jobs in the span of two hours and nothing. Just perfect. All of my targets in one place and I can’t get into the damn place. You said. You lean up against the wall and think. Ugh. Looks like I’ve been wasting my time. You said. After saying that, you see a note appear right in front of you. Hmm. Floating right in front of me, has the scent of a witch on it, and lipstick kiss on it. You said. Thankfully, it was written in english. “I hear you are a person of great interest. This is last minute, but I’d like to buy you for your….unique skills. I promise, you’ll be able to enjoy yourself at Gala. And I’ll make sure you’ll enjoy….other things as well.” It said. Heh heh. Now all I have to do is walk right through the front door. You said.

At night. You’re standing at the entrance of Lady Vicky’s Mansion. Jeez. Someone wants the world to know that they are important. Best not to keep standing here. You said. When you go to enter, you are blocked by two guys. Both clothed in black. The only difference is that the guy on the right is wearing shades. Hold it. You need to vacate the area. One said. I’ve got a letter personally from the Lady herself. I’m her new guard. You said. Let me see. The guy on the left said. He snatches the letter from you and looks at it. Real? The guy on the right said. Yeah. Same as ours. Minus the lipstick here. Alright. Get in. The guy said. Thank you. You said. You walk right inside and see the whole place is filled with women in elegant dresses. Jeez. This place is fancy as shit. Seems like This Lady Vicky knows how to throw a party. You said. You look around to see women conversaing with each other. Luke said that witches here are a part of society’s elite. If every women here is a witch, then I have my work cut out for me. But how am I going to tell who is a witch and who isn’t? You said. You pull out the book. Here. A tracking spell. I’ll be able to tell who’s who. Now how do I say this? Takirus. You said. After you said the spell, everything turns grey in your sight. When you look around, you spot a witch amongst a group. There’s one. Now to spot the rest. But I better be discreet about it. Don’t want to raise any suspicion. You said. You go around spotting all of the witches. I don’t even think I’ve scratched the surface of how many are here. I need to get high up. You said. You make sure no one is watching you. You look up the giant, golden chandelier. Teleportis. You said. You appear right on the chandelier. High up. Better be careful. Alright. Time to spot out some witches. You said.

Guards pov.
All clear over here. Zeke said. I’ll admit. This Vicky knows how to throw a party. Damon said. What the hell? Zeke said. What is it? Scot said. There’s a guy on the chandelier. Zeke said. How and what’s he doing up there? Damon said. Look. He just disappeared into thin air. Zeke said. Alert everyone else. Damon said.

Your pov.
You reappear on the second floor. Ok. That’s all of them. Now should I just kill them all now? Or wait it out? You said. Hey. What were you doing up there? A voice said. That’s for me to know and you to go away. You said. First off, you need to watch that tone. The voice said. Like you can do anything about it. Now beat it. I’ve got things to do. You said. When the person abruptly turns you around, you see it wasn’t a guy, but a woman at your size. She then pushes you against the granite column. Don’t make me do something I’ll regret later! She said. (Wait. Those blue markings on her arm.) You thought. You head butt her to get her off you. Ow! She said. You see you gave her a nose bleed. When you get a good look at her, you see she’s wearing a black and red vest and black pants. She’s green haired, blue eyes, and has a c cup. What the hell’s you’re problem?! She said. You grab her by the throat and slam her into the wall. But before you could do anything, you see a guard coming this way. Tch. This isn’t over. You said before letting her go and running off.

You stop when you get a good distance. Like I didn’t have enough on my damn plate. Plus, I don’t think this spell is wearing off. My vison has come back, but I can still spot witches. Maybe it will go away after some time. You said. As you look around at the partygoers, you are suddenly lifted into the air. Hey! Personal space here! You said. Now, that’s no way to talk to a hostess. The lady said. You look to see a woman in a white, elegant dress that has some gold sparkles on it. She’s also wearing jewelry on her hands and around her neck. (From the look of her, this must be Lady Vicky. If she was anymore white, she’d blend in with that dress. I’ll tread carefully with her.) You thought. You must be Lady Vicky. You said. The one and only. And you must be….. She said. Name’s Devil Dog. You’re last minute hire. You said. Oh, yes. I was waiting for you to show. I trust that everything here has been to your liking? She said. I’ve seen some fancy homes, but yours blows theirs right out of the water. You said. Why thank you. I do pride myself a little on that. She said. She takes a look around her huge mansion. While she’s gazing, you look her up and down. (Her bust is…..massive.) You thought. Her breast were the size of mountains. At least double or triple D. (Most girls would kill to have breast of that magnitude.) You thought. But enough about me. I want know more about my honored little guest. She said. Honored guest? You said. Even though there aren’t that many, I have a thing for powerful men. And you being able to fell someone 5x your size is…..quite intoxicating. She said. Well, I do what I’m paid to do. You said. Which is good and all, but where would that get you in the end? She said. Huh? You said. Don’t take this personally, but the route you go leads to death. Someone or some people will kill you, and then everything is taken from you. She said. I get the feeling that you are implying something here. You said. You have a sharp eye. Then I’ll be frank. How’d you like to be mine? She said. Yours? What will I be, exactly? A slave? One of those penguin suited guys down there? You said. No, no. I have more than enough servants. What I ask of you is on a more…..intimate level. She said. You…..want me to be your lover? You said. Yes. Think about it. Everything you ever desired. A life of luxury and finer things. And I saw you staring. She said. With a smile, Vicky drops you right in her cleavage. Is this what was going through your mind? She said. (Not even close.) You thought. Vicky pushes you down deeper and squeezes them together. Then she plucks you out. All this and more can be yours. She said. (I’d sooner eat nails, but this could be the perfect cover I need. If I’m under Vicky’s care, then no one will think I’m killing them off.) You thought.

Alright. I’ll be yours. You said. Excellent! Take a look at your new life. In luxury. She said. Yeah…..luxury. (I hope this works as I intend it to.) You thought.
121111111.title: The Gala

1211111111.content:
As the party starts to wind down, you start walking around. This is a nice place. I might use it as a summer home when Vicky’s dead. You said. As you start think about your plans, you are suddenly turned around. Ok pal, you’ve got- Shut up! The person interrupts. You see it’s that same girl from before. She forces you against the wall. The impact creates small cracks in the wall. ……You’ve got a lot of nerves. You said. Keep quiet. I’ve got him. Main entrance. She said on her radio. You kick her in the stomach to make her get off you. You grab and rip off her wire. You really don’t want this to happen. She said. I want this to happen. I’ll gut you like a pig. You said.

You attack her, but she grabs your arm and shoves you back into the wall. She goes to punch you, but you move out of the way. When her fist hits the wall, the cracks form a small hole. Luckily, she had got her arm stuck. You take advantage of this and punch her right in the face and kick her straight through the wall. You fan away the dust and are suddenly charged and forced to the ground. You move your head before she was able to hit you and flip her over. You then proceeded to punch her until she grabs your arm and breaks it. Ugh! Fucking bitch! You said. You manage to get your arm free from her and snap your arm back in place. Hrg! That’s going to hurt tomorrow. You said. You! She said. You look to that the marking on the left half of her body are glowing. I’ll beat you to within of an inch of your life! She said. (She’s a siren. Luke told me they are the strongest type of witches. Not to be taken lightly. The longer this drags out, the more magic she will draw upon. I’ll have to end this fight quickly.) You thought. ….Bring it. You said. Before you two can go at each other again, you feel a bullet go straight through your left leg. Argh! Fuck! You said. The sudden and sharp pain makes you fall on one knee. What just shot me? You said. You spot someone on the upper level. (He has a sniper rifle? Why would he even have that to begin with? Doesn’t matter. I have to dress this wound.) You thought. You force yourself to stand up. This isn’t over. Not by a longshot. Teleportis. You said before teleporting to your safe house.


You appear in your safe house. Next time. It’s for keeps. But first, this wound. You said. Thankfully, you took a course in first aid back in the army. You clean your blade and heat it up. Ok. Should not have to worry about infection. Now comes the hard part. You said. You grit your teeth and start to dig the bullet out of your leg. You get the bullet out of your leg. Ok…… The hard part’s over. Now there should be a spell in here that helps. You said. You look in the book. Come on. Healing. Healing. Here it is. You said. You say the spell and your hand start to glow. You hold your hand over the wound and it starts to heal quickly. There. All better. Hey. There’s the strength spell luke used. Hmm….. Worth it. You said. Bycic stengtis. You said. After waiting a few moments, nothing happens. Hmm. I think I said the wrong one. You said. You grab the handle on the door and when you open it, the door comes off its hinges. Holy shit! You said surprised. You try to put the door back in its frame, but it falls inward. Damn. This…. This makes my job a lot easier. Now to test it against a witch. You said. You head back out and start looking.

You remember seeing one when home early. If I recall, she lived closer to the city of Paris. You said. You head to the city limits and see her house. Not as fancy as Vicky, but still showing off. After all that talking and mingling, she should be asleep. You said. You see the door is creaked open enough for you to get in. Now if I was a super-rich, pampered, influent, social elite, where would I lay my head? At the top. You said. Since it’s the dead of night, all of her servants are in their quarters asleep. Should be easy. You said. You spend at least an hour until you find the master bedroom. You can hear her sawing logs in there. You say the growth spell and grow to their size. You open the door slowly to see her asleep in her bed. It’s like a queen’s chamber in her. Pink carpet with white walls and a luxury bed. You said. You walk to the right side of her bed and see she’s facing up. Good. Don’t have to turn her over. You said. You look right at her and can just feel the anger in you build up. Your kind is a plague. You’ll be the first off many. You said. With no hesitation, you punch straight through chest. Her eyes shoot open, but you manage to rip her heart right out before she could act. She moves her arm towards you, but that’s when she dies. You look at her heart and toss it to the side. You walk right out of the building, but not before cleaning off all the blood on your hands. Best to keep up appearances. You said. You head back to Lady Vicky.

When you get there, you see all of the partygoers are gone. Damn. I was hoping they all still be here. You said. Lover. What…..how did you get so tall? Lady Vicky said while walking down the flight of stairs. (Damnit. I forgot. Better make up something.) You thought. One of your…..associates played a joke on me. You said. Ah. Must have been Vile. She said. Vile? You said. Name is as implied. Her real name is Vilene, but among the rest of us, we call her Vile. She said. Is she that mean? You said. She’s…..not as kind as I am to my servants. She said. Sooo…..am I stuck like this? Because being like this forever wouldn’t be a problem. You said. Hmmm…..As much as I love your new height and the thought of things you can do for me….and to me. I prefer my men small. She said. Suddenly, you start shrinking back to normal. (She didn’t even say the spell. Does all she have to do is think it?) You thought. You jump onto her open palm and she lifts you up to face level. Even cuter small. Plus, there’s a lot more of me to love. She said. (More like a lot to hate.) You thought. It’s late, my love. It’s time for us to retire. She said. But what about this huge mess? You said. Oh, child’s play. She said. With a simply wave of her hand, all the trash, tables, and remaining food and trashed and storage. All done. She said. (Even though it was a simple clean up, she’s still powerful. Being around witches for all my life, I can perfectly measure how powerful they are. Vicky’s power is terrifying. I can tell that by just standing in her palm. I need to work delicately with this one.) You thought. Lady Vicky walks up the flight of stairs with you in her hand.

While Vicky is taking you to her chambers, you begin to ask her questions. If I may pry, Vicky. You don’t talk French or have an accent. You said. I’m half French. On my mother’s side. My father was American. And between you and me, I prefer my American tone than my French tone. She said. So can you speak French? You said. I can. I just prefer not to. She said. Ok. I was just wondering because I heard most of the guest talking in French. You said. After walking down a hallway that has pictures of Lady Vicky and her relatives on it, she opens the door to her room. The lady of the house room. She said. It’s not what I expected. Just a gleaming, white queen like room that smells of…..burning incents? You said. Oh, they help me sleep. Sometimes I have difficulties sleeping. She said. She places you down on her queen sized bed and with a wave of her hand, her elegant dress turns into a black bra and panty. (I guess there is a spell for everything.) You thought. Ahhh. That’s better. She said as she climbed over you, which gave you a good look at her massive breast. Why is it always the pretty ones that are bad? You mutter. Vicky sees you staring and smiles. Come closer. I won’t bite. She teased. I hope not….. You said. You walked closer to Vicky and she held you close to her while she slept peacefully. You, on the other hand, had an uneasy time sleeping and literally slept with one of your eyes open.
1211111111.title: After the Gala

12111111111.content:
When you wake up the next morning, the eye that was open all night was dry and irritated. You rub it furiously. Shit. I knew better, but did it anyway. You said. You look to see that Vicky is still sleep. Jeez. A sleeper just like Luke. You said. Then you hear rapid footsteps. Uh oh . Better hide. You said. You hide under the covers as one of lady Vicky’s servants comes charging through the door. Miss Vicky! Miss Vicky! Wake up! She shouts. Vicky starts to stir awake. Ohhhh. What is it, Yvette? Vicky said. It’s too shocking! Come see! She said. Lady Vicky throws off her cover and follows Yvette. I wonder…… Teleportis. You said. You teleport to where Lady Vicky and a few of her servants are watching the TV. Tensions will rise if I’m spotted. I’ll be discreet. You said. You watch the news on the tv. Thank goodness they are talking in english. You said. You listen to what is being told. ……Lady jen was found earlier this morning with a gaping hole in her chest. A closer look at her body reveled that her heart was brutally ripped out. How the killing happened is a mystery as all the doors and windows were locked tight. We will have more information as it becomes available. The reporter said. It’s a tragedy. Who would want Miss Jen dead? A servant said. I pray this is a onetime thing and find the killer. Another servant said. Seems like my late night kill has been found. It’s only going to get harder and harder with the more I kill, If they aren’t watching their backs already. You said. You watch as the servants start to talk all at once. Vicky catches all their attention by whistling. Now…. I’m sure they will find the person responsible for this crime. Vicky said to reassure them. Hmmm. Things are going to become tight around here. I should keep up appearances every now and then not to raise suspicion. But who am I kidding? There’s no way they think a guy would or could kill someone 5x their size. Anyway, I should get back to work. Teleportis. You said. You teleport to your safe house.

Ok. Now for an inventory check. You said. You go around to make sure you have everything you need. Laptop….check. TV to watch was going on……check. Witch book….check. Witch guns…..check. And other things I have…..check. Ok. I’m all set. You said. As you do a look over, you see a guy standing in your door way. You need something? You said. I heard that…..you are a person who can get things done? He said. Why the hell are you jittery? You said. I’m a wanted man. He said. Wanted? What kind of trouble can you get into? You said. Against another man, none. But I crossed a certain woman who has the police in her pocket. He said. Police? They have police here? You said. You haven’t been in France long. Unlike in America, things here are more authority wise. He said. Like? You said. Well, in my case, breaking into a rich lady’s mansion means I get life in small jail cell. He said. Damn. Is France a dictatorship? You said. Not really. It’s just that these rich ladies are well liked by everyone and any bad action against them is unacceptable. He said. So what do you need me for? You said. …..Do you have a problem with killing? He said. No. You said. The police commander and the lady whose house I broke into are very close. If one of them were to……go away. The other wouldn’t know what to do. He said. So I kill either the police guy or the lady? You said. Yeah. Whichever one you decide. He said. I’m not doing this for free. You said. O…of…..of course! I wouldn’t expect you too. Here. He said. He hands you a burlap sack filled with cash. You look in it to see it’s all 100 hundred bills. 100 hundred dollar bills?! How’d you get all this?! You said. That house I said I broke into…… I stole a few valuable things in there. He said. How did you even manage to carry the things out? They’d be 3x your size. You said. I didn’t say it was anything big. He said. Well, this is more than enough for one killing. Where is the police guy? You said. Earlier in the morning….. He’s out taking his morning cigarette pack in the police courtyard. He said. A whole pack? In one day? If I don’t get him, the cigarettes will. I’ll go after the police guy. You’ll be able to more around freely soon. You said. You head out to the police station.
You manage to find the police station. There is it. Sort of sticks out like a sore thumb. The only small building between to giant ones. And there he is. You said. You spotted him with his dark blue uniform and smoking his pack of cigarettes. Damn. Like a chimney. Best get to it. You said. You down from the building you were scouting from. You walk right behind him and stab him in the neck. His body slumps to the ground while blood pours out of his neck. You grab and take his police star and cigarette pack. You won’t be needing these anymore. You said before leaving back to your hideout. You get there to see the guy looking out the window. The police commander won’t be bothering you anymore. You said. Really?! Thank you!! Now I won’t have to look over my shoulder as often! He said. While you’re still looking, spread the word. Devil Dog. You said. I will. I’m in your debt! He said as he leaves. Now to get all this money on card. At least you can do that here. You said.


After hours of finally transferring all the money to a card you have, you finally sit down at your laptop you…..”borrowed” from someone. While playing solitaire, you hear on the tv that the police commander’s body was found with a wound in his neck. About time they found it…….. Damn. I didn’t want that card there. You said. After 15 minutes of playing, you finish the game. That one little mistake costed me. You said as you stand up. Then you hear a knock on the door. It’s open. You said. The door doesn’t open, but the knocking continues. When you go to open it, you see no one is here, but you do see a note on the door. “Go to the south of France.” It said. I prefer face to face, but I guess I’ll have to get use to these type of talking. You said. You head to the south of France and when you get there, you see another note attached to a tree and a brown paper bag. “Open me.” It said. You open the bag and see a wad of cash in it and another note. “This should cover your expenses. Kidnap the person in the picture and leave them at this place and at this time.” The note said. A kidnapping? First time for everything. You said. You look at the picture to see it’s a guy in a black business suit. Hmmm. He looks important. Better get going. You said. You head back to the city and look for him. Black business suit…… You said. You look and walk around until you find a guy in a black suit. Hmmm. Black suit and all of the features. You walk up close to him and grab him. Move a muscle, I’ll snap your neck. You said. The man puts up no resistance. Come with me. You said. You take the guy to your hideout, bind him and wait until darkness.

With the moon high in the sky, you take the guy to the destination you were instructed. Here? You said. You’re two minutes late. A voice said. You look to see a scruffy forty looking butler. A butler? I was hired by a butler? You said. I was a mere messenger. He said with a heavy French accent. As long as you can pay, I don’t care. Here. All wrapped for you. You said. You push the binded guy forward. Your skills are extraordinary to take a guy in the middle of broad day light. He said. Yeah. I’ve got other things to do. You said. Of course. Come, you! Madame Evet is waiting. He said leading the guy off. Speaking of ladies….. It’s time. You said.
12111111111.title: The next day

121111111111.content:
As the moon hangs high in the dark sky, you move like a thief. Time to increase the kill count. You said. You find one of the witch’s mansion. Ok. Let’s do this. You said. You say the growth spell and pick the door open. It takes a few seconds, but you manage to pick the door open. You walk quietly not to alert anyone. Good thing this one has red carpet. Masks my footsteps. You said. You walk around for half an hour until you find her bedroom. She’s in there. Time to do what I do best. You said. You open the door slowly and walk quietly to the side of her bed. Ugh. All that powder on her face. You said. You punch right through her chest. Her eyes shoot open and she quickly tries to fight you off, but you rip her heart right out. As you tend to the scratches on your face, her body slumps over to the floor and her blood starts to pour out. You quickly leave the same way you entered. Night’s still young. Time to find another. You said. You head out to find another witch.

With blood dripping from your hands, you find another witch. There she is. Second verse. Same as the first. You said. You pick the lock in the door and open it. Hmm. With blood dripping from my hands, it’ll leave a telltale on this tile. You said. As you step lightly, you hear the sound of something opening and closing. You go to investigate and you see your target next to her refrigerator. You walk slowly up to her from behind. You so close to her that you can smell her perfume. You wait a few seconds and punch straight through her. You pull your arm out and kick her to the ground. You use the sink to wash away all the blood on your hands arm. You look in the refrigerator and eat some of her food before leaving. You go to find another witch.

You find another witch and this time, break in through the window. You walk quietly until you come to a complete stop when you hear something. After waiting a few seconds, you continue moving until you stumble onto a servant who looks like she’s waiting for someone. You peek around the corner to see her searching. Is she looking for something? You said. Gauging how far she is by the sound of her clicking high heels, you wait until she’s right next to you. You grab her and force her into a room and bar the door. Is someone out there? A voice said. Shit! You said. You look around and hide behind the red curtains. Hello? Is someone here? The voice said. You see a figure walk by the curtains you are hiding behind. (That’s her. I can feel her power.) You thought. You come out of hiding and creep slowly behind her. You leg sweep her and when she hits the floor, you punch right through her chest and quickly rip her heart out. You watch as she stops moving. That makes three. More than enough for tonight. You said. You quickly bolt back to your hideout and stay there for the night.

As dawn breaks, you wake up. Three witches in one night. A record. You said. You look at the time. I better get back to Vicky before she wakes up. You said. Before you can even say teleportis, you teleport right in lady Vicky’s bed. Whoa. I didn’t even have to say it. You said. You are suddenly grab and are pressed up against something soft. (Great. Now I have to shower in acid.) You thought. Ahhh. Let’s just lay here all day. You and me. Vicky said. (Keep it in check. Not now.) You thought. For a long 5 minutes, you were nuzzled close to Vicky’s breast before one of her servants comes bursting in. Lady Vicky! Come quickly! She said. With you in her hand, Lady Vicky follows her servant. Lady Vicky and her servants all watch as the news shows the body of three witches. Oh dear God! The person has struck again! A servant said. While listening, you hear the report drop the name Devil Dog. (Now my name starts circulating.) you thought. You think this Devil Dog is responsible? A servant said. I wouldn’t pass up on it. Another said. Miss Vicky! I think we need extra security around here! A concerned servant said. No way! I’m not letting whoever this is know that I’m scared! Vicky said. But mistress! This person has killed numerous people! We must take every precaution! She said. I can handle myself! Whoever this person is won’t find me as easy as all the other victims! Vicky said. (That’s what you think.) You thought. But miss…..! This individual comes in the dead of night while his victims sleep! Please! You must at least consider the idea! Another concern servant said. Lady Vicky ponders the idea for a few seconds. Ugh. Fine! If it makes everyone feel better, I’ll hire some extra security. Vicky said. With the announcement of that, you hide your grimace. (Just great. Now I have to worry about jackasses trying to stop me.) You thought.

As the day goes on, everyone is walking on eggshells. While walking around, you see one servant who jumped when she heard a door creak. There was another servant who broke out in a sweat when she was tasked with tending Vicky’s garden. Wow. I didn’t know I could have such an effect on people. You said. As you revel in the fear the servants and butlers, you didn’t pay attention to Vicky as she walked up behind you. Love, you really shouldn’t be walking around. Vicky said as she picked you up gently. You see Vicky is wearing her floral white dress. What? Are you worried? You said. Yes. For your safety because my servants don’t watch where they step. And they are on edge, so who knows what they will do out of panic. Vicky said. They are scared shitless. You said. They have a right to be, but I think they might be taking it way out of proportion. Vicky said. So when is that extra security getting here? You said. They will be here soon. Hopefully, that will put everyone at ease. She said. (Whatever guards are here won’t stop me.) You thought.

As night approaches, you get ready to sneak out. Ok. Time to go. You said. You walk u t Vicky’s door and push it open. Whew. Door didn’t come off. You said. You walk through the open door and push it close. Ok. Time to go. You said. You get to the stairs and see the front door. That’s my target. But something doesn’t seem right. Where are the guards Vicky hired? You said. You take it slow and steady as you make your way to the door. Are they a no show? You said. You get to the door with no problem. This seems too easy. You said as you push on the door. Damn. Locked. Well. I don’t need to use the door. You said. You look around to make sure no one sees you. Nobody’s around. Ok. You said. Before you could say the spell, someone grabs you and forces you against the wall. Don’t move. A voice said. You remember that voice. (Her again.) You thought. You grab her arm and slam her against the wall. You again!? She said. I’m just as upset as you are. You said. There’s……there’s no way you can be the killer. She said. (As much as I want to do her in, I can’t. It will be too suspicious.) You thought. If that’s what you want to believe. You said. What do you mean by that? She said. Nothing. If you think I’m the killer, then that’s what you think. You’re entitled to your own opinion, aren’t you? You said. ……You’re trying to get at something. She said. Like what? You said. I mean you being here is something of a coincident. She said. Coincident? Even as crazy as it sounds, you really think I am the killer. You said. I wouldn’t put it past. You are far from normal.
