You rummage through a destroyed convoy heading to m district. Damn. They’re at a lost when it’s fighting, but at least they get the good kind of food. You said. As you dig, you sense something. Alright. Here we go. You said. You are lifted up into the air and placed into a open hand. You just can’t take a hint. You said. You can say that, but you said you loved me. She said. Leah gently rub you with her index finger. And who am I not to return said love? She said. I said I’d gut you next time. You said. And? She said. (She knew I was just blowing steam. Yet she didn’t call me on it until now.) You thought. Well, are you? She said. ……No. You said. And the love between us? She said. I’ve come to accept it. You love me and I love you. You said. That’s all I wanted to hear. She said. Leah brings you close and kisses you and almost engulf your head. Then she breaks it and holds you close to her heart. The slow, rhythmic beat makes you almost forget the troubles of your past. I’ll keep you safe. I promise. She said. (Protection from a witch? I don’t know if that’s a good thing or not.) You thought.

One year and a half later

So married…..to a witch. Luke said. Yeah. And kids on the way. You said. I didn’t think family was up your alley. Luke said. Neither marriage. A full year of it. You said. Did you ever think two slaves like us would come this far? He said. Not really. I thought we’d either be dead or in servitude for life. You said. Me too. So the wicked wonder still a good wife? He said. Aw come on luke. Still pissed about that trip to her stomach? You said. Out of respect, I didn’t burst out of her and cut her in half. Even though she’d heal like nothing. He said. Can’t you two get along? You said. No. The bitch ate me and you know how a feel about that. Just like you and being sat on. Luke said. The worst. Stepped on was one thing, but being sat on is the worst. You said. Does leah? He said. Nah. She has a lot of respect for me. Even by her own standards. You said.. Hm. Like she always wanted to be a wife and expectant mother? Luke said. I guess so. In the world we live in, I thought being a mother was low on the list. You said. Heh. Remember our dreams we had? Luke said. Yeah. You said you lead an uprising against all females and I said I wanted to join the army. You said. Heh. That’s before we became hunters. Luke said. Is that a smile I see? You said. Yeah, take a picture. It’ll last longer. *Click* That’s going to be my screen saver. You said. Well I did say so. He said.

As the months go by, Leah gives birth to a girl and boy. Leah was attached to both of them, but she was more attached to her son since he’d soon have to live in a world were men are slaves. One day while out and about, Luke asks for a favor.

You want me to go to Europe with you? For what? You said. Something important. I need your expertise. Leah won’t even know you’re gone. He said. All right. I guess so. You said. Good. Let’s go. Luke said. You and luke disappear and reappear in Germany where Hans is waiting for both of you. Luke. Alex. About time. He said. Hans? What’s all this about? You said. It’s that time. Alex. We’re unsealing the optical eyes. Luke said. Optical eyes? You said. They were a set of eyes born to a hunter. Deemed to dangerous, Argus had them sealed. Hans said. But with the witches growing everyday, we need those eyes. Luke said. So how do we unseal them. You said. We need one eye from a hunter and on from a witch. Hans said. Luke gouges out his left eye. Now all we need is the eye of a witch. Alex. Time to pay an old friend a visit. Luke said. You mean…… I knew I’d see them one more time. You said. Get her right eye and we can start part two. Hans said. No problem. I know just how to get it. I’ll just go back to where I first started my hunts. You said.
121111111111111111111111112111111.title: Seek the hunters approval

1211111111111111111111111121111111.content:
You look around the French countryside. My first hunts and contracts. Come along way since then. You said. You walk into Paris and see a wanted poster. Devil Dog. Wanted. Heh. Only fifty thousand. What’s that in American dollars? You said. As you walk the streets, you pass Lady Vicky’s Mansion. Not today. Some other day. Now how do I get their attention? Do what I did last time. You said. Not wasting anytime, you do some contracts and wait. Three assassinations, a kidnapping, and high profile interrogation. That should get their attention. I bet she’s still mad about me killing her sister. You said. You head to the south of France and wait for them.

As you wait, you sharpen your blade. There. Should get the job done. You said. You sheath your blade. I wouldn’t try that. It won’t end the way you want. You said. A clawed hand goes through you. Never listens. You said. As the hand is remove, the hole in your midsection heals. Still mad at me, Shadow? You said. She swings high and you duck. I take that as a yes. You said. Hold still! She said. You grab her hand as she tries to slash you. Calm down, shadow. Aren’t your kind suppose to calm and calculated? You said. Not when you kill my blood sister! She said. She grabs you with her other hand. Now die! She said. Before she could attack, you grab you knife, stick it into her temple, and yank her right eye out. Ow!!! You bastard!! Nothing you do will hurt me as much as you killing my sister!!! She said. I’d love to indulge you and your damn goons, even though I’d kill all of you in 8 minutes tops, I’m on business. And I’ve got what I came for. See you later. You said. You disappear and reappear right next to Luke.

Ok. I’ve got her eye. You said. Good. Now we can start part two. Luke said. You don’t want to handle your eye first? You said. Luke holds his right hand over his left eye socket and a glows purple for a few seconds. There a new eye. Hans. Luke said. The eye of hunter and witch. Ja. Now you both need to channel every drop of magic in you to unseal the eyes while I say the spell. He said. This better be worth it. You said. You hold one eye and luke holds the other. Don’t slouch, Alex. He said. Let’s just get this over with. You said. You channel the magic in you into the eye as Hans says the spell. This thing is sucking me dry! How much longer?! You said. Not until you can’t even walk. Luke said. You can feel every drop of magic just being taken into the eye until you feel weak. Then Hans stops saying the spell. It is done. Let’s see. He said. It takes a few minutes until you feel better. You open your hand and see three dots on the eye. Perfect. The optical eyes. Luke said. What can they do? You said. What can’t they do? Perception, speed, strength, anything. Hans said. So….who gets them? Hans? You said. No. No. I prefer not to not what the future holds. He said. Luke? You said. I agree with Hans. It’d be boring knowing everything. He said. Guess I’ll do. As a test to see how they work. You said. You grab the eyes and they phase into your eyes. The three dots appear in your eyes. Well? Luke said. I see…..everything. You said. Who was Hans’s soon to be wife? Luke said. Isle. You said. He’s right. Hans said. One more. Alex. Hit me. Luke said. Why? You’d see it coming. You said. Just do it. He said. Luke You attack luke and kick him when he was expecting you to punch. I know when you want to punch or kick. What did you see? Luke said. I saw you expecting a punch, so I kicked. You said. Those eyes are a god sent. With any luck, we’ll be hunting for a few years instead of three hundred. Luke said. Which would mean more time for Hans to work on his beard. You said. A beard? Hans. Luke said. Who doesn’t love a bearded man? Hans said. You’re German. You’re more mustache than bearded. Alex. Let’s go. Luke said. You and luke disappear and reappear back in o district

Home sweet hell. Luke said. O district’s a dump, but it’s been good to us. You said. You’re just saying that because you live here with the bitch from the west. Luke said. Can’t you at least try to like her? You said. She. Ate. Me. So no. He said. Worth a shot. You said as your eyes revert to normal. So what about your son? Going to bring him into the family business? Luke said. Oh no. I don’t want him high or low with witches or hunters. You said. Fair enough. Someone should have kept us away from them. But give the eyes to him. We still live in a world filled with behemoths. Luke said. Alright. Maybe he’ll get better use out of them. You said. You go home to see Leah is cradling her son. You still haven’t put him down? You said. He’s just too precious. I just can’t. She said. Well get all the time you can. He’s my size when the magic wears off. You said. Does he have to? He’ll start to grow up and won’t be my baby anymore. She said. I take it your mother didn’t coddle you. You said. Somewhat. Only if I showed I could be as mean as her. Leah said. Which would mean you weren’t loved that much. You said. Right. Which is why I wanted to be a better mother than her. Shower my little baby with unconditional love. She said. Just the baby? You said. And my little husband. She said. Thank you. You said.

A few years go by and your son has shrunken down to your size, to leah’s dismay. When he was old enough, you introduced him to luke, who he took an automatic liking to. Alex. Come get your kid! He won’t let go of me! He said. He likes you. You said. Get this brat off me! Luke said. You call your son and he comes to you. Don’t let uncle luke get to you. He adores you. You said. Said no one. Luke said. Your son goes to a pile of rubble and starts digging. He likes you a lot. You said. I hate being liked. He said. After a few minutes, your son shows luke a skull he made out of rubble. A present for uncle luke? You said. Your son shakes his head. What would I want with a skull made of junk? Even though it’s finely crafted. He said. Come on luke. He looks up to you. Which is a shock. You said. Luke takes the skull. Smiling, your son latches onto luke’s leg. I hate kids…. He said. Yet he likes you. A miniature luke. Do you want to be like luke? You said. Your son shakes his head yes. Luke. Someone wants to be like you. You said. Ugh! Now I have to be a role model for this snot nosed brat. Luke said. Hey. That brat has those eyes. He could kick your ass if he wanted to. You said. If this brat beats me in a fight, I’ll be nice to leah as long as that hag’s alive. You said. You take your son home. Stay with mother. I know she’s frightening, but you’re the son of Devil Dog. You’re not scared of anything. Are you? You said. ……No. Your son said. Good. I’ll be right back. You said. You leave your house.

As you head to m district, you grow to 100ft and stop. I know you’re there. Let’s get this over with. You said. You see a witch with a regal purple dress on appear from the shadows. …..What do you want? You said. She looks you over for a few seconds. Even a dirty man like you must know. Has no one ever told you not to steal from a witch? She said. I didn’t steal anything. You said. The optical eyes. They never belong to hunters. They belong to us witches, and we’d like them back. She said. I don’t have no optical eyes. That doesn’t sound valuable. You said. So the hard way. Very well. She said. She hold open her hand and your heart appears in her hand. No more playing. Where are the eyes? She said. I don’t know, lady. Just do it. You said. Well, if that’s the way you want it. She said. She crushes your heart in her hand. You collapse on the ground and smile. (From what I’ve seen, I’ve left those eyes with the right person.) You thought. You close your eyes and drift off into slumber.


So that’s how it all started? Tom said. Yeah. Luke can verify every word. You said. You think without those witches, you’d be as you are? Cody said. Maybe a hunter, but nothing to hunt. Alex said. Hard to believe he wanted to be like luke. Bruce said. And what’s wrong with that? Luke said. N….Nothing! Dante said. Who wouldn’t want to be like you? Tom said quickly. You have them scared shitless. Alex said. The way I like it. Luke said. But it’s not right. You said. Sir. You finished all you need? Hank said. I did. You said. And Arif? Alex said. I’ve talked to him. Told him everything about the both of us. His only request so he would help. You said. And Leah? Tom said. Yeah. What about her? Dante said. Hey. I thought I talked to you three about my wife. Alex said. Calm down, Alex. Let the three cute boys drool. I said it was a curse. Leah said. You heard the lady! Tom said. We’ll be with her. Making sure she’s ok! Dante said. Heh heh. Come along boys. Do good and one of you gets a kiss. She said. Tom, Dante, and Bruce blow past Alex and follow leah. I’ve never seen those three like that. Cody said. I see they need more discipline. From me. Luke said. Save it for later. Right now. We have a green light. You said.
1211111111111111111111111121111111.title: The end of Devil Dog

13.content:
So this is Sue’s new m district? You said. (You’ve been here before already. Remember it was the first thing you did after we left Luka?) he said. (It just surprises me that they could do this, and yet needed me to fight their battles.) You said. (Is it wrong to be needed?) He said. (Don’t rely on a crutch.) You said. A you walk, you come across the building. This is the place. But why did the contact want to meet here? You said. You twist the knob on the door and it opens. And the door’s unlocked? You said. You walk inside and it’s pitch black. (Someone didn’t pay their light bill.) he said. Bad idea to walk in the dark…. You said. You step lightly and feel around. (Think I found the light switch.) You thought. You flip it and feel something jammed to your head. On the ground. A voice said. Asshole…. You mutter. You elbow him and knock him to the ground. (He’s dressed for night ops. Night googols and all.) You thought. You kick away his gun and grab him by his clothes. What are you doing lurking here? You said. You stop his knife attack and break his arm. Argh!! He said. You want a broken neck with that arm? You said. Fucking hell….. Why did I volunteer for this? He said. Volunteer? For what? You said. (Let me handle this.) he said. Your eyes change to red and you grab him by the throat. You’re going to be volunteering to be in a full body cast and a wheel chair will be your only means of moving if you don’t talk. You said. Jesus….. Get in here!! Get the fuck in here NOW!!!! He shouts. You see a bunch of guys with guns rush in and surrounded you. (Fucking hell?) You both said as red lasers come onto your body. Grrr…. Stay here. I’m not done with you. You said, knocking him out.


You look around. (Guess we found the army. Can I kill them?) He said. (They went through all the trouble. Let’s not disappoint.) You said. Hehe……. You said. You disappear and reappear with your knife in one. You slice through him and knock the next guy’s head off. Time for a spree…. You said.


Back at the mansion.

Ok. From here all the way to that quarter on the bottle. Dante said. No way. You need at least a 15x scope. Can’t hit that with 10x. Tom said. Care to add more to the table? Dante said. I’ll add another one hundred. 150 if you dial it to 5x. Tom said. A challenge. About time. Dante said. Hell I’ll get in on that. Cody said, putting fifty on the table. Bruce? Dante said. I’m in. He said, putting forty. You guys are idiots. Luke said. Get ready to have your money taken. Dante said. He adjust his sights to 5x and aims. He waits a few seconds before firing. …..It’s a hit. Hank said. Ha! Dante said. No way. Double or nothing. Iron sights. Tom said. Now you’re talking. Dante said. As Dante takes off his scope, Kim and Sam come running in. Whoa, girls. Where’s the fire? Cody said. And can it wait? I’m about to hit bank. Dante said. Luke we found these guys outside looking for a way inside. Sam said. What? Where are they? He said. Sam puts them on the ground in front of Luke. Bruce kicks the knees out from all them and binds there hands. What are you jarheads doing out here? Tom said. None of them talk. Let me do it. Luke said. Luke’s hand starts glowing a dark purple and he places it on one of the soldier’s head. The soldier’s eyes go wide and a purple line goes to the other soldiers heads. What’s he doing? Cody said. I…think he linked their minds. Hank said. Soon all the soldiers eyes go wide and they start sweating like crazy.

OK! OK! We’ll sing! Just stop it! One shouts. Luke pulls his hand back. What did you do? Bruce said. Showed them what true fear. Now talk. He said. W….we were sent here to infiltrate the place. Scout out who else is in here with him. One of them said. And who were you going to report that to? Dante said. Ashley. It was all part of her plan. He said. Plan? What plan? Luke said. It was suppose to be quick and easy. But he came too early. So we had to push it up to now to take secure the mansion. He said. Secure? For who? Tom said. Before he could say, a loud crash was heard. Everyone turned to see Kris and Em come flying through the doors unconscious. The hell!? Bruce said. Walking through and over them, Kyle and his elites come in. Well then, seems like we got some freeloaders. He said.


Back to your pov.

You slice and kick the last guy’s head off his shoulders and through a window. Goal! You said. You look around at the dead bodies. All in a days work. He said before you take over. (Did you really have to put that one guy back to together and cut him apart again?) You said. (A promise is a promise.) He said. (Guess this was a trap. I bet Sue had something to do with this.) You said. Your wrist device goes off. Sir…. We have a problem here. Bruce said. Problem? What kind? You said. Hello hero. Kyle said. (Kyle….? But I saw him….) Kyle….. You said. I’ve seen you’ve been living it up in my mansion. And you’ve been very busy. You even manage to turn one of my enforcers. Not an easy thing to do. He said. What have you done with them? You said. Nothing. Although I can say for sure about Amy. She’s a little…..livid. He said. You or any of your croons touch them…..! You said. You know that’s not how this works. I have a lot of work to do. So I should get busy. He said, hanging up. You quickly leave the building to see the entire army outside. (Wow…. They really came out for us. Tanks, helicopters, and I get the feeling of a long range missile from a submarine.) He said. (If only they did this two and a half years ago.) You said. You pull out your knife and get ready to cut them all down when your wrist device goes off again. Ah, ah. I wouldn’t do that. Kyle said. I’ll deal with you when I get there. You said. Now, see, if you attack them I’ll be forced to…..have your friends her killed. He said. You wouldn’t dare! You said. I think I’ll start with the overtly dressed, silent one. Or maybe I could make her one of my newest members. He said. (Em.) you thought. (Em becoming a enforcer….. That scares me a little.) He said. This isn’t over, Kyle. Count the fucking days. You said.


(Fucking….) You said. (Well?) he said. (I….can’t risk it. Not while he has them.) You said. (What about Luke?) he said. (Kyle wouldn’t have called if that was the case.) You said. (Don’t tell me….) He said. (First time for everything….. This is an alliance made in hell.) You said. You sheathe your knife and hold your arms up. A few of them slowly approach you and quickly tie your arms together and take your knife away. You’re then loaded into a truck. (So this is what it’s like to be arrested?) He said. (Pretty much. Except this is a military truck and not a police car.) You said. After driving for a good while, the truck comes to a stop. You hop out and see a huge building. (New army HQ.) You said. You are lead inside and into a cell. You easily brake the hand cuffs and your dark half comes out. These jokers got new toys. You think Sinclair is funding them again? He said. No. I think this is all Sue and her merry band’s doing. Jesus….. The girl hates me that much that she brings back Kyle and his croons? I didn’t even do nothing to her. You said. You killed her for money, spit all over her ideals, threaten her friends and did more damage to m district than those preteen monsters ever did. He said. Ok…. I’ve done wrong by her, but is Kyle really a better option? He’s the one who made that prison and made men fight in that arena. You said. Guess she’s still mad you didn’t do anything to stop all that. What’s the plan of action? He said. We can’t do anything rash. Not while Kyle has my friends. You said. He’s going to turn the girls into his elites or enforcers and have the guys kill each other in the arena. Or re-educate them. He said. I’ll rip his fucking head off and play kick ball with it if he does that!! You said. I’d shove it up his ass, but that’s just me. He said. I can’t leave this cell. Not with the army and Kyle working together. You said. So what do we do? He said. …..I need you to act like me. You said. Easy enough. Only someone whose been around you long enough will know the subtle difference. He said. You bend the bars enough to get out. Keep a low profile. Find out anything you can. Rescue the guys and the girls. You said. And you? He said. I’ll stay here. Have a chat with Sue when she comes. Hurry before someone comes. You said. He walks out of the cell and you re bend the bars as he disappears.


What have you done, Sue? You said.
13.title: Guess who's back

131.content:
You sit there and wait until you hear footsteps. You perk up and see it’s Ashley. Hello, Sue. Of all the things I thought you’d do…. You said. I didn’t want to do this. But you didn’t leave me any choice. She said. If you told me what I wanted to know instead of being stubborn, we wouldn’t be here. You said. It was none of your business to begin with. She said. So tell me. What warranted a deal with Kyle? Me not doing anything to stop him? Or was it me destroying m district? Or both? You said. You know why. She said. So in your mind, I’m worst than Kyle. I wasn’t the one who built that prison to keep men there for the rest of their lives. Or make them fight in the arena. All that was Kyle’s doing. You said. And you did nothing about it! You turn your back like he did! She said. I told you before. What right do I have to him? Just because some people think what he’s doing is bad? You said. It was bad! You saw that prison and that arena! She said. I did. Prison is horrible in general. And the arena is a chance to prove themselves. You said. Those fights, which are terrible as a whole, were one-sided! She said. And yet I came out alive. You said. They didn’t have what you have! She said. They didn’t need it. I still can’t believe you think the guy on the sidelines is worse than the guy doing the terrible acts. You said. He’s just as guilty. She said. Only in your crazy head. You really think Kyle’s going to leave m district alone and let men live their lives? You said. I know so….. I made sure of it. She said, muttering that last part. I’ll let you have that delusion, Sue. Just know you have no idea what you’ve just done. You said. In a huff, she storms away.

You sit there in the cell for 2 days. Good thing I don’t need eat anymore. I’d be delirious from hunger. I haven’t heard back yet from them. They should have been rescued by now. Unless…. They were expecting just that. You said. Then your wrist device goes off. Audio only. You said. Sir… Sir can you hear me? Bruce said. Bruce. Where are you? You said. Good to hear from you. We’re in prison. He said. The others are safe? You said. Yeah, but they got us in separate cells. It’s no picnic here. All the enforcers that were locked up here are free. And they are 4x as worse than before. He said. All that time locked up…. More than enough time to brew anger. Can you get out? You said. We would have already been out, but something’s on the cell lock. Some kind of seal. He said. (It might be a magical seal.) You thought. I’ve been trying to get out ever since I got here. And I think the others have to. He said. Did you happen to see Em? Or Luke? You said. They put Luke in a special cell. We haven’t seen him since. Em is with the girls. Going through….. Re-education. He said. Re-education? So Kyle is trying to turn her? You said. Not just her, but Sam, Kris and Kate. He said. (Kate and Sam are one thing, but Kris…. She was a former enforcer. She’ll go back to her old ways if left alone.) You thought. What are we going to do? He said. Sit tight. Once I get out of my situation, I’ll come for you guys. You said. Hurry. I don’t think they plan on keeping us here long. He said.

My dark half should have saved them by now. What’s going on? You said. You pace back and forth and hit the walls in frustration. Damnit! I can’t stay in here! You said. You bend the bars and walk out to find the exit. You find it and about to walk out when you hear footsteps. Fuck. Sue’s coming back. You said. You hide in the shadows and wait for her to walk by. When she gets to the door to your cell, she stops. Grr…. The only thing he’s going to do is work me up again. She said. She said. You slowly creep out of the shadows and grow to 100ft. This was the right thing to do. Every precaution was taken to make sure of it. She said. You get a little bit closer. Why does he have to be so stubborn? She said. You quickly grab her head and shove it wall. Ashley’s body slides down and falls over to the side unconscious. I need my knife. You said. You look around and find the storage that had your knife. You sheathe it and run out to the exit when your body freezes in place. W..what the?! You said. Out of the shadows, Susan appears with her left hand glowing. Urgh! (Goddamn witch!) You said. I came to make sure Ashley wouldn’t go mad when she sees you again. Didn’t expect to find this. She said. Grrrr! You said. You just need to focus your energy like Luke taught you. Don’t make this any worst than it has to be. She said. (Concentrate….) You thought. You focus your power to your hands and they faintly glow purple. (Concentrate!) You said. Then they begin to glow brighter. What….? She said. The magic barrier surrounding you is absorbed into your hands. *Huff* Damn witch….! You said. So…. You can use magic. Not very well, but still. She said. I don’t….need judgment from a bitch. You said. You’ve exhausted yourself doing that. I don’t want to hurt you. She said. That makes one of us. You said, readying yourself. Why…..? Why won’t you listen to reason. Neither of us have anything to gain from this. She said. I do have something to gain. The knowledge of another dead witch! You said.

You waste no time and throw your knife at her. She moves out the way and when she looks, your fist is halfway to her face. She vanishes at the last second. Damn…. You said. You sense a faint energy source and move to your right, dodging her hand. (She basically came out of thin air…. ) You thought. You move your leg to kick her, but she grabs it as her hand glows. When you kick her off, you can feel your leg. (What? My leg…. It feels like it’s asleep.) You thought. You nearly fall before you stabilize yourself. Wh-what did you do to my leg?! You said. I stopped all messages from your brain to your leg. She said. (Fuck….!) You said. You can stop this anytime. She said. I’m not done just yet…. You said. You disappear and reappear behind her. She turns to block your afterimage while you attack her from behind. You then feel her palm hit you right on the heart. Ugh…! (She didn’t even turn…! She….responded so quickly to my attack….) You thought. You feel your heart start skipping beats as you feel. Your chest feels like it’s on fire as you gasp for air.

I nearly stop your heart. I don’t want to hurt you any farther. She said. (She’s…..not like the rest. Or Sue. She’s trained. Either that, or I’m not prepared for her. I have to get away.) You said. Your hands start to glow. You can’t keep fighting in your condition. Just stop. She said. Don’t tell me what I can do. Calpus! You said, clapping your hands together; Causing a huge flash. Arghhh! She said, shielding her eyes. What was that fucking cleansing spell?! Nuetra! You said. You feel a soothing feeling wash over you as you regain feeling in your leg. Ahhh… You said. My eyes! Susan screams. You get up just in time to see Ashley come walking out while holding her head. Exit stage left! You said, disappearing.


You reappear in o district and shrink back down. You feel exhausted. Two spells and I’m tired as fuck. You said. You can’t rest at all. Not while Kyle still has your friends. I’ve got to get them out. Come hell and high water. You said.
131.title: Your pov

1311.content:
There it is. You said, seeing the prison in sight. You disappear and reappear on the roof. You break open a window and climb in.

Hmph. The janitor must not get paid enough to clean this place. You said. You sneak around to find Luke first. Get Luke out first. It should be easier to break everyone out with him. You said. You look around for his cell until you find a lone one and hear someone mumbling. Luke…. You said. You approach the cell and see him knelling down in a straight jacket. Jesus….. They treated him like he’s a loon. You said. You grip the bars to rip them open, but feel your power being sapped. What the? You said, letting go. The bars start to glow purple and you see a seal on them and under Luke. Good God…. What did they do? You said. They trapped him within his own mind. A voice said. You turn to see your dark half. Where the hell have you been? You said. I got caught. They were expecting a rescue. He said. For two day? You said. They had a cell all prep and ready for me. Like they were expecting Sue to give us to them. He said. Damn it, Sue. You said. So what do we do? He said. It’ll take a lot of magic just to brake the seal on the bars. And even more just to free him. You said. Didn’t he train you to use magic? He said. Not of this level. Only minor ones. Damn…..I hate to leave him trapped like this. You said. There’s nothing we can do. Let’s go get the others. Maybe Em can help. He said, going back inside you. Yeah. You said. You leave Luke’s cell.


They separated the guys. I better find them. You said. You look around and see an enforcer talking to someone in a cell. Thought you were pretty big, huh? Sitting in the master’s mansion. Now look at you. Right where you belong. She said. Come closer and say that. Not in front of the bars. Bruce said. I would, but that would ruin everything. I plan on making it slow and enjoy every minute of it. She said. Why wait? Are you scared of getting in trouble? You said. You’re just asking for it, aren’t you? She said. I’m right here. I’ll even give you 3 minutes to start off. Bruce said. Seems like class will starting early. She said. She opens the cell. Get over you- You grab her and slam her into the cell walls and then into the ground. Class is out. Permanently. You said, slamming her head into the ground one final time.

Knew you’d come. He said. Well you shot your mouth off back there. Only a matter of time before she got sick of it. You alright? You said. A damaged ego over surrendering, but I’ll heal. He said. Where are the others? You said. Scattered around, but I’m worried about the girls. He said. Me too. Sam and Kate won’t go against their principles, but Kris…. You said. She was a former enforcer. It won’t take much to make her go back to it. And Em. She’s scary when she wants to be, but if she falls…. He said. Nightmare fuel. We got to get them all out. You said. I’ve been here before and know the layout better. I can find the rest. He said. You get the guys out and head to O district. Only safe place for us. I’ll get the girls. You said. Right. But if you see Kyle and his elites, watch yourself. Something’s…..not right about them. He said. Noted. Get moving. You said. Bruce leaves the cell.

You leave the cell and go looking for the girls, but come up empty. They’re not here. Where would they….. Shit. You said. You head out of the prison and head to the arena.

You get there and see Sam, Kate, Em, and Kris. You said. (There they are.) You said. (Along with Kyle. And his thugs.) He said. You look at them and everything seems normal about them. (Look. It’s Soya.) He said. (Something tells me she was the one who orcastrated this entire thing.) You said. (I thought that fucking coward wouldn’t have the guts to show her face ever again after she bailed on her friends.) He said. (How did she even find out about magic?) You said. (Heather?) He said. (Wouldn’t put it past her. She’ll always looking for a way to get under my skin, but this is an extreme way to do it.)

Come now ladies. There’s no point in resisting. Kyle said. Says you! I’m no killer like your clowns here! Ugh! When I get this collar off. Kate said. You say that. But you worked with him. And I know he doesn’t let just anybody follow him. He’s made you kill before. Kyle said. Shows what you know….. He didn’t force us to do something that we didn’t like to do! Sam said. I find that hard to believe. Why else would he take one of my enforcers as his own. He said, looking at Kris. She was holds a man in her hands and her hands were trembling as he was. She was fighting every urge to crush him in her hands. She remembers the power and feeling of doing it. And the rush that followed. Then she remembered what you told her about self control and restraint. To take a former enforcer, he must have wanted killers. Right, Kris? He said. She looks at him. You remember the feeling of doing it, Kris. The power, the rush. It’s still there. He said. Don’t listen to him, Kris! Sam said. You know what you are, Kris. An enforcer. Keeping men in line was something you to pride in. He said. That’s not you anymore, Kris! Kate said. The conflict was killing her. To feel that rush again, to be feared again. Her fingers started to curl. Kris!! Sam said. The sound of Sam’s voice made her stop.

See? Deep down, you’ll always be an enforcer. He said. Always thought you knew everything, Kyle. You said, landing on Amy’s back; forcing her to the ground. I was wondering when you’d show. He said. Not hard to find you. Just look for the goon squad. You said. Guess that’s something w both have in common. He said. They came to me of their own free will. But I’m not here to argue. You said. I agree. I believe my girls have some….unfinished business with you. He said as Amy gets up to attack you. You stab her in the neck, but she pulls your knife out. I’m going to shove this down your throat….! She said. Still making threats. Nice. You said, head butting her. She stumbles back and you go to kick her when Luna catches your leg. (Fast…) You thought. You shift your weight to your other leg, but she catches that one too. Heh. You said. You put your hands on the ground and use your leg muscles to toss her. Before she crashes into the wall, Yumi catches her. (Teamwork? That’s new.) You thought. Come on. I’ll take on all of you. You said. Grrrr…..! Amy said, attacking you from behind. You catch her fist and punch her in the nose. As she stumbles back, you duck and leg sweep Luna as she comes at you and punch her into the ground. You disappear and reappear behind Kouki and Yumi and bang their heads together. You dash forward and headbutt Soya and pick her up by the throat.


I take it your responsible for them being back. You said. You know….. It all came to me when you punched me that day. As my nose bled and I tried not to slip into a coma, it left me with my thoughts. You’re not well liked. And someone like you must have more enemies than you could count. And wouldn’t you know it. Those girls who protect m district didn’t have a high opinion of you. We had a common enemy. You said. So Sue did make a deal with the devil. You said. You call it a deal. I call it getting everything back to normal. If there was someone like you out there in the world, who knows what else is there? And boy did I find it. There’s a lot of special people out there. And they hate you. So I proposed a deal: Bring back….my friends and the master, and M district won’t be touched again. And you would be taken care of. She said. And my friends were collateral!? You said. No. They were icing. Argh! She said as you increase your grip. You have no idea what kind of forces you’re playing with. You said. I should….be saying that….to you. She said. As she said that, Luna appears in front of you and hits your arm; making you drop Soya. Fucking…. You said. You punch her, but she grabs your fist and bends it. Ugh….! You said. You head butt her away and go to attack, but you’re intercepted by Koyuki. She slams you into the ground and you protect your face and kick her off. As you get up, you pull out your knife and go to stab her, but Amy grabs your arm. I said I’d force this into down your throat! She said. She rips the knife from your hand and stabs you with it. Rgh…. You said. You push her off you and are suddenly punched by Yumi. Then kicked by Koyuki. As you stumble, Soya throws you into the wall and your punch in the gut by Luna and Yumi. The force of the combined punch made your ribs crack and broke the wall. You knell over and spit out blood.

(What is this….? How are they….) You said. Your eyes change optical. (No wonder they hit so hard. Their bodies have been infused with magic. Sue didn’t bring them as they were when they died.) You thought. Move! Amy said. She pushes past her friends and grabs your head. I’m going to carve my name into your skin. And that’s only the beginning. She said. You eyes go wide as the knife gets closer; until Em tackles Amy to the ground. About time he finishes….. You said. Sam and Kate also rush the elites. What?! How did they break off the collars? Kyle said. I did. Your dark half said, grabbing him. T-two of oyou?! He said. There’s always been two. I’m the one you experimented on. And I’ve been waiting to pay you back. He said.

As Sam and Kate keep Luna, Koyuki, Soya, and Yumi busy and Em clawing at Amy, you sit there recovering. Then you feel a hand on your shoulder. You flinch and see it’s Kris. Kris…. You said. She looks over you worriedly and sees your wound. It’s nothing…. Argh. I can heal from this no problem. You said. The wound quickly heals up. See? You said. Unconvinced, she presses the button on your armband and you shrink back down. What are you…. You said. She picks you up and holds you against her chest as she runs out of the arena. Let’s go! Sam said. Her, Kate, and Em run after her, but not before Em grabs your dark half as he beats up Kyle. Hey! I’m not done yet! He shouts.
1311.title: At the prison

13111.content:
When Kris got to O district, she stopped. She pulls her hands back to see you. Kris…. Thanks. You said. ……I’m sorry. She said. You can speak? I took you for a mute. You said. I just chose not to talk. I couldn’t bring myself to speak to the guy who brought everything down. She said. I have a knack for making people mad. You said. You know I was a enforcer. I gave the men nightmares. You know how it felt to be working beside the same kind of people you spent your whole life filling with dread and terror? She said. Wasn’t an easy transition. I was the one who trained you all. You said. You gave me a hard time, yet you didn’t hold it against me. You basically gave me a second chances. Even though I hated your guts. She said. Had no reason to turn you away. Not like you did me anything. You said. And yet you did everything for me. You taught me restraint and control. Even when I had Cody in my hands and threaten to crush him, you didn’t beat or berate me. She said. It was a learning point for you and him. You said. You showed me I’m more than just some walking terror. Overtime, my hatred became caring. For you and the others. You said. I was surprised when I heard you stayed next to me when I was on bedrest. You said. Me too. First time I had someone to worry about. Although Em basically wanted to tear me to shreds over staying by your side. She said. Yeah. She has that appeal. You said.

When I held that man in my hands and saw the fear in his eyes, I felt like my old self. The fear, the power, the rush, the joy of knowing I had the power to end his life. It was….ecstatic. I felt like my old self. I almost gave in. I wanted to apologize for it. She said. Shit, no need to sorry. None of us are perfect. We all have our faults and weaknesses. You said. Y… You’re not mad? She said. Why would I be? We are who we are. You’re an enforcer and I’m a mercenary. We really aren’t the best of people. You said. So even if I did slip back into my old ways for a minute, you wouldn’t be upset? She said. Nope. Just be who and what you want to be. Why do you think I never went against Kyle in the first place? He just couldn’t leave well enough alone. You said. You see her eyes well up, then she clears them. T…thank you. She said. Don’t mention it. She said. After a minute, Sam, Kate, and Em show up.

I think we’re safe here. No one comes out this far. Kate said. I wasn’t done back there. You dark half fumes. Hey, girls! Over here! Tom shouts. The guys come out of hiding inside a building. Take it was a rough time for you as well? Dante said. Shock collars and re-education. Sam said. They were about to put mind control ones on us. Hank said. Wait. Where’s Luke? Bruce said. He’s still in the prison. His cell was….special. I couldn’t get him out. You said. So…. What do we do? Cody said. We got enemies all around us. Sue and the army. Kyle and his thugs. You said. Is it really true that Ashley did this? Dante said. She did. Brought one tyrant to take out another. In her demented mind, I’m worst than Kyle. All because I sat on the side lines. You said. She really thinks that? You’re not the one who did all those horrible atrocities. Cody said. I did nothing to stop them either. She said I’m just as guilty. You said. So why would she bring him back? And how did she? Bruce said. Magic. Sue knew how dangerous Kyle is. She didn’t think the deal would be kept. But with magic, it would be. She really wanted to keep M district safe. You said. But how I M district more safe with Kyle back? Kate said. The girls will listen to him. No one is going to cross him and his elites. And if they do, Sue’s right there to meet them. You said. This is a deal made in hell. Hank said. A deal that’s about to be broken. What’s the plan? Tom said.

We have to be subtle. Our enemies are working together. I can’t go into M district. Sue and her band are waiting for me. But…. They aren’t waiting on you guys. You said. Meaning….? Dante said. Sue knows what I look like. But not you boys. You have free access to m district. You said. I see…. Go in and sabotage. Bruce said. More like sleeper agents. When I’m done with Kyle, Sue’s next. I want you all to go there and plant yourselves as civilians and extra help. Find Kira, Kim, and Susan and neutralize them. That leaves Sue all alone. You said. By that you mean kill? Hank said. We’ll cross that bridge when we get there. You said. And Kyle? What about him? Kris said. Kris…. You talk? Tom said. She just preferred not to. I’ll deal with him. ….And there’s only one way for that. In the meantime, you guys get going. I have someone to meet. You said. With your instructions given, the guys and girls head out to m district. Who are we meeting? He said. An old acquaintance. You said.

You head to Alexia’s building. When you get there, you head inside. Alexia. Where are you? You said. Out of the darkness, she appears. Still alive, I see. She said. You thought some witches would do me in? You said. Not really. She said. Time you start talking. You said. What do you mean? She said. You know a lot more than you’re letting on. You knew heather like it was the back of your hand. You told me where to find where the witch’s were all staying. You said. And that’s weird how? She said. You either are a witch. Or….. A hunter? You said. A hunter? You mean witch hunter? That’s crazy. She said. Drop the act. Luke told me everything, and I can feel and sense the magic in you. You said. *Sigh*…..Very well. She said. With a snap of her fingers, her clothing changing black and red and a marking appear on her right forearm.

You don’t look like a witch. You’re a witch hunter. You said. Give the man his prize. He’s right. I’m a witch hunter. She said. (Damn….) He said. So…. Where’s Luke? I don’t see him. Or feel him lurking in the shadows. She said. He’s been captured. You said. Captured? By who? She said. Kyle. Ashley brought him back and made a deal with him. Luke’s locked up in a cell and trapped inside his own mind. You said. Shit…. She said. The seal holding him is strong and I’m still in training on magic. I don’t usually do this. But…. I need help. You said. It killed you to say that just now. She said. I don’t have time for jokes. Luke needs my help. Whatever you want, I’ll do if you help me. You said. No need to offer yourself up like that. I was going to help you anyway. She said. (Your negotiating skills need work.) He said. Usually, it’d take years to become fully prepared. But… I’ll send you on the expressed course. She said. Express course? You said. Show respect to the hunters. She said. She says an incantation and you are engulfed in a purple light.

Luke…. You better be right about him…. Or I just sent another man to his death. She said.

Ohhh… My head. You said. You look around and see you’re in what looks like a wooden shack. This looks like a mead hall. You said. (These hunters take up after the Vikings?) He said. You look at the table and see names etched into it. Cor, Od, Val, Sigmour…. Old European names. You said. You walk up to the throne. (Whose butt sat in this? Puts Kyle’s one to shame.) He said. You touch the throne. This…..is made out of gold. You said. (Real gold?) He said. (Real as the sun. And it shows no sign of age or decay.) You said. You see a name printed on the bottom. Lord Argus…. You said. (Is it bad that I want my name etched in gold now?) He said. (What happen to blood?) You said. (I’ll take either. Or both.) He said. You sense someone behind you. You turn to punch him, but he catches your fist. You try again and he catches your other fist. He kicks your leg out from under you and you fall down. He goes for a knee to your chin and you move and elbow him in the side. Tch…! He said. He then punches you on the head, but you disappear and reappear right into his punch. Ack….! (He…..anticipated me movement.) You said. Not only do you feel your bones break, but a few organs rupture as well. You are sent crashing into the wooden wall and slump over as you cough up blood. (That…..was no regular hit.) you thought. You see him come charging when another guy appears in front of him and stops him.


Come now, Cor. Is that how you treat guests? He said. He comes to a full stop and looks on reluctant. No one touches Lord Argus’ seat. He said. Rules were meant to be broken. Even Argus himself said so. He said. (These two are polar opposites. Cor’s no nonsense and strict. The other guy is up beat and without a care.) You thought. You get up and he’s right beside you. Ohhhh! A new prospect to join! I think he has what it takes. He said. This isn’t a kids’ club Od. You can’t just let everyone in. Cor said. Aww. No one wants to join if the trials are too hard. He said. They’re meant too weed out the weaklings. The others agreed. He said. Others….? You said. Out of thin air, the hunters appeared in their seats and you see a old man in gold armor appeared in the throne seat. (Oh fuck…..) You both said.
13111.title: In O district

131111.content:
Another one…. It’s that time of the year already? One of them said. I’m telling you, lower the requirements and we’d have a bigger influx. Od said. And let just anybody join and run the witch hunter name into the mud? No way. He already defiles this place by touching the throne chair and his blood. Cor said. Maybe if you didn’t rupture 4 of his organs, he wouldn’t be spitting it everywhere. Od said. Enough, you two. You. Get up. The one closest to Argus said. You get up like nothing as your body was already done healing.

So. You’re here to become a hunter? One of them said. Yes. You said. You don’t look like someone who’s been crossed by witches. Or a former slave of one. Cor said. I’m nobody’s slave. And believe me, I was crossed by them. And took my revenge. You said. He speaks truth. I smell a lot of witch blood on him. And their magical essence. (One foot in the door.) He said. It takes a lot more than killing a few witches to be called a hunter. Cor said. I didn’t kill a few. I killed an entire coven. You said. A coven?! By yourself?! Nonsense! Cor said. It’s the truth. You said. It….is. The magical essence I felt. Not a few, but it is a coven. He said. Are you positive Val? One said. No doubt, Seymour. He’s been to a coven and survived. Val said. ……So your reason is revenge? Is that it? Cor said. No…. I share your disdain for them, but it’s not out of vengeance. You said. Then why are you here? He said. ……My friends. I want to protect them. You said. Your friends!? Cor said. That’s a new one. Seymour said. Out of all the reasons, that has to be the most thoughtful one. Val said. Not only that. Luke….. He’s in trouble. You said. Luke? He’s still alive, the old bastard. Val said. What kind of trouble? Seymour said. He’s been trapped inside his own mind. And the seal protecting him is more difficult than I can handle. You said. Trapped him inside his own mind? That’s not pleasant. Od said. And not easy. Whoever did this must be serious. Val said. A deal made in hell started it all. Someone who’s been a pain for far too long. You said. So you want to become a hunter to protect your friends and save Luke? He said. If that makes me look weak to you, fine. But I’m sticking to that reason. My friends are the reason I want to become a hunter. You said.


…..Argus? Val said. ……These….friends of yours. You must care for them deeply. He said. I do. They are all I have left. You said. How….far are you willing to go for them? You said. The coven I wiped out…. It was because one of my friends was killed by a witch. You said. *Sniff* Couldn’t be for a nobler cause. Od said. I’m willing to go any distance. You said. …..Very well. The trails start now. He said. He’s already manage to hit Cor. He’s already ahead of the game. Od said. There’s a lot more to be done than that, Od. Seymour said. Cor then punches you hard enough to go right through your stomach. Ugh….! You said. As much pain you’re in, you don’t fall. Ohhh! One be able to one hit this one, Cor. Od said. We’ll see. The trails have just started. Cor said.


Back in m district.

These guys sure are spooked. They’re setting up some major defenses. Bruce said. Rightful so. The commander got out and they’re scared he’ll kill them all. Dante said. Do we even know what these girls look like? Hank said. Look for someone standing 100ft over you. Tom said. Smartass…. Hank said. Enough. Once we find them, stay close to them, and wait until the commander comes. Bruce said. I advise not too close unless you want to be stepped on. Tom said. These girls watch where they step. Still. Stay out of sight. Dante said. Where are the girls going to be? Cody said. They’ll wait for our signal. Remember, we go we the commander gets her and starts wrecking shit. Bruce said. So…. Anyone have any love lost for this place? Tom said. It was shit before and it’s shit now. Hank said. Is it wrong that I preferred the prison over this place? Dante said. At least in there, you know you were going to eat and not be eaten. Hank said.


Back to you.


You breath in and out. Good. Focus. The more focus, the more potent the magic. Now. Repeat after me. Varic dez. Val said. Varic dez. You said. On the ground, a purple symbol appears and a beam of energy erupts from it. Good. Practice makes perfect. Again. He said. You focus your magic. Varic dez. You said. The symbol forms and a beam erupts. Try to make two of them. He said. You focus your magic and sense someone. You block an attack from behind and the side. Varic dez! You said, disappearing as two symbols appear under Od and Cor’s feet. Vordus! They both said. The symbols disappear and you reappear next to Val. Impressive….. I see what Luke saw in you. He said. I had a lot to prove for him to even take me seriously. You said. You still have some proving to do. Cor said. Oh, lighten up, mr. mood. He’s going strong. If he performed poorly, Val would have attacked him and not us. Od said. ……Just be ready. Your trails are over yet! Cor said. I see where Luke gets his seriousness from. You said. Remember, as powerful and helpful as magic is, It comes with a price. Val said. Price? You said. It will take something from you in exchange for its use. He said. Is….that with anyone who uses it? You said. If it likes you. If it doesn’t rend the flesh from your bones, it will take a piece of you as payment. He said. A piece of me? Like my flesh or blood? You said. It could be anything. Your sanity, muscles, sight, hearing, anything. He said. Guess that explains the stick in Cor’s ass. You said. Grrrr…. He said. Once you get to know him, he’s just a teddy bear. He just likes to give people a hard time. Od said. Enough. We’re far from done. Val said.


You continue your magic training with Val and luckily it didn’t rend your flesh of your bones and continued training with Seymour next.

Why isn’t one hunter allowed to hunt in another hunter’s territory? He said. To prevent staring a conflict between the two. You said. Who were the two hunters who always tried to one up each other and got that rule in place? He said. Germond and Gerland. Two competitive brothers that there contest got them killed. You said. If two hunters’ can’t resolve their problems and must fight, what is the one requirement? He said. They must have a third hunter to oversee the fight. To make sure one does not kill the other. You said. Well done. Being a hunter is more than knowledge of magic and fighting. You must also have a brain. No body wants a dullard. He said. Yes. You said. Now, let’s pick up where we left off. He said.

Under Seymour, you learned about the hunter’s history and rules, and even learned how to think multiple steps ahead of the enemy.


After a grueling tutelage and near fatal hunter fight training under Cor, you stand before Lord Argus. Well? He said. Val stands up. He showed profound use of magic. He manage to bless his own weapon without my help and doesn’t use it as a crutch. Val said and sat down as Seymour stood up. He hasa brain in there. He listed the rules I asked him to list and names of the hunters behind the specific rules. He said and sat down as Cor and Od stood up. Cor. Argus said. He…..showed exemplary fighting skills. He thinks before heading in and plans out his attacks to a micro level. He has back plans for his back ups. He said. He kept Cor on his toes. Made him sweat a little and made him uses magic. Od said. Really? Is that true? Argus said. ……He did. He’s one of the few people who made me think. He said. And that’s not easy. Od said. …..Knell. He said. You get on one knee as he stands up and pulls out his sword and traces it from shoulder to shoulder. Under intense conditions and odds, you have survived the trails laid out upon you. You did not falter or waiver and when beaten, got back up. I decree you as an official witch hunter. Arise. He said. You stand up. Told you. Od said. Hunter. Val said. Hunter. Seymour said. Hunter. Od said. ……..Hunter. Cor said. As they said that, a portal opens up. I will not disappoint you, Lord Argus. You said before walking through.
131111.title: Becoming a hunter

1311111.content:
You step out of the portal. Still alive, I see. Alexia said. You doubted me? You said. The odds of becoming a hunter are 1:50. She said. Guess I was the one. How long was I gone for? You said. Only a day. Time moves slowly there. She said. I have things to do. You said. You want back up? She said. You can come if you wish. You said, leaving. You head to the prison and make your way to Luke’s cell.

(He’s still in there. Hope all that training paid off.) He said. You put your hand on the bars. Kila ma don zeni a zuk. You said. The seal shatters and you pry open the bars. You walk up to Luke said cut the straight jacket off him. Hang on, Luke. You said. You put your hand on his head. Dura ga ba li mon cu sera. You said. Your hand glows and Luke stops muttering. You grit your teeth as you feel the madness and insanity flow through you. Zuka hil dorus! You said. You expel the madness and insanity from you and take your hand off Luke.


Luke…. You said. His head moves up slowly and the anger is showing in his eyes. Where…..is…..he? he said. The mansion. As always. You said. I’ll cast his ass into an acid pit for locking me inside my mind! He said. Calm down. You’ve been out of it for a while and your body is still recovering. You need to take it easy. You said. I’ll take it easy when I’m using his head as coaster for my beer. He said. (Why didn’t I think of that? That’s better than his head over the fire place.) He said. You’ll be rushing in there and be right back in here. I’ll handle him. You said. You’re not a full fledge hunter yet. He said. I am now. Argus made me official. You said. A….Argus himself!? How did….. How do you even know the spell for the accelerated course? He said. Alexia helped me. You said. Alexia…. I told her not to interfere with your training. He said. I went to her. It seemed fishy that she knew all about Heather. You said. So….you’re a hunter now? He said. Fully. Em’s waiting on you in o district. You said. Are….. Are you giving me a command? He said. No. That’d impede on one of our founding principles. You said. And what is that? He said. Freedom and it’s choices. You said. Spoken like a hunter. Very well. You got 5 hours before I take care of Kyle myself. He said, disappearing. Of course you will. You said. You walk out of the prison.


(If Kyle and his goons did that to Luke, can we even do anything against them?) he said. (Scared?) You said. (No. I just want to know if we have a plan.) he said. (Don’t I always.) You said. You head to the mansion and appear on the roof. You look down to see Kyle and his goons. (Take the elites, I get Kyle. We have some catching up to do.) He said. (…..Fair enough.) You said.

So what are we getting out of this? This seems pretty one sided. Amy said. We don’t touch their precious little district, and we et to do whatever we want to with the men we have in the prison. Soya said. That’s no fun. Plus, it’s only half filled. Not enough men to torture for the enforcers. Or ourselves. Luna said. They can’t keep count of every single man there. Why not steal some? Yumi said. They’ll know we’re coming and who did it. Soya said. Don’t we have any that knew their place in there? Koyuki said. They’ve all returned to the prison. So have the ones afraid of him. Soya said. (Nice to see we still inspire some terror.) He said. So we just stay out of their district and we get to do what we want? Kyle said. Yeah. Pretty much. Soya said. Like I said, one sided. They get to keep ¼ of the men that were in the prison. Amy said. We’ll find a way to get more. We just have to be smart about it? Luna said. And him? Koyuki said. M district gets him. They want him to stay locked up? Soya said. Locked up? That’s too slow! Where’s the death sentence?! Amy said. They’re not like us. They don’t kill their prisoners. The worst offender there has a life sentence, yet he has a pretty cushy cell and gets fed whatever he wants. Soya said. ……Then they better not feed him or anything. Or sleep. Amy said. (Fed whatever he wants? Cozy cell? Sue really is a bleeding heart.) He said. (I didn’t even get to my first meal.) You said.

So where do we go from here? Amy said. We could try to pick up where we left off. Yumi said. Couldn’t agree fucking more. You said. You drop down right onto Soya, knocking her out cold. What the?! You!! Amy said. (Go!) You said. You dark half leaves you as you charge Amy through a wall. Yumi, Luna and Koyuki follow after you.

As Kyle comes to his senses, your dark half kicks him in the gut. Hello, Kyle. Now….. Let’s pick up where we left off. He said.

You stop when you get outside and throw her to the ground. GRRR! You’re going to wish you stayed in m district!! She said. Right…. You said. You got away last time…. This time, no one will save you. She said. …..Who said I need saving? You said. You ill when I claw your heart out! She said. She disappear and reappear right in front of you. You punch right through her. Ack…..! She said. So simple….. You said. Just as she falls down to ground the others show up. AMY!!! Luna shouts. Calvary’s here. You said. You…..BASTARD!! Luna shouts. She come charging at you. …..Hmph. You said. You catch her by the throat and raise her off the ground. Let her go! Yumi said. ……With pleasure. You said. You snap her neck and drop her. NO!!! Yumi said. Before she could react, you toss your knife into her neck and slice her head off. You then stab Koyuki. Argh….. She said. You move your knife across her stomach and slice through her. ……Bitch. You said. (They should be back up about…..) You said. One by one, their bodies get back up. The gaping wound in Amy’s chest closes up. Yumi’s body picks up her head and reattaches it. Luna snaps her neck back into position and Koyuki’s lower body reattaches with it’s upper one.

(Looks like Sue’s magic did more than just bring them back.) You thought. You’re going to pay for that….. Severely!! Amy said.

In o district.

Can’t believe I let him put me in that state. This is going to be the longest 5 hours of my life. Luke said. Good things come to those who wait. A voice said. You got some nerve Alexia. I told you to stay out of it. Luke said. She appears behind him, but is not 100ft. Oh, come on. You know it takes a village. She said. Unless said village is wiped out. Luke said. So is it true? Where you trapped in your own mind? She said. I don’t want to talk about it. He said. *Snickers* How did that happen? I thought nothing took you by surprise. She said. It’s not often when I am taken by surprise. Ashley must have imbued them with magic. He said. Ashley? The one who hangs out around m district? The one who made the “deal in hell”? She said. That one. She only thinks of the right now instead of the future. Luke said. She either really hates him, or really wants to protect M district. …..Should we help him? She said. No. This is his trail by fire. Plus, I gave him 5 hours to do it. Then I get my chance. He said. We really should look after each other more. There’s not that many left of us out there in the world. She said. We do, but we still have t rely on our own power. We become like the witches if we rely on each other too much. He said.
1311111.title: continue

13111111.content:
Back to your pov.

You trip and slam your knife into Luna as she falls to the ground. You disappear and reappear behind Amy as she tried to grab you. You punch her on heart and she collapses, but she gets right back up like the others do. (Seems like the magic has linked their bodies together. They get back up as soon as they all hit the ground.) You said. He…. Hehehe….. The more you do this, the slower you’re going to suffer. Amy said. You say that every time, Amy. And you never follow through. You said. Then….i guess it’s time to. She said. Her eyes start glowing purple and she disappears. (Looks like the magic has taken her over completely.) You thought. Now…. Where are your vitals spots? She said. You close your eyes and sense her out. Right….there! She said. You sense her behind you and kick her in the chin. Ugh….! How did…. She said. You go to slice her, but Kouyki grabs your hand. We’ve played with you long enough. She said. (Her eyes too. I think it’s all of them.) You thought. You kick her off you and she catches your fist. (Huh?) You thought. You disappear and reappear to avoid Yumi sneaking up behind you. You kick her into koyuki and the fall over onto Amy. (Almost didn’t sense her. It’s like she was a….shadow.) You said. You then punch Luna and when she returns the favor, you catch her fist and headbutt her back. Ugh…. GRRR! She said.

(Something’s…..not right. They’ve changed. It’s like they’re….. No. It can’t be.) You said. You sense the magic in the building. (They’re…..turning into witches? How is that….? The magic. It’s running rampant and unchecked to the point of altering their bodies. This keeps up, I’ll be facing a shadow, two umbrans, and a siren. Time to end this.) You said. You close your eyes and concentrate. Don’t give up now. We’re just starting! Amy said. Your hands start to glow a dark purple. …..Time to return you all back to the grave. Catoris. You said. A circle appears under them and bind their movement. What the?! Koyuki said. Alto zion dia cazo haz! You said. Out of the ground, multiple hands come up and drag them back to hell as they fought them off. No! Get off me! Amy said. Slowly but surely, they are pulled down. Your hands stop glowing and you turn back to the mansion.

When you get there, you see your dark half with his bloody hands holding Kyle’s head. You’ve been….busy. You said. No one experiments on me. He said, tossing the head away. So are they gone? He said. Yeah. You said. You say the spell again and the arms drag Kyle’s body and head down to hell. And what about Soya? He said. Leaving her alive was a mistake I won’t make again. You said. You say the spell one last time and Soya follows her friends down. Hopefully, an alive one earns me a few brownie points. You said. Then that’s all that’s left is m district. But they’re prepared for us. Not like it will help. He said. It won’t. Doesn’t mean we get to be reckless. But maybe that’s just what we need. You said, looking at your dark half. What? He said. …..How would you like to finally go on that rampage of yours? You said. You better not be shitting me. He said. I’m not. I just thought of something that will really need your apt of destruction and death. You said. You had me at destruction. He said. First, we need to make a slight change. You said


An hour later.

You’re walking up to m district and see a heavy barricade with soldiers and turrets. They had a long time to prepare. And quickly too. You said. You walk up to the barricade and see a red flare going off. They know I’m coming now. I’ll just let myself in. You said. You blast open the door and the explosion takes out everyone on the barricade. You step over the barricade and head deeper in.

As you walk through, you see multiple tanks and soldiers coming. Not enough…. You said. You toss an energy ball at them and the explosion consumes all of them. Heh… You said. You disappear and reappear over the crater and continue. Let’s have some fun. You said. You fire multiple energy balls in random directions and destroy building and set them on fire. The screams should draw Sue out. You said. You then hear a jet fly over. Hm? You said. You see a few flying over you and starts firing missiles. You hold out your hand and from each finger, a beam fires; destroying the oncoming missiles and jets. Two blow up instantly while the third crashes into the ground. Nice…. You said.

You keep going, reeking death and destruction on everyone and everything. All this Sue….. Where are you? You said. Right fucking here! She said. You disappear and reappear as her fist hits the ground. You reappear at 100ft. About time, Sue. Thought I had to kill everyone here to draw you out. You said. I knew it was risk. To use one tyrant to dispose another, but if it meant safety for m district, I’d do it again. She said. You really thought that you could use magic to control them? Keep them in line and dance like puppets on a string. You said. Don’t you dare judge me! I did it to protect m district! All you care about is yourself! You’d kill everyone here if it meant money. She said. Don’t think you’re any better than me, Sue. You’re not as clean as you think. You said. What do you mean? She said. Here. You said. You toss the notebook at her feet. I think you know what that is. You said. This is…. How did you….? She said. Your little coven of witches is gone. I found this in your former room, and I have to say, I’m disgusted. I’ve been a better person than you. You said. Ashley flips through the pages. I’ve read everything. You’re no better than your sisters. You said. I’m….not like them. She said. The hell you are! How you killed your first slave. You used them for your sick pleasures and practice your dark arts on them. You’re sick! You said.

I…!!! She said. And the worst one was what you did to a Catholic priest. You said. Her eyes go wide. You’re a sick, perverted woman! Not only did you force him to renounce his faith, you also made him call you a god! And what you made him do after….. The deepest part of hell isn’t enough for you. She said. N….No…. That’s not….. She said. All the memories of her time as a witch came flooding back. All the horrible things she did. Killing, enslaving, all of it came back. And you call yourself a protector, and have the guts to call me out? You said. I’m…. That’s…. That’s not me anymore!! She said, throwing the journal away. You’ll always be a witch. And everything you’ve done is a reflection of it. All you’ve done was make things worse. You just couldn’t leave things as they were. They had to be on your terms or none at all. Like a true witch. You said. All I wanted to do was protect people!! She said. You can’t protect anyone. All this on death and destruction on your watch, Sue. Leave it to a witch to watch as people suffer. You said. SHUT UP!!!! She screams as the markings on her body glow brightly and spread across her body. If protecting m district makes me a bad person, then fine! I’ll gladly burn in hell knowing I protected this place from people like you! She said. That last part can be arrange. One less bitch and Mary Sue in the world. I’ll be doing everyone a favor. You said. I’m not going alone. I’ll take you with me! She said. Sorry, Sue. But this trip is made for one person. You said.

You appear behind her and shove your fist through her chest. Ugh….! She said looking down. You kick her down to the ground. You sounded serious back there. You said. I was. These whores are disgusting. Your dark half said as his eyes change back to red. T….two of you…..? She said, coughing blood. Still alive? Don’t die easily. He said. There’s always been two of us. You and Kyle weren’t smart enough to know that. You said. All this, Sue. On your head. Just couldn’t leave well enough alone. I just *cough* *cough* wanted to keep them safe….! Living in fear every single second of their lives. Seen…..no higher than dirt. Treated as slaves the second they are born. And for what?! Just *gasp* because they were born a man? She said. That’s life, Sue. It doesn’t always go your way. You said. But why this way? Who….decided it to be like this? She said. Life is what you make of it. You go around letting people walk all over you and dictate you, all you’ll be is a slave. Your dark half said. All that was needed…..was a spark. To ignite a revolt. To turn….things around. Someone…..needed to be the hero…. She said. And look what that got ya. Come on, we’re done here. He said. You turn and walk away. P….please…. She said, making you stop.

P…please….. There’s a heart somewhere inside you. You’re a good person, I know it….. You’re not evil. Not like the master was. Just misunderstood. She said. You grit your teeth and clench your fist as she coughs up a storm. Please… I’m *violent cough* begging you….. Protect m district….. You’re….all that left…. She said with her last breath.

About time. Come on. The guys are waiting. He said. Taking one last look, you head out as your ark half goes inside you.
13111111.title: continue

131111111.content:
You walk down the street as you look at the destruction. (Jesus, man. Give wanton destruction a new meaning.) You said. (It’s what I do.) He said. You kept going until you saw the guys with Kira, Kim, and Susan all bounded and on their knees. (A little shocked they were able to do this.) You said. (They had good teachers.) He said. (Is that praise?) You said. (Don’t get use to it.) He said.

Let us go! Kira said as she struggled. I said keep still! Bruce said, hitting her with the butt of his gun. Nice job. Keep your distance from that one. She’s….unstable. You said. I’ll show you unstable you- Sit your ass down! Dante interrupts by shoving her into the ground. Ugh! What’s this all about!? That deal we broker with the master? Kim said. We got a smart one on our hands. You said. Where’s Ashley!? Kira said. Ead. Like should have stayed. You said. YOU….!!!! Kira seethes. A…. Ashley….. Kim said. You just had to have more. Couldn’t leave well enough alone. And look what that got you! Your precious m district in flames. You said. Someone had to look after them. You were a bomb just waiting to be set off as soon as someone paid you to do so! You’d kill your own mother if paid enough! Kira said. How I earn a living. Speaking of living….. You said. Burning the district to the ground wasn’t enough for you? You want to kill us too!? Kim said. Cut the head of a serpent and the body dies. Or in your case, heads. You said. You hear him, right?! This is the man you guys swore to follow?! All this destruction to prove a point and it’s not enough for him! It never will be enough! Kira said. Zip it! Bruce said with a kick to the gut.

There’s been enough death and misery today. We were wrong for what we did. No more lives need to be taken. Susan said. You are the last person I want to hear from. You spout all that nonsense, but you and your kind are twisted. And I’ll end everyone of you. You said. As she looks in your eyes, she sees the hatred and anger in them. My god…. You’ve become a…. Susan said. Quiet! Get rib of them. And burn that one’s body. Make sure it’s complete ash. You said. Yes, sir. Bruce said. As you turn and walk away, you hear the sound blood gurgling. (So…. Does this mean I get this place as a playground?) He said.

When you get back to the mansion, you look out at the m district. The preteens and teens are going to have a field day on our scraps. He said. Assuming they don’t think I protect it. You said. Heh. And here I thought you listen to Sue’s last words. He said. Why would I follow the words of a witch? You said. You looked like you listened to her because you stopped walking. He said. I was angry that after all this time, she still barked up that tree after all this time. You said. Guess it was just lost on her. He said before going back inside you. (With Kyle gone and Sue’s band taken care of, we sit at the table alone. As it should be.) He said. You see Em and Luke walk in.

I see you hogged all the fun for yourself. Luke said. You gave me 5 hours to get it done. You said. A mistake on my part. Gave you more time than I should have allowed. Shit, you didn’t even keep the head around for me. He said. Take it up with my dark half. He’s the one who ripped him apart. You said. Well, my day just got cleared. I was going to take my time skinning and cleaning his skull. Luke said. If you hurry to m district, you’ll find a lot of bodies not needing them. Plus 4 special ones. You said. Special ones?! Keep the lights on for me. He said as he vanishes. That man loves his skull collection. You said. (Tell me about it.) Em said. You turn your head towards Em. D…did you…. You said. (Speak to you in your head? Of course. I can finally talk to you.) She said. I….thought you were a mute. Like Kris was. Neither of you spoke. You said. (Kris was just being moody. I really had no way to speak to you.) She said. That mouth of yours…. You said. (It’s a long story, but first….) She said, grabbing you and hugging you tightly. (I’m so happy I can finally speak to you!) She said. (Great….. Two voices in my head now.) (Just remember, I was your first.) He said.

After a while, the guys come back followed by the girls. Took longer than I thought. You said. We wanted to make sure that one we burned was good and gone. Bruce said. We also scatted her ashes to the wind. Tom said. Good. One less problem to deal with. You said. We also saw Luke. He was cutting off heads like a kid in a candy shop. Cody said. It his….hobby. Good work all around. You said.
131111111.title: Final blow

1311111111.content:
As the days go by, it’s like the world is waiting with baited breathe over what will happen now. With Ashley and her friends gone, m district is wide open. And the preteens and teens know this.

Sir, I’ve got movement on hundreds of those monsters moving on m district. Dante said. Now? Why did they wait so long? You think they’d followed after we left. You said. I think they were waiting on you. To see if you were going to take over. He said. Like I’d do Sue any favors. You said. You head up to the roof and watch from the mansion with binoculars. (Look at them all. It’s like a feeding frenzy.) You said. (They’re finally letting out all that steam. Sue kept them back for years. The prison was an outlet for them and that went up in smoke. They’re making up for lost time.) He said. (At this rate, m district is going to be wiped off the map.) You said. (Can I join? Mindless destruction is my favorite.) He said. (Yeah, and you’ll kill everyone there.) You said. You watch as it all goes down and from there, you can hear multiple monstrous roaring. Like the trumpets of Jericho…. You said.

After a while, you head into m district and devastation isn’t the word to describe it. Jesus….. They showed no mercy here. Crushed bodies, missing limbs, ruined buildings…. You said. (Makes o district look clean.) He said. You continue to walk through; looking at the aftermath. (So now that m district is a wasteland, what are these girls going to do for fun now?) he said. (They laid waste to here, that’s for sure, but they didn’t take everyone.) You said. (Why not?) he said. (Like you said, where’s all the fun if it’s over in one go? They took 95% of the men here.) You said. (Which would leave only 5% behind. So they can still have fun in this place.) He said. (Right. So even if the remaining men here manage to rebuild, those monsters will be right back here to topple and take them.) You said. (Making m district their official playground. These bitches aren’t as clueless as I thought. I bet Sue is furious right about now.) He said. (She can be that way. This is what she gets for being a hero.) You said. As you walk, your device goes off.

Sir, Not to rush your expedition, but could you hurry it up a little? Dante said. Why? Is something wrong? You said. No. Well, Em is pacing back and forth like a mad woman and giving everyone a death glare. And Luke is busy with his skull cleaning to keep a leash on her. He said. Did you tell her that there is no danger out here? You said. Tom did, and he’s currently having his ribs tended to. He said. Damnit, Em. Tell her I’ll be back soon. You said. (Violent little thing, isn’t she?) He said. As you finish up looking around, you hear singing. That voice….. Heather…. You said. You quickly follow the sound until you see her.

Well, if it isn’t my favorite person in the world. She said. Only you would be out here in the middle of all this and singing. You said. Isn’t it wonderful? All this death and destruction…. How can I not? She said. You witches are sick and demented. You said. Is that you talking or that garbage hunter nonsense? She said. It’s a damn fact. You said.
