There's got to be a way out. I refuse to be held captive! You said. As you brainstorm, you remember something while you were with Gavin.

Flashback.

She's a witch, Gavin. How does the idea of sex with her not repulse you? You said. I wasn't for it either. I throw up when I thought about it. But it's something a gentleman has to do. He said. Gentlemen don't get in bar fights. You said. One time. But anyway, it was something i had to do. She....is my wife after all. You said. So.... Is it any different that with a regular woman? You said. Much. It's a lot of feelings and passion. Her body tunes to yours. The magic becomes wild and your her only focus. Her job will be to satisfy you in anyway possible. As will you. That's the only downside. Plus, my abilities are 2x better post wise. He said. You mean your magic becomes stronger after sex with her? You said. Yeah. With all that emotion and passion running wild, it has nowhere to go but me or her. After having sex with a witch, you'll never go back to a regular girl. It wouldn't feel the same. He said.

End of flashback.

Magic becomes stronger with all that emotion and passion in the air. I can do that. Only downside is......sex......with Heather. You said in disgust. Your stomach turns and you puke on the spot. But if i want to get out of here, i got to do it. They do it all the time in those spy movies. I think i can handle it. You said. You pull yourself together and look for her.

How in the fuck can she afford a nice house like this? Her living has a living room. You said. You find her in what looks like a practice room as you see makeshift dummies that have been blasted multiple times.

Heather.... You said. No. I'm not letting down the seal. You can threaten or beg me all you want, but i'm not changing my mind. She said. You walk up behind her and turn her around. She had her hands glowing to stop you, but you quickly pull her to you and kiss her. This shocked her and her hands stop glowing. You pulled her hood off and stroke her long hair. You then brake the kiss. What.....? She said stunned. Heather..... I didn't mean to come off as mean earlier. I was frighten. I still am. I need you, Heather. Now more than anything. You said. Her heart skipped a beat as you said that you need her, and was coming onto her. Finally..... She said. Heather kisses you back and wrapped her arms around you. You want to hurl again.

Just relax..... And let me make all your fears go away. She said. With you in her arms, you both disappear and reappear in her room and on the bed. She kisses your neck and bites gently on your ear. I'll take care of you. I promise. She whispers to you. She rubs your chest as her hand glows and your clothes disappear onto the floor. And so do hers. I've waited a long time for you to come around. She said. (Jesus forgive me.....) You thought.

Now.... Let's indulge in each others fantasies. She said as her eyes glow purple. (God.....) You thought as she climbs on top of you.


After what feel like hours, you sneak out of her bed and put your clothes on. Forgive me, father. For i have sinned. You said. You head to the door and the seal pops up. Please...... After all i've suffered.... Briktakos. You said. Your had starts to glow and you punch the seal and break it. Thank you..... You said. You open the door and leave.

This Lilith...... The other hunters must know something. If nothing else, i can help them. You said. You disappear and reappear in merry old England.

If they are suffering like i am, they'd be in hiding. I know where Gavin would be. You said. You head to the local Pub. Empty. Lights out, but all the drinks are gone. Gavin..... You said. You head inside and pulled to the side. Get in here and stay down! Gavin said.

You're taking this well. You said. Yeah..... The legendary stoicism of the British is all over my face. He said. Nice to see the moon hasn't stopped your need to drink. You said. Well, best to do what i do best. Drink. He said. Where's Isle? You said. Out there..... Stalking the damn streets for me. He said as you both hear footsteps. Christ..... He said. You peek out to Isabel walking the streets with a demented smile. Gavin~ Where are you? I just want to make sure you're ok. I'm your wife after all. And i don't want anything to happen to you. She said. Sweet words with malice intent. I barely escaped my house. He said. So i'm not the only one with problems. You said. We all suffer under that damn moon. He said. We all are going to suffer. You know a Lilith? He said. Gavin's face goes pale. L....l.....Lilith.... That devil is back?! And walking among us!?! He said. Yeah.... She beat up Luke and has my friends under some kind of mind control. You said. That's the least of our worries! The whole world is doomed! He said.

Is she that bad? You said. Yes! She enslaved countless people and towns. Not to mention she's methodical in torture. She picked a damn good day to come back. We're so fucked! He said. Pull yourself together. Nothing we haven't done before. We'll take it one step at a time. First, getting away from your wife. You said.How? She's been tracking me for a long time. He said. Just stay here. You said. You push the door open and sneak up behind Isabel.

Hehehe.... Gavin~ Come on out, dear. All i want to do is keep you safe. I know your close. She said. You wait until she stops and stab her in the neck and slit her throat from ear to ear. You push her down and bind her to the ground. Let's go! You said. You both run to a safe distance.

You have magic? How? He said. I had to commit a great sin. You said. You mean you.... Oh my! He said. It was the only way i could escape. I need an acid bath. You said. At least somethings are going our way. Soon they'll be going Lilith's way. He said. Not if we work together. We're hunters. We're good on our own. But together, we can do anything. Even kill Lilith. If she died before, she can die again.You said. Hunters back to back. That hasn't happen in so many years. He said. All we have to do is get the others and Lilith will run back to whatever circle of hell she was in. You said. All right then. Let's. He said. Then let's- You're interrupted by a beam that goes through your chest.

Ugh! You said. What the hell? Who's? Gavin said. Ashley appears right behind him and reaches for him. Come here, you! She said. She grabs him just as you recovered from the attack.

Gavin! Argh.... You said. Before you could attack, she disappears. Shit..... You said. You want to go after her, but with the little magic you have left, you'd need to use it wisely. I'll get the others. Then rescue Gavin. You said. You disappear.
152111.title: Go to the hunters

1521111.content:
You reappear in France; next to the Louvre. This will be the only place Remi would be at a time like this. You said. You open the doors and see the lights are off. Remi? Remi. Where are you? It me. You said. You walk around and find him in the curator room. He jumps when he sees you.

Whoa! It's just me, man. You said. Jesus.... I thought you were one of those possessed swine. I've been hiding out here ever since the harmonious moon started. He said. Seen any witches? You said. Plenty. They swarmed this place because they know i spend most of my time here. Even the city police are hunting me. Could this night get any worst? He said. Actually, it can. Lilith's back. He said. The color on his face fades and his eyes go wide. L...Lilith's back!? Of all the things that could happen....! We are all going to die in eternal servitude! He said. Not if we stand together. We've rallied against people like her before. You said.

But not like Lilith! It's a good thing her daughter isn't with her. We'd be in great peril. He said. Remi. Did artist like Picasso or Leonardo despair when their backs were against the wall? No. The Mona Lisa. How long did that take? Leo could have thrown his hands up, but he didn't. He kept painting that picture until it was done. We've faced challenges before and come out on top. We'll do it again. You said. ......You're right. The great Leonardo didn't stop painting. I didn't give up until my art was finally admitted. I've stood against the tide, and i'll keep doing it. He said. That's the way. Now, we need to get out of here. Where's the nearest exit? You said. That'd be the side exit. Let's go. He said. You both step out and follow him to the side exit.

Ok. Now we just need to get out of here. You said. I know a place we can-He's stop by purple tendrils that wrap around him and pins you to the wall. What the fuck? You said. As you hands glow to disspell them, you see Ashley behind Remi. She grabs him in a tight squeeze. Quit struggling! She said. She disappears just as you disspell the tendrils.

Damnit! What is she trying to do? You said. You heal up the wounds and see multiple cop cars pull into the Louvre. Worn out my welcome here. You said. You disappear just as the first car comes to a stop.


You reappear in Germany.

There's only one place Heinz would be. You said. You head to a graveyard to see him next to a grave. Heinz.... You said. I know. But i can't leave her. They'll desecrate her grave. He said. Her grave won't matter when Lilith gets us. You said. That she-devil is back!? At a time like this!? He said. Yeah. She's back. We have to stand together. You said. I'm in. He said. That was.....quick. You said. You don't know how powerful Lilith is. She makes all the evil people in the world saints. Everywhere she goes, she enslaves people. Those who don't bend the knee are put through a hellish torture. And do you know who will do the torture? The people you know. He said. She makes people you know torture you? Not even Kyle would go that far. You said. I won't have the memory of my beloved erased to serve a witch. He said. We serve no one. Now all we need are Hiro and...... Oh shit! You said. What? He said. Volenski! With this moon and the witches in Russia..... You said. Oh my God..... Heinz said. Stay low and out of sight. I'll be back for you! You said before disappearing.

This moon is the worst. I'll be back for you soon, mien buttercup. He said. But where are you going? A voice said that Heinz recognized. That voice..... It can be.... He said. He turned around to see his lover standing there in a white dress.

A....Annabelle? He said. Yes.... It's me. I've missed you, Heinz. She said. B....but..... You are... Were.... He said. It was a fake. They took me away from you and used a different body to fool you. I escaped, and been searching for you ever since. She said. My....buttercup..... Heinz said on the verge of tears. I'm here for you Heinz. Come to me. We've been away from each other for far too long. She said. She puts her hand on the ground and he walks onto. She presses him in a hug and smiles. I've.....grieved for for a long time over you. He said. No need for that anymore. I'm here now. We can be together again. She said. Together....again. He said through tears. Hehehe...... Anna said, smiling.
1521111.title: Not going well

15211111.content:
You appear next to the Kremlin. I hope i'm not too late. Where are you, Volenski? You said. You hear an explosion in the distance. What the? The detention center? Volenski!! You said. You rush over there to see it's a warzone. Bodies everywhere. Ammo casings. Explosion marks. Volenski, what are you thinking? You said. You head through the blown off doors and it's even worst on the inside.

Even the prisoners..... Volenski..... You said. You follow the trail of bodies deeper in. That's when the real horror show came in.

You see witches bodies all with holes in there chest. Some ripped in half, others quartered, beheaded, limbs ripped of and shoved through them. My God..... It's a horror show in here. You said. As you walk, you hear the sound of coughing. Volenski? Volenski! You said. The coughing becomes fainter. Where are you!? You shout. You hear the coughing as you get closer until you see Volenski's body.

Volenski!!! You said, running beside him. His body is riddled with bullet holes, burn marks, lacerations,bruises...... Even you are wondering how he lived through it, until you looked at his magical force. He..... He used his anger to supplement his magic. He went world war 3 on them, but why? You said. You put your hand on him and funnel the last bit of magic you had into him.

*Gaps!* *Cough* *Cough* He said. He looks over to you. He....hehehehe..... If i knew.....the carvery was coming, i'd brought more ammo. He said. Volenski..... What were you thinking? Doing this on at a time like this? You said. The harmonious moon..... I know. And i know the trouble that.....is brewing. Lilith.....the devil's favorite child is back. He said. Then you know why i'm here. Hold still. You said. No..... No..... It's too late for me. Even if.....i wanted to be saved, i can't be. My.....body is burnt out from using my anger. Not on the outside, but the inside as well. He said. Why.....? Why did you do this?! You said. *Violent coughing* They were coming for me anyway. Choose to beat them to it. It.....was a one way.....mission anyway. He said. We needed you, Volenski. Lilith wouldn't stand a chance against all of us! You said. With all our power, none of us can foresee the future. He said. You feel the magic stop. It's all on you and the others now. Stop her. Before......she enslaves the entire world. He said. His body then slumps over. You choke back tears and pick up his body.

You carry him all the way to the entrance and see a murder of crows overhead. You put him down on the ground and place your hand on his head. Spirits of the old, guild our fallen brother's soul so that he can finally be at peace and free from our sworn enemy. You said. Black shadow arms then rise up and drag Volenski's body into the ground as the crows caw. Then one lands on your shoulder. We won't fail, your lordship. You said before the crow flies off.You disappear and reappear in Japan.

Hiro..... You said. You know where he would be at a time like this. You head outside of the city and into a forest clearing where you see a small bamboo cottage. You head inside and see Hiro on both knees in front of a sword.

It's that time...... He said. Master Hiro...... You said. I know. This Harmonious moon isn't like the rest. I've lived through 4 of them. But this one.... I feel an omen is carried with this one. He said. The omen is real. The she-devil Lilith is back. You said. I knew it..... She has slaughtered and enslaved countless people. And hunters. You're plan is to rally us to take her down. He said. Yes, master. She was killed before, she can be killed again. You said. That is true..... Anyone can be killed. He said. I've already talked the others into it. With you as well, master Hiro, we can send her back to hell. You said. ......I can't remember the last time we rallied against someone. He said. Let's make history again, master. You said. Hiro stands up and grabs his sword. She can't just die this time. She needs to be sealed so she never comes back. He said. We already have to worry about this damn moon. We don't need to deal with Lilith again. You said. Preferably a- The roof starts shake violently. What the? You said. A fist comes through the roof and grabs Hiro. Hiro!! You said covering your head. The hand retracts and is gone. Shit....! You said.

You walk outside. Fuck..... What kind of game are you playing, Sue? You said. What the fuck am i going to do now? You said, siting down. This couldn't be just the end of the hunters, but of everything in the world. You sit contemplating until an idea struck you. ......I need to make a deal with another devil. You said.
15211111.title: In Russia

152111111.content:
You take your knife and cut the hunter's symbol on the wall. You kneel before it and it starts glowing and become a dark mist with red eyes.

Hello, Devil. You said. A hunter? It's been centuries since i last talked to one like this. He said. Because you aren't part of our teachings. That's the witches. You said. Have they gotten to the point where the hunters need my help? He said. No. But to defeat one devil, i need the help of another. You said. You mean Lilith. Hahahaha! She escaped from my domain with the help of a very angry one. She must have died with a lot of hate. He said. I know who you're talking about. I need to speak with Sylvia. You said. And what are you going to do for me to grant this? He said. Nothing. I'm not here to deal with you. Let me speak to Sylvia. You said. Hahahahahaha! That's what i like about you hunters. Never afraid to pick a fight with anyone. Just remember, young hunter. Somethings have a terrible cost. He said, disappearing. A black mist surrounds you and clouds your vision.


When your sight returns, you see you a long braided blond haired woman in a beige robe and pants with green eyes and a moderate chest sitting down in front of you. Sylvia.... You said. What this? A visitor? I don't get those. She said. This isn't a formal call. It's your daughter. You said. Lilith? What has she done this time? She said. She's enslaved my friends. And soon, she's going to do the same with the world. You said. That's her. I knew she'd be special when she was young. She said. This is serious! You said. I know. I know about your strategy of rallying the hunters against her. It won't work. She said. How do you..... You said. Child, do you think you're the first person to think of doing this? Others have and failed. My daughter knows how you hunters operate. She said. She was killed before. How do we do it again? You said. And why should i tell a hunter how to kill my daughter? She said. Because Lilith won't stop at the living. She wants to control the dead to. You'll be here slave like ever one else. You said. You're bluffing. She said. Do you think i am? You said. She takes a moment to consider your words.

Let's say i do believe you. Why should i tell you anyway? You said. Because i'm you're great grandson. You said. Grandson!? She said. She examines you as her eyes glow a dim blue. You.....are my great grandson. So.....my daughter had a child. She said. Focus Sylvia. How do i stop your daughter? Do you really want to be a slave again? You said. ......I have one condition. I want to be alive again. She said. What? You said. You heard me. I want to live again. My life was cut short at 300. She said.

......Fine, but i have one of my own. No games for a throne. You said. Just tell me to stop breathing. She said. I'm serious. That's why you're life was cut down. Poisoned because you were obsessed with that fucking gold throne. You said. You judge me because you don't know my actions. You have no idea what the Pantifs did. She said. They weren't the ones who waged a 30 year war so they can sit on a damn golden throne. You said. And yet, your lord sits on a golden throne. How many people did he killed to get his ass in one? She said. He didn't wage a senseless war. And only kept the kills to witches. You said. So if i only kept the deaths to the Pantifs, i'd be entitled to a throne? She said.

Look, we can argue semantics until the moon becomes red, but the longer we wait, the more time Lilith has. You said. You didn't agree to my terms. She said. Neither did you. You said. .......Fine. No games. She said. Then we have a deal. Now, talk. You said.

Good. She said. What? You said. The hatred and anger you hunters have only fuel her. At the same time, you'll be exhausting yourself; making it easier for her to snuff out your fire. The only way to stop her is a pure heart not tainted by hatred. Not tainted by hatred..... That would explain why Argus wasn't the same after he fought Lilith. You said. You're right. She said. That was the victory that established him as lord, but he never had any significant reaction to witches anymore. You said. He knew he'd follow in hunters before him if he fought in anger. So he did what no other hunter at that time was able to do. Forgiveness. He forgave the one who curse him to forever wear his golden armor. And with nothing to fuel his anger, his hatred dried up. Lilith had nothing to feed off of. She was still a threat, but...... Well, he's not called lord Argus for a reason. She said. A heart....not tainted by hatred. .......I think i know what to do. You said. Remember our deal, grandson. You bring me back to life after my daughter is dealt with. She said. I know. You said before the mist clears and the symbol stops glowing.

You stand up. I know what i must do. You said.
152111111.title: A deal with a devil

1521111111.content:
You reappear back in M district. Everything looks the same so far. Before i go face Lilith, i need to save the others. But were did Sue take them? You said. You think and your device goes off. You take the call and see it's Ashley.

Sue. I was just thinking about you. You said. Guess i left a lasting impact. She said. All this for M district, Sue. You know Lilith will enslave you and everyone in it. You said. I'm taking a page from your book. This isn't about M district anymore. It's you and the hunters. There's enough evil in the world, and we don't need your kind spreading it even more. She said. You're going to kill them. I doubt it, bleeding heart. You said. I told you. It doesn't bleed for your kind. In fact, it will jump for joy when it happens. She said. Right.... You call to gloat because i have things to do. You said.

Oh, no.You're not getting off that easy. I'm not letting you run this time. I'll make you fight this time. She said. How? You said. Did you already forget i have your brothers here with me? If you want them, come to the prison. That's where it all started between us. She said. Yeah, you don't have them. Lilith does. You said. She then reaches downward and picks up Gavin. Now do you believe me? She said. You can be so annoying at times. You said. Call it what you want, but i have them. And if you want them back, you WILL meet me at the prison. She said. I'll deal with you later, Sue. After Lilith. And maybe after a good rampage through m district. You said. Don't you dare lay a finger on them, you- You hang up.

Good. She's angry. Now for the next step. You said. You take off your wrist device and smash it. Compromised. You said. You then head to the prison.

Sue's somewhere in there. (This plan better work.) You said. You pull out the jar of black pills and take one. Ugh.....! You said. You then head inside the prison.

You walk inside and look around. Where would Sue put them? You said. You keep looking until you get to the a lone cell and see them in there.

About time you got here. Gavin said. Sorry for being late. Alexis? How'd you get here? You said. That bitch lured me into a trap. I saw Gavin just laying on the ground, next thing i know, i'm knocked out. She said. Even though we're in a predicament, it is nice to be together again. Remi said. Should do it more often, but under better circumstances. Hiro said. Is Heinz here? He wasn't back in Germany. You said. Alexis moves her leg and you see Heinz sobbing in the corner. What.....happened? You said. He was tricked.....brutally. Ashley used the visage of his dead lover to capture him. He's been like this ever since he got here Gavin said. Heinz..... You said. Where's......Volenski? Hiro said. H......he's..... You said. It just gets worst for us. Remi said. Volenski..... Of all people i thought would live through anything. Alexis said. I released his spirit. We'll mourn him later. Right now, I need to get you guys out. You said.

You have a plan? Alexis said. I do. I need you guys to trust me. Ok. Let me- You're then tackled and slammed into the ground. You fucking coward! Ashley said. You manage to kick her off you, but she grabbed and tackled you back down. You remember what i promised to do to you? She said. She pulls out a silver locket. I always keep my promises. She said. Her eyes and marking start to glow brightly and you feel a tugging force on you. You see a a black ball coming out of your chest. You fight against her and pull it back until she punches you multiple times in the face. She keeps pulling until she sees it's only half black, not fully. Ashley looks surprised as she was expecting it to be fully black. She takes a moment to think before ripping your soul out of your body. She then says the incantation and locks your soul into the locket before putting it around her neck.

Now for the rest of you..... She said. Whatever plan he has, this better be part of it. Alexis mutters.

4 day later.

Ashley, you can't just leave him sealed. Susan said. Why not? You know how dangerous he is. And after everything he's done? She said. You know if he did that to me or anyone else, you'd be livid. Susan said. So he gets a pass because it's not fair to him? Ashley said. How long were you planning on keeping him sealed? Susan said. A few....years. Ashley said. Ashley. Susan said. No more than 10. Maybe 20.... She said. Ashley! Susan said. Why are you against me on this? You know how he is. He killed you, me, Kim, Kira, and countless others. What makes you think he doesn't deserve this? She said. Because you put a cleansing spell on the locket. Susan said. H-how did?! She said. As much as you want to, even you don't believe he's fully evil. If you did, you wouldn't put a cleansing spell over that locket. She said. O....Ok, so i don't think he's 100% bad, but he's been doing bad things. Which is why i did this. Ashley said. You can't force someone to be good. It has to come naturally. Like with you. She said. Hey! I wanted to do the right thing. I was tired of killing and enslaving people just because we can. I worked my ass off to earn the men's trust! He hasn't done a damn thing for anyone but himself! She said. It takes time. It can't be something that happens over night. It took you until you were 120 years before you decided enough was enough. Susan said. Before she could say something against that, Kim and Kira come busting through the door and brace against it.

What the hell's going on? Ashley said. Before they could answer, the door is booted down by your soulless body. Susan sees your eyes are completely black. Did you account for his body coming back for it's soul? She said. Not so soon. Ashley said. As your body walk, Kim and Kira scurry back to Ashley. W....what does he want now? Why are his eyes black? Kira said. Calm down. He's not going to hurt you. He just want what was taken from him. Susan said, looking at Ashley. Ashley grimaces as she holds the locket. The cleansing was far from done, but she wasn't going to risk her friends lives. They've already died once.She wasn't going to lose them again. She takes the locket, unseals it and puts it in your body's hand.

Your body opens the locket and your soul flies back into your body It takes a minute for your eyes to change back. Rgh...... You said.
1521111111.title: Back to America

15211111111.content:
You shake your head as your senses come back to you. Ashley.... Kira said. It's fine. He's not going to do anything. Ashley said. What did you do to him? Kim said. I....took his soul from him. She said. You what!? Kira said. He's not going to hurt us. Or anyone. Ashley said.

You feel the energy in your body has gotten stronger and manifested, but you don't feel any dark thoughts. Or a need to kill. You got what you wanted. Just leave. Ashley said. You look at her. As angry as you are, you save it for someone more deserving. But you need to do one thing. You approach Ashley and grip the device on her wrist and snatch it off. Then you turn and leave

He.... He just up and left? No threats or anything? Kim said. Or snide remarks? Kira said. Ashley. Susan said. I know. She said.

You look up to see the curse mark is still on the moon. You thought it'd be over by now. Lilith must have done something to make it permanent. You head to the mansion.

As you walked there, you noticed that the women you saw had glowing eyes and were talking about Lilith. She's been busy since you've been gone. You get to the mansion and see it's been turned into a castle. Really busy. You open the heavy set of doors and walk inside. You see it's like a 16th century in here. All that's missing are the torches on the wall. You make it up some stairs and into a throne room.

........admire your fortitude. 4 whole days of torture and none of your brains are mush. Lilith said. You.....won't break us. Gavin said. You hunters are the only people left who haven't submitted to me. Impressive, but also an annoyance. You will break and serve. Then the entire world will. She said. Twisted. As always. You won't have us! Alexis said. I can. And will. Having you hunters bend the knee to me will put an end to your ilk. The hunters will finally die. Lilith said. Maybe not..... Hiro said. As she wonders, a sharp wind blows past Lilith's cheek and a cut forms. What the?! She said. You then appear in front of her and kick her back.

About tim- Gavin gets elbowed in the gut by Remi. So is this your plan? Alexis said. You nod. Well..... My wayward grandson has returned. Lilith said, getting up. You like what i done with the place? A fitting place for a queen. Or empress. She said. You're far from a queen. Gavin said. And empress is out of the question. Alexis said. Such disrespect..... I'll have to put you all in your place. She said. The magic binding them starts to engulf them. You pull out your knife and throw it at them. As it flies, 4 shadow copies appear and they start to glow and hit the surrounding magic. The magic then dissipates.

Thanks.... Alexis said. Interesting. Guess you did more than run away. But can you do that against your former friends? She said. With a snap of her fingers, your friends rush in; weapons drawn. You look at them and can feel the rage boiling; which is good. You press a button on your device and a issue a sever shock to each of them, leaving them incapacitated. A fail safe in case something like this happen? You really are a hunter. She said. You take off the device and throw it away. But.... Let's see how you handle your former demon friend. She said. With a snap, Em comes barreling towards you with a murderous look. She pounces on you and starts to claw at your chest until your heart is exposed. Her hand lights up on fire and she stops before it touches your heart.

(M....m.....master.....) She said. You smile a little. (I.... I...... I'm sorry...... I wasn't......strong enough. Please...... Forgive me.) She said. You place your hand on her cheek. (M...master.....) Em said with a tear in her right eye. The glowing in her eyes stop and she gets up off you. Still defiant. I thought we were making good progress. Lilith said.
