Have to handle this right. Just stay low. You said, disappearing. Always thinking ahead..... Kept us alive this entire time. He said.

You reappear at Jessica's house and head inside. Bet she's in her lab. You said. You head to her lab to see her looking over some notes. But she's not that interested in them. Still working while naked. Nothing's changed. You said. Jessica. You said, appearing on her counter. Huh? She said with surprise. You see the shock in her eye. Then it turns to joy. Hey.... You said. She picks you up and smothers you in a tight hug. Where have you been?! Do you have any idea what you put me through? She said. S....sorry. I just.....needed some time to myself. You said. Seven years? When i need some time to myself, i just go find some men and hug them like this. She said. I thought you only did that for me. You said. Of course, but you're special. You get to be smothered by these and a whole lot more. The other guys don't get that. She said. Guess i do. You said.

She let's go of you. Jessica. You still have those wrist devices? I need another. You said. Yep. I have plenty. But..... You remember the price to get one, right? She said. Yes..... You said. She brings you to her face and starts kissing you. *Kiss* *Kiss* Hehe! She said. She kept this up for a few minutes and lets go of you. There we go. She said. She gets one of the devices and hands it to you. You take it and put it on. Thank you. You said. You can thank me by not leaving again for long periods. She said. I won't. Later. You said, disappearing.

.......Sorry, Jess. One promise i can't keep. You said. You head back to m district.

Ok.... That should be everyone's life restored. Ashley said. She looks to see all the men who were dead or dying getting back up. You guys ok? She said. Y....yeah. One guy said. Like a new born baby. You're a lifesaver, Ashley! Another said. Just doing what i do best. She said with a small smile. Now, get somewhere safe. I've got a shooter to deal with. You said. R-right. A guy said. The men around here leave.

Alright. Who ever's in there, come out! She said, dropping the protective shield. She waits a minute but no one comes out. Try to be diplomatic..... No, no. Remember, they're not slaves. They wouldn't give up diplomatically anyway. Still give them the option. She said. She then stands up at full height. Maybe a scare tactic..... Come out of there or i'll crush this building with you in it! She said. She waits to see until she gets turned around and punched in the face. She stumbles and brought back to get punched again. Then a sharp stab in the gut and chest. Then her knees get taken out from under her and hit 4 more times in the face. Ugh...... Who....? She said. Her head is turned to meet the person holding her.

Y.....You.... You're.....! She said. She looks you right in the soulless black eyes before you stand her back up and head butt her. Her eyes roll back as she falls on the buildings beneath her. You look at her for a second and your eyes change back to normal and you leave.
1521111111111111.title: A fun game

15211111111111111.content:
…..Fine. We agree to your terms. Kat said. I’ll believe it when it happens. Remi said. If this is going to work, you’re going to have to trust us. Kat said. Right….. Because witches honor their word and are very trustful. Let’s ask the elves and fairies about it. Gavin said. Unlike our ancestors, we intend to keep our word. We have nothing to gain from betraying you. She said. Actions speak louder than words. Orex said. I find it hard to believe you found our brother and harder that he wants us to form a council with you. Alexis said. I did. And he did. Kat said. You could just be saying that so you can get us all in one place and do us in. Gavin said. Are any of us attacking you right now? Susan said. No, but this meeting is still going. So anything is still possible. Heinz said. With Luke, Hiro, and Alex here, you think we’d be able to say spell? They’d be on us before we finished. Kat said. Wouldn’t get the chance. I’m still waiting on the proof of my son. Alex said. Kat puts down the armband. If I didn’t find him, how’d I get this? It’s his. She said.

For all we know, you could have stole that or made a replica. Maybe even take it from his body that’s not even cold yet. Alexis said. And have Leah on my ass? No, he gave that to me. Kat said. Your distrust doesn’t do you any favors here. We’ll never get anywhere if this is how you act. Sylvia said. Like you’re the symbol of trust. You killed your own father and husband. Not to mention the lands you conquer. Orex said. Don’t forget the people she had killed who wouldn’t acknowledge her claim to a throne. Still have the blood on your boots? Gavin said. My father was a tyrant and my husband was no better. I removed two threats from the world and yet I wasn’t named queen. So I just used what I learned from them. Sylvia said. By conquering lands and other kingdoms? Assassinating kings and queens? The public execution of those who didn’t agree with you? Orex said. Nothing more than what Argus did. Sylvia said. Argus didn’t kill innocents or conquer anyone! Or silence anyone who had something against him! Luke said. And yet, he sat on a golden throne. If he didn’t kill or conquer for it, what did he do then? She said. Enough of this! We didn’t come here to bring up old grudges or who did what for something. Kat said. Luke…. Alex said. ……It’s his. While they don’t have no respect for the dead, she didn’t take it from him. He said. So…. He really did give it to her? Alexis said. And he’s not sealed. So that means…. Alex said. He’s alive. Where is he? Alexis said. Hold on. I gave everything up like I promised. You need to agree on this council idea. Kat said. Are you seriously holding his location hostage?! Alexis said. No. We said we’d listen and agree if there was evidence. And she did present it. Heinz said. Fine. If that what it takes, fine. I agree to a council. Alexis said. Alright….. Gavin said. Oui. Remi said. …….Ja. Heinz said. Yeah, yeah. Luke said. If it means finding my son, fine. Alex said. Hai….. Hiro said.

Then it’s official. From this point on, we’re allies. Kat said. Great…… We can pop the champagne later. Now talk. Alexis said. Before Kat could talk, the door is open and Ashley stumbles in. Ashley! Susan said. Susan moves to Ashley’s side. Seems like her “diplomatic” side didn’t win out this time. Gavin mutters. What happened?! Susan said. H……he…..*Cough* He’s…..back. Ashley said. He is? Alex said. Where is he? Alexis said. I don’t know. Somewhere in M district. She said. Where you “nice” this time around? Heinz said. I didn’t even have time to say anything. He just up and attacked me. She said. With your cherry attitude, could you blame anyone? Gavin said. Rgh…..!! Ashley said. Luke, if what she said is true, then….. Alex said. I can’t sense him out. But I know someone who can. Luke said. You mean Em? Alex said. Em? You still have that demon with you? Remi said. Yeah. And she’s still off limits, Orex. Luke said. Orex grumble to himself.
Don’t worry, Em can find him even if he was at the north pole. Luke said as he and the others left.

…..I hate them so much. Ashley said. Leave us. I need to speak with Ashley alone. Susan said. Of course. Kat said. The witches vanish. Ashley….. Susan said. I don’t want to hear it. She said. You need to. Susan said. Why me? Why do I need to change? I didn’t say a single word to them. She said. Not this time. The last meeting however…… Susan said. What was I suppose to do? Sit back and let them slander us while they make themselves out to be paragons of virtue? She said. We didn’t call them to measure who was worst than the other. You want the hunts to stop? Susan said. I do, but I’m not going to let them think they are better than anyone else. She said. They know they aren’t better than anyone else, but for this to work, we need everyone to be on the same page. Susan said. …….Fine. I’ll be nicer next time. Ashley said. Actually be nice, not your version of nice. Susan said. I am nice! Why does everyone think I’m an asshole? Ashley said. You’re only nice to people who listen to you the first time. Remember the ex-soldier who ran from you? Susan said. I told him to stop, he didn’t listen to me, so I caught him. Ashley said. Only after you removed your foot off him and stopped making threats. Susan said. Alright, alright. I’ll roll out the red-carpet next time. Ashley said. That’s all I ask. Now, hold still. These are some nasty looking stabs. Susan said.

At the mansion

Did they say where he is?! Bruce said. Ashley said he was somewhere in m district. Not going to take a witches’ word for it. Em. Can you find him? Luke said. Em concentrates for a second. Well? Tom said. She says she has a faint feel for where he is. Luke said. It takes another minute before Em runs out like crazy. She’s got his location….. Follow that demon! Luke said. Luke and the guys run after Em.

Em runs all the way to O district. (Master? Master!) Em said. Em followed her sensing. When she was getting closer, she gets thrown to the ground. She looks at the person who did it and sees a person cloaked in darkness with red eyes. She gets grabbed by the neck and lifted up. She starts to flail and hit the person’s arm and claw at their face. The shadow figure slams her into the ground and throws her to the ground.

Em grits her teeth and charges at the person. The figure sidesteps her and in a blink, is cut in half. Her upper half and lower half hit the ground. The figure bent down next to her as she breathes heavily. She looks at the figure’s red eyes and reaches out to them. The figure stands up and backs away as Em’s upper and lower half start to reconnect together. She growls as she stands up. She runs at you and ducks under the person’s swing. She then thrusts her arm forward into the figures chest, but it doesn’t go through and hurts her own arm. She has a look of surprise on her face as she get stabbed in the gut with a purple blade on the figure’s hands. The figure lifts her up and looks her dead in the eyes. They grab her hand as she tried to claw at it. EM!! A voice said. She turns her head to see Luke and everyone else. The blade is pulled out and she’s thrown to the ground.

Jesus….. Who is this guy? Dante said. He makes Luke look nice. Tom said. It’s like a shadow being. But I feel hate and malice. Shadow beings don’t have emotions. Alex said. Can we discuss it later? It’s heading towards us. Bruce said. The shadow figure tarts to walk towards them and makes multiple copies of itself. Shit….. Why can’t things ever be simple? Tom said.
15211111111111111.title: Council meeting

152111111111111111.content:
In France, Remi was at the Louvre sipping champaign as he watched the witches remove the paintings that prevented his art from being admitted. Ahhh. History is written by the victors. He said. As he sips from his wine glass, a purple blade goes through hit chest. Ohhh…. Now….that’s not nice, mon amie. He said. The blade is pulled out and his vanishes as he hits the ground. The shadow figure starts to look around as the paintings start to glow. A shadow spirit….. It’s been a while since one of were around. They said with Remi’s voice. Purple blades form on the figure’s hands. Let’s see if I still remember how to do this….. He said.

In the UK.

It’s been 5+ years, Gavin. Can’t you get rid of this mark on my forehead. Isabel said. After what you did to me during the moon, and not to mention all the years we’ve been together? He said. How many times can I say I’m sorry? You know what that moon does to us. She said. And yet, you proclaim to be stronger than its influence. He said. I thought I was. Come on, Gavin! There’s supposes to be peace between us now! She said. Doesn’t mean there’s trust. You still have a long way to go on that. He said. We’ve been married for years now. You think I would let you put a ring on my finger if I didn’t trust you? And you’re a hunter, no less. She said. You said you knew I was a hunter. You could have said no. I didn’t force you to do anything. He said. Blame your charm for that. Haven’t I proven myself yet? Besides the moon, I’ve been busting my ass to make you trust me. She said. I’ll let you know when you get there. He said as he left. Bollocks….. Isabel said.

Gavin when to the local Pub and sat down. He starts to put down countless bottles; not knowing someone behind him. The figure readies to attack but stops when the blade touches Gavin’s back. You’re not as subtle as you think, shadow. He said, getting up. He looks at the shadow spirit. Oh my….. Such anger and malice in you. Whoever brought you into the world gave you a lot of anger to deal with. He said. Gavin goes to touch the shadow, but his hand is almost grabbed by it. I really hate to do this here of all places. One of the good pub’s left in the country….. He said as a blade forms on the shadow’s arm.


In Germany

Heinz was over watching the building of a memorial to his dead lover. …..No. White flowers on the left side. Roses on the top step. He said. Heinz watched as it was built to his specific standards. After a while, it was done. Good. Now leave. He said. The witches vanish and Heinz walks up to the memorial. Buttercup….. He said. He holds back tears. You can sleep easier now. He said. As he plants his flowers, he deflects an attacks from behind. He sees it was a shadow being. This….is a private party, Schattendämon! He said as he tackles the figure and they both go tumbling down.

In Japan.

Hiro walked into the palace that was taken from him and his family. Guess their intentions are true….. He said. He walked up to the pictures of his family lineage. Mother…… Father….. It finally happened. Our family lineage has been restored. He said. He takes off his mask. I’ll restore the honor of our family. He said. He walks to the throne room. As he gets closer to the two seats, he remembers how he lost everything.

This is madness! All these accusations are false!! His dad said. We’ve done nothing but brought prosperity to the land! We’d never slaughter our own people! His mom said. There were eye witness reports of your personal bodyguards going into homes in the dead of night and walking out with bloody knives. We have the knights in custody. You all will stand trial! The commanding knight general said. Where is your proof of this!? His father said. The general pulls out two bloody knives. Curved. The same kind like you bodyguards. Arrest them! He said. His father and mother were both put in chains. What about the child? One of them said. …..Find his next of kin. The general said.

Hiro remembers the trial and it was a complete farce of one. The witnesses lied under oath, couldn’t remember the clothing the bodyguards wear, his parents weren’t allowed to speak in their defense, no legal counseling. It all lead to them being found guilty and executed. On the day of execution, he remembers his father’s word. Hiro! Remember what our family stands for. Find those who stained our name, and return honor to it! He said. Father….. He said.


Father…… I’ve done it. Our name has been cleansed. We can rebuild again. He said. As he touches the chair, he hears heavy footsteps. Opening the door to the throne, he sees a shadow being. A shadow being……? He said. The being walks towards Hiro with a purple blade in the form of a sword. Such anger….. Shadow beings don’t have emotions. He said. It points its sword at Hiro. You challenge me in the home of my ancestors? He said drawing his sword. You will take me to your master when this is over. He said. The two circle each other for a minute and clash blades.


Back in America

Unlike the other hunters, Alexis just wanted her hunter brother found. If that meant being at peace with the same people who wouldn’t release her family from servitude, so be it. She learn to stop holding grudges, but that doesn’t mean she won’t forget the years of torment her family suffered.

She wanted to be with Luke when he found where her missing brother was, but Luke wanted her to make sure the witches wouldn’t betray them. She stayed in m district to make sure. These bitches better not have been lying to our faces. She said. Out of all the hunters, she was the most caring among them. She would visit the others from time to time to see how they were doing. She cared deeply for her brothers; nearly crying her eyes out when she mourned Volenski.

She was looking for any witch moving to a gathering, when she deflected a blade from behind. (A shadow being?!) She thought. She then grab its other arm and to stop its attack, but it knees her in the gut and stabs her in the side. Ugh…..! She said. She pushes its arm away and gives it a spinning kick to the face. It stumbles a little back.

……What are you doing here? Who sent you? She said. The figure just charges at her with it’s blades.
152111111111111111.title: Around the world

1521111111111111111.content:
Luke staggers back as he takes a hit from the shadow being. *Huff* *Huff* This thing is no joke….. He said. Alex comes flying right into Luke. Argh….. No kidding. I almost got stabbed twice. He said. Get off me, Alex! Luke said. Ohhh. He said. He gets off of Luke.

Damnit! These things can’t be hurt. Dante said. Bullets and knives just bounce off them. Tom said. And they pack quite a punch…. Bruce said. And they just counter everything we do. Even Luke. Cody said. Luke….. We can’t touch them. Magic or otherwise. Plus, we these guys won’t be able to go on much longer…. Alex said. Rgh….. Alright. We’re not winning here. Let’s get out of here! Luke said. The guys and everyone else run off and the shadows don’t follow.

The group makes it back to the mansion.

……Ok. I’ll say it. We might have a serious problem. Tom said. Luke, you know anything about those things? Bruce said. Shadow beings. They’re like mindless slaves. No emotions or anything. Just mindless drones. They range from weak to strong. Usually, they only serve those who are in tuned with the dark elements. He said. Like those shadows witches you told us about? Hank said. Yes, but they rarely use them. They uses the darkness better than they do. He said. Having the commander here would make things a lot easier. Kris said. Em…. Where you able to find him? Luke said. (No…. I was attacked before I could get a pinpoint location.) She said. Shit….. Luke said.

Luke….. A voice said. Gavin? Luke said. Gavin appears with multiple stab wounds on his body. Jesus, Gavin…. What the hell? Alex said. A shadow being….. Really strong….. Good thing I had so many drinks in me that I couldn’t feel anything. At first….. He said. Then Remi and the others appear with the same treatment. You guys too….. Gavin said. Shadow beings? Tom said. They just…..came out of nowhere. Really powerful…… Heinz said. I knew we shouldn’t trust those bitches! Saying our brother was not sealed only to send their denizens after us. Alexis said. Wouldn’t have made since to do it at the meeting? Bruce said. This is just how sick they are. They love to see their victims squirm. Alexis said.

Just then, Dante’s scanner goes off. Really? Hank said. That’s not for here. That’s for M district. He said. But that’s just to monitor. You didn’t put an alarm for it. Luke said. I didn’t, but I did for if one of our bugs get destroyed. He said. So one of them got destroyed. Which means it either got found, or destroyed. Cody said. Only one way to find out. ……Anyone knows how to pilot a UAV? Dante said.



Ok….. Hovering over m district now. Alex said. When did you learn to do this? Luke said. I was in the army before. He said. But they don’t have drones. Luke said. Never said it was the M district army. Alex said. Ok. We planted our bugs in their army HQ. Fly it there. Dante said. Alex moves the drone over the army HQ and it’s completely in ruins. Jesus….. I forgot what those preteen monsters could do. Tom said. Don’t think it was them. No blood stains on the ground. Or footprints. Alex said. Alex circles the area with the drone. I got someone on the ground. She’s beaten badly and unresponsive. Alex said. That’s Ashley. The one we saw at the council meeting. Luke said. The one with the bleeding heart? Alex said. She’s the one. Alexis said. She’s messed up badly. Wait. Who’s that beside her? Tom said. Alex moves the camera to see Susan and the rest of them lying unconscious as well. That’s her friends. Whatever did this was mad as hell. Alex said. As he moves the drone, it shot out of the sky. I’ve lost control! The drone is going down! Alex said. The drone crashes into the ground and the feed is lost for a few seconds. Shit, hang on. Dante said. He gets the feed back to see the camera getting pulled out and a shadow being doing it before it goes black.

Guess we found out who did it….. Bruce said. At least we know it’s not only us that’s under attack. Gavin said. It wouldn’t be all bad if it was doing our job for us. Alexis said. Outsourcing our hunts to a shadow being…. Alex said. We’d grow complacent. Hiro said. Well what do we do? This isn’t a regular shadow being we’re dealing with. It came after us and had no problem. I doubt we’d have much success if we stood together. Luke said. …..Maybe we need to reach out. Alex said. No! We don’t need their help! Alexis said. I don’t like it anymore than you…. But this thing not only stands toe to toe with us, and the witches. But maybe if we stand with them, we might have a shot. Alex said. Hunters and witches…… Shoulder to shoulder….. Hiro said. I thought I’d be dead by then. Heinz said. We all did…. Luke said. I think you should find a new meeting spot. And neutral grounds, so neither side feels like they are walking into a trap. Kim said. ……I know a place. The outskirts of O district. A building an old friend won’t mind us using. Luke said. I’ll send out the invites. Alex said. Bruce. You’re second in command. Get another UAV up and keep tabs on that shadow if you can. Luke said. Right. He said. Come on. It’s a long walk there. And Alexis, keep your temper in check. We’re coming to them this time. Luke said. ……Alright. She said.


A few hours later.

In Sinclair’s building, Luke and the hunters wait for the witches’ emissary. They should be here by now. Remi said. Probably coming with more shadow beings. Alexis said. Then the door opens and Kat, Susan, Sylvia and a few others take a seat. I take it you’ve told them? Kat said. …..Put away your weapons. Luke said. Remi puts away his paintbrush, Alex his guns, and Hiro’s sword and double daggers. There…. I trust you to do the same. Luke said. No magic, ladies. Kat said.

Let’s not beat around the bush. We both know we have a common problem. Luke said. That’s putting it mildly. That shadow being. Kat said. It attacked all of us and you. And I know you tried to deal with it and failed. Luke said. Certainly you didn’t bring us here to mock, Luke. Sylvia said. No. We don’t gloat like you- Alexis! Alex said. It just appeared. No warning or anything. It attacked everything in it’s path. No one was safe. There was so much death. Ashley went after it, but she was beaten down. I faired no better. Susan said. I think one of you hunters brought that thing. Only your kind are filled with such hatred. Sylvia said. We can’t summon shadow beings. Only someone tuned with darkness and shadows can. Gavin said. I didn’t bring it. If I have a problem, I deal with it myself. Alex will vouch for me. Kat said. Yeah. She does things herself. He said. Who or however it got here doesn’t matter. What does is that it has something against us both. We tried and failed. And you tried and failed Luke said. Are you proposing we work together. One of them said. ……Yes. Luke said. Killed you to say that. Sylvia said. This thing wants us all. And it’s only a matter of time. It’s not unstoppable. I think if we work together…..we can stop it. Luke said. Kat…. Susan said. He’s right. I tried to speak with it and it just attacked. We need solutions. She said. Can you hunters do it? Stand with the same people you hunted for eons? Sylvia said. We agreed to the council, so we can stomach fighting by your side. Alexis said.

Then it’s settled. We work together. Kat said. This just can’t get any worst for us…..Gavin said.
1521111111111111111.title: Alliance

15211111111111111111.content:
I can’t believe this….. Fighting….beside them. Ashley said. That shadow is out for us. It took all of us out and is terrorizing witches everywhere. Not to mention our allies. Susan said. A little quick there to call them that? Ashley said. It’s what we are. And I need you not to bring up any past grief out there. She said. …..Fine. Where is this all happening? Ashley said. O district. We meet it there. She said. Then let’s go. Ashley said. Ashley and Susan head to O district where the rest of the hunters and a few of the best witches stand ready.

Everyone here? Luke said. Yeah. Gavin said. Luke, what’s ROE on…..them. Alex said. …..I know this treaty shit is hard to swallow. I know everybody here would rather rip out there hearts than shake their hands. Luke said. Is that a go ahead? Alexis said. No. We need this to work. But don’t risk your lives on their account. ……And if push come to shove, make sure no one sees you doing it. Luke said. You mean…. Gavin said. No. A punch or two at most. Don’t kill them. Alexis….. That’s double for you. Luke said. I’ll try to keep it in check. But if one of those bitches makes a move against anyone of us, I’m showing her heart to her. Alexis said. We know you would. Alex said.

Just as they finalize their plans, the shadow being appears. At least it’s not dramatic. Remi said. The shadow creates multiple clones of itself. Here we go again….. Alex said. Only three of them…. Hiro said. Don’t drop your guard, master Hiro. Your family palace still needs a ruler. Alex said. And it will. Right after this. Hiro said. The three clones charges at the group with their purple blades.

The hunters dodge the one coming their way and the witches do the same. All while the real shadow being watched.

We can’t be reckless here. Or waste a lot of energy. Luke said. Alex, Hiro, and Alexis meet the shadow being in close combat. Hiro with his blades and Alex and Alexis with their fists. The other hunters stay back and wait until they see an opening. Now! Spikturious! Luke, Remi, and Gavin said. Three giant black spikes come out of their hands and merge to create one huge spike. The shadow clone parries and counters every attack until it sees the spike. It disappears and reappears behind them. Luke, Remi and Gavin duck its attack and engage in close combat.

Remi! Luke said. Oui! He said. Remi takes his paintbrush and shoves it into the ground as it glows. Out of the ground, the straw bursts through the ground as they make their way towards the clone. The shadow jumps into the air to avoid it. Hi there! Gavin said. The clone looks to see Gavin behind him, but before he could do anything, a wave of magical beam grazes them both. Tch…..! He said as the beam made him lose his balance and fall to the ground. He expected to hit the ground hard when a purple bubble eases his fall.

Thanks, Alex….. Gavin said. He looks over with a scowl at the witches fighting another clone.

Damnit…..! Ashley said. She rushes the shadow only for it to block her attacks and kick her hard in the gut. She drags her feet and the clone follows it with a punch to the face. Ashley is sent flying back. Before it could move, it jumps back as a circle appears under it and a beam comes out. When it touches the ground, Susan appears behind it with her hand glowing. The clone deflects her arm and grabs her and slam her into the ground. As it goes for the stab, Susan kicks it back and Kat attacks with her blacks blades; getting a grazes on it’s face. Solumos. Susan said. A circle appears under the clone and its movement is hindered. I got you now! Kat said. She leaps at the clone and plunges the blades into its neck. Now! Holiones! Kat said. The circle starts to glow brightly and a bright, yellow light engulfs them both.

Did that work? Susan said. When the beam stops, only Kat is there and she’s severely hurt. Kat! Susan said. She is pushed down by the clone who is unharmed in anyway. No way….. Susan said. Just then, Ashley appears right in front of the clone and it blocks her attack slams her into the ground as well. Before she could get up, the clone starts to brutally kick and punch her. Ashley protected her face until a heavy hit to her stomach made her gasp. As she kept getting hit, her marking started to glow and she shoved it away. First you, then the others!! She said. Ashley’s starting to lose it….. If her markings go to the rest of her body and her anger gets any higher, she’ll just start attacking anything around her. Susan said.

With Alexis, she got paired with the few randoms and things weren’t going well. Damnit! Are you 3 fresh from academy or something? Alexis said. At least we’re not running in blind and getting nowhere. One of them said. At least I’m doing something and not standing there with my thumbs in my ass! Alexis said. It’s called planning! Try it sometimes. The other said. I am. I’m planning on knocking you three out if you don’t do something other than basic! Alexis said. The only thing basic here is you. They said. Why you!! Alexis said. Before she could attack the clone appears and tosses Alexis into all three of them. Before it went any further, it retreated back to the original shadow being. As did the other two.

What it doing? Alex said. The clones were a diversion….. Hiro said. Meaning? Gavin said. As they fought, the real one sat back and observed. Now it has a good feel of what we can do. Luke said. The clones return to the original shadow being and it draws it blades. Now it really begins….. Luke said.
15211111111111111111.title: Stand together

152111111111111111111.content:
At the mansion

Think it was a good idea to stay behind? Tom said. We can’t fight that thing. We’d only get in the way. Bruce said. We still didn’t give my idea any thought. Tom said. No. We aren’t using magic. Hank said. Why not? Tom said. Remember when you tried it? Your entire arm was blown clean off because you said the wrong spell. Dante said. Plus, the commander said for us not to. The price is too high. Cody said. And that kind of power corrupts a person. Someone has to be strong to resist that kind of influence. Could you imagine Kyle or one of his preteen monsters having that? Bruce said. The guys turn towards Kris.

…..What? She said. You’re right. That would be bad. Cody said. I still think we should try it. Nobody’s good at anything on their first go. We might be better than Luke at it. He said. I don’t know….. That kind of power has to have a terrible price. What if we change in someway? Hank said. Like Tom not doing something stupid? You trying to deter or convince me? Dante said. It can’t be that bad. I’m pretty sure Luke was a hard ass even before he had magic. Tom said.

You think it was a good idea to let Luke go without us? Sam said. He wouldn’t want us in the way. The hunters I have no problem with, but the witches are another thing. Luke said they have a tendency to be dishonest and breaking deals. And then there’s Devil Dog. Kim said. Who? She said. That man named Alex…. That’s Devil Dog. Kim said. THE Devil Dog? I thought he was just an urban legend. A myth you tell kids or scare people. Kim said. No. He’s real. And that was him. A man with no morals and would do anything for money. And if you didn’t have cash, he’d take things like your house or other possessions. It’s also rumored that he takes people as payment too. Kim said. And we just let him go with them? Sam said. Not like we had a choice. He’d gone regardless of what we said. Kim said. I really wish the commander was here. Luke would only listen to him. Sam said. Don’t we all. Em’s taking this the hardest. Kris said.

Just then, everyone stopped moving. Frozen in place. Like time came to a still. Then the front door opens. It’s….good to see you guys again. You said.


The shadow being throws away Susan and slams Ashley into the ground. Man. This shadow is something else. Alex said as he heals from being stabbed multiple times. At least you’re doing better than Ashley. That thing has it out for her. Alexis said.

Rgh!! Hold still! Ashley said. She attacks the shadow blindly and it grabs and twist her hand back. Ack! She said. The shadow starts to punch her repeatedly in the face until she’s on the ground. And then starts to violently stomp and kick her.

Beating her like an abusive lover. Should we? Alex said. ……I see no reason to interrupt a good beating. Gavin said. The shadow only stops when Susan appears in front of it and force palm it back. Ashley….. She said. I’m fine! Damnit, nothing is working! And those damn hunters are dragging their feet! Ashley said. Not like we immediately rush to their side when they take there turn. Susan said. So we’re just watching each other get nowhere. I bet that shadow is laughing at as. Ashley said.

Going back for seconds? That was a through beating. Gavin said. No thanks to you fuckers! We’re suppose to be on the same side! She said. You were the one who rushed it with a full head of steam. What’d you expect? Alexis said. Some damn backup! Ashley said. You had it from your sisters…… Mediocre at best. Remi said. At least we’re trying! And not watching others get beaten down! A witch said. Fools rush in. And I’m seeing a whole bunch of fools right now. Luke said. Enough! We’re not doing anyone any favors by arguing amongst ourselves. If we’re going to stop this thing, we need to work together. Not as hunters. Not as witches. As a team of people who are fighting to protect what we care about. Kat said.

…..Fine. Luke said. Put aside your petty difference and I’ll put away mine. Gavin said. Master Hiro? Alex said. ……Help them anyway you can. Hiro said. Same goes to you. All of you. Kat said addressing the witches. …..Alright. Fine. If they are willing, then I’ll help. Ashley said. Same here. Susan said. The others nod in agreement. Then we’re a cohesive unit. Kat said. Let’s do this. Alex said.


Back at the mansion.

……I know you guys have a lot of questions you want to ask, and I’d love to answer them, but at a different time. You said. You finish drawing the hunter’s symbol onto Dante’s hand and hug him like you did the rest. I know I told each of you not to use magic, but rules were meant to be broken. Each one of you has the hunter’s symbol on your hands. It will let you use magic, but only if your live are in peril. SO don’t get any idea’s, Tom. Since this is only a protection clause, it shouldn’t rend the flesh from your bones. Take care of each other. You said before stopping the recording on your wrist device. You take it off and place it next to Bruce.

So is that it? No heartfelt goodbye for me? Your darkhalf said. You aren’t one for goodbyes. You said. You’re right. So you’re going for good? He said. Not for good. I’ll be back. Someday. I just have to leave a message for one more person and see Mira and Miley. You’re going to leave one for Sue? He said. As much as she annoyed me, Sue never gave up on me. Even after I killed her twice and her friends, she still thought I was worth saving. You said. Even if she did trap your soul in a locket for 4 days. He said. Heart in the right place, just not the way to do it. Still…. As hard as it is to believe, she somewhat kept me grounded. She deserves that much. You said. Even if she has that my way or the highway attitude. He said.
152111111111111111111.title: Leaving a message

1521111111111111111111.content:
The shadow being took a step back as it felt the pressure from Luke, Kat, Hiro, and Ashley, The shadow being holds out its arm and multiple tendrils at them. They try to move, but find out there feet are bound by more tendrils in the ground. W-when did it do this!? Ashley said. As the tendrils get closer, they come to a sudden stop by Alexis, Alex, and Susan. They redirect them back towards it. When it tried to move, it was held in a stasis field by the other three witches. The tendrils go right through its chest.

Did that work? Alexis said as she freed the four of them. No. But it should be hurting. Luke said. As the shadow pulls out the tendrils, it lets out a unearthly moan. Shit. And I thought you’re snoring was a nightmare, Luke. Alex said. The shadow then looks at the united front and slam both arms into the ground. I don’t like what it’s doing. Ashley said. The ground starts to shake violently and multiple rows of shadow spikes rush them. Heinz, Luke, and Susan hit the ground and send out spikes of their own; which stops them both. The shadow disappears and weaves through the spikes and appears in front of them and slams the ground; sending a violent shockwave through the ground and sending most of the group into the air. The shadow then raises spikes that shoot towards them. I don’t think- Before Luke could finish, his body is encased in a protective barrier just as the spike hits him. Instead, he bounces off it and lands on his feet. As do the others. How….? Who? Luke said. You’re welcome. Ashley said. ……Hmph. Luke said. His way of saying thanks. Alex said.

Master Hiro? Remi said. Right. Alex. He said. Alex pulls out his two pistols and starts firing non stop. The shadow puts up a shield as the magic infused bullets get lodged into the shield. When the firing stops and the shield is gone, Remi’s brush strings entangles the shadow. Hiro appears in front of the shadow then behind it and sheathe his sword. Then a bright blue flash cuts across the shadow. Then another. And another. And another until they stop. Now! Hiro said. Alexis and Susan say the spell to bind the shadow in place. When it tries to summon more spikes, it’s body is also bounded in a stasis by Kat and the three other witches. Still remember? Alex said. Never forgot. Luke said. Both of them cut the hunter’s symbol on their hands and they start to glow purple. They both rush towards the shadow and hit it and their arms go through it. The shadow lets out a whail as the circle glows. Got to move! Alex said. The both get pulled back by Susan and Ashley as a beam of magic shoot upward into the sky as it engulfs the shadow. Whoo! Been too long since we did that! Alex said.

As the beam dies down, a figure is seen. No way….. None of that worked!? Ashley said. Ohhh…….. The figure said. Wait! That voice….. Alexis said. All the hunter knew who that voice belongs too. Volenski! Alexis said. As the shadow armor fades from his body, he starts to fall until Hiro grabs him and appears next to the group.

Not…..bad. For the coalitions first enemy. Volenski said. First enemy? You mean all this time? Ashley said. Heh….. Who else? Who else knew all the counters to the hunters? Only….another hunter. He said. Why? Kat said. Alex’s son told me all about this unity between the…..hunters and witches. He said. He did? Remi said. I told you. Kat said. I was….skeptical at first, and he didn’t trust the peace to last no more that a week. So…..he thought to give them a big enough problem where both sides had to work together or be extinguished. He said. My son thought of all this? Alex said. It was all his idea from the beginning. He was the one who disguised me as himself and attack miss short temper here. He said. T-that was you!? Ashley said. Yes. He needed a messenger and who else but you. He said. So…..Kat was right this entire time? Alexis said. I told you it was all him from the start. She said. Volenski’s body starts to disappear. Ugh…. You guys really did a number. Seems…..like you hunters and witches can work together. He said. Wait! Volenski, where is my son at? Alex said. He said he went to a mansion. He said he had to meet a few people. He said before vanishing into particles.

Luke was already gone and so was Alexis. Damn….. They moved faster than I thought they can. Heinz said. ……Finish things up here. Alex said before vanishing. So….I guess we just depart? Remi said.

Luke bust through the door with Alexis’ behind him. You just missed him. Bruce said. He’s gone….. Dante said. Did he say anything?! Like where he was going?! Alexis said. No…. He left as a message. And a parting gift. Tom said. Luke sees the wrist device and plays the message.

Em’s not taking it well. I didn’t think it was possible for a demon to cry. Tom said. What’s this parting gift he left? Alexis said. He carved a symbol on our hands. Said it was to protect us. Cody said. Luke sees the symbol. The hunter’s symbol….. There’s magic within it too. He said. He….gave us magic to use as protection. Hank said. How did he even do this without us knowing? Sam said. He stopped time. Luke said. Luke! Is he here?! Alex said, appearing. No…. He’s long gone. Luke said. (A…. Alex?) Em said. Em? Alex said. The two stare at each other for a second.


Damn….. I forgot what you looked like. Has it been that long? He said. (It has….. Leah would be surprised as well…..) She said. She would…… Even she didn’t think this whole demon thing would turn out well. He said. (It wasn’t a good start.) She said. That’s him? Kim whispered. Yeah. Don’t be surprised if he’s here for money. Sam said. I’m not….. Alex said. Sam and Kim both looked surprised. I’ve seen looks like that and whispers. I’ve stopped being a bounty hunter years ago. It’s not worth the sleepless nights….. All I want is to see my son. He said. He’s gone. He left us with these marks. Tom said. The message he left us said he’d be back one day. Cody said. But….. Why would he leave in the first place? Kris said. ……I think he thinks we’d be better off without him. Dante said. What? Why? Bruce said. Ok….. Nobody rip me apart for this, but….. Things tend to get out of control with him around. Dante said. Out of control? Cody said. Em looks at Dante with a furious expression. Em! Calm down. Luke said. It’s in no disrespect to him, but he’s always at the center of all the problems. We all remember Kyle and her reign of terror. Who stopped it? Dante said. The commander…. Tom said. And when he left to go take out that…..? What’s it called again? Dante said. Coven. Luke said. Right. No danger to us, but he went off on his own. And let’s not forget we were all mind controlled by Lilith. He said.

But those things were out of his control. He told us he had no problem with Kyle’s rule. And the coven was an act of revenge. And he didn’t have anything to do with Lilith. He came to save us in the end. Tom said. And that’s the thing. They always end with him. One way or another, and whether he wants to or not. Dante said. EM! I said no! Let him finish! Luke said. What I’m trying to get at is that maybe he thinks things will be better off for us with him gone. If he’s not here, then there’s no problem. Dante said. There’s always going to be a problem. We’ve only recently found out about witch hunters and witches. And this whole thing about magic. Hank said. Right. But we only had to worry about those preteen Godzilla Wanna-be’s either killing or enslaving us. We didn’t think anything else would exist outside of that. Dante said. …….Have things really gotten that bad? Tom said. He used protocol black on us. Sam said. We were mind controlled! All of us were! It was plan he never thought he’d use. I mean, would we really turn our backs on him?! Bruce said. No…. Dante said. We wouldn’t even get the chance. Not with Em and Luke here. Tom said.

I’ve been where his head is. You think the world and the people you love would be better off without you. I made so many enemies that I thought leaving would be the only way for my family to be safe. Alex said. I had them too. If my ties with my family weren’t strong, I’d done it. Alexis said. The room fills with silence. So…. Does that mean we just…..stop looking? Cody said. ……If he wanted to come back, he would have stayed when he gave us these. Kris said. So we…. Hank said. Yeah…. Stop searching. If he said he’ll come back, then we have to trust him on it. Bruce said. Em nearly broke down, which almost made Alex do the same.
1521111111111111111111.title: Gone with the wind

15211111111111111111111.content:
On the border on M.

After settling everything with the hunters, Ashley went back home. Usually, she’d stay in M district until the moon was high in the sky, but after what happened, she needed some rest. She still can’t believe that peace between the hunters and witches had finally been reached. She thought pigs would fly before that happened. She flops onto her bed and sighs. She was going to milk this as long as she could because she knew it was only a matter of time before she has to deal with a certain someone. She knew those seven years of peace would have to come to an end. I already know what he’s going to say. “I did what you couldn’t, Sue. That’s twice I had to show you up at your own game.” She said in a mocking tone. She sighs heavily. If I could just brand my name on him, I’d ask for nothing else. She said. When she sits up and sees a device on her dresser. What the….. She said, getting up. She looks at the device. This….is the same device I stole from that girl. But he broke it. She said. She cautiously picks it up.

There’s a message here address for me. She said. She pushes the play button.

Hello Su- No…. Ashley. Bet you enjoyed all that time you didn’t have to deal with me. Finally stopped ripping out your hair. You said. One time….. She said. I’m not going to beat around the bush here. You and me never saw eye to eye on anything. Kyle, life philosophy, choices. Hell, we’d argue about everything like an old married couple. You said. Oh god….. You both said. But I’m getting sidetracked here. What I wanted to say was…… Even though we butt heads on everything, you were the one of two people who kept me grounded. You said. Ashley has a surprised look. I know, shocking. But you know it yourself. No matter what I did, you still saw good in a person whose done nothing but shit for himself. Even when you ripped out my soul, you still had hope for me. Others would have just thrown there hands up. I guess that stubbornness of yours is good for something. You said. …..Heh. More like trouble. She said with a small smile.

Look…. It’s not easy for me to do this. Live life with no regrets. But….. I’m sorry for the trouble I’ve caused you. She said. Ashley went wide eyed. Yeah, you heard me. I said I’m sorry. I never meant for things to get like this between us. I wasn’t out to make enemies of anyone. I wanted to be left alone. But a guy who can knockout someone 10x his size isn’t incline to a solitary life, I guess. You said. He only wanted to be alone? She said.

I don’t want this message to drag out longer than needed. The world needs more good people like you. Just work on not being a Mary Sue. You said. Just couldn’t help yourself, could you? She said. I couldn’t help myself. But this has gone on long enough. Goodbye Ashley…… And good luck. You said.

All this time, he just wanted to be left alone. And there is a person inside him. I knew it…... ……Godspeed. Wherever you are. She said.

Ok….. Everything’s taken care of. Time to go. You said. Not so fast. A voice said. You see a black mist rise into the air and red eyes in them. Oh. Devil What do I owe the displeasure? You said. I come to collect. He said. Collect what? I didn’t make a deal with you. You said. Ah, but remember when you wanted to talk with Sylvia? I told you, everything has a price. He said. Course you remember that. …..Fine. On one condition. My dad and mom get their lives back as well. You said. Hahahahahaha! You really think yours is worth not one, but two witches and a hunter’s? He said. You know what I’ve done. Plus, you know when hunter’s die, our souls go to the hunter’s cabin. You said. I know. You hunters really don’t like following the rules. He said. And you know a hunter’s soul has a lot more value than a witches. And I heard the stories of my mother, but I heard my father’s as well. You tell me who seems like a prime candidate you want. You said. ……Ha…. HAHAHAHAHAHA! You really are devil dog’s son! Both of you have the gift of the gab. Very well. For your mother, father, and Sylvia, you take their place. Fine by-No deal. A voice said.

You turn to see Heather coming out of a shadow. Heather….. You said. You….. I don’t know if I should be happy or mad at you. You played with my feelings when I was trying to keep you safe. She said. I didn’t….mean to. It’s just something I had to do. You said. You used me! If I didn’t care about you, I’d make you a mindless slave and torture you without end! She said as her right eye starts to faintly glow. But….. I do care about you. Which is why I’m here. No deal, devil. Go find another person with nothing to lose. She said. Hold on. I already agreed to it. You said. Well, I don’t. Find another hunter or witch to sink your teeth into. She said. This is between me and him. I made a deal with Sylvia to bring her back. This is my mess. You said. I don’t care! I’m not letting you do this because kingdom obsessed Sylvia wants to be back with the living! She said. It’s not just Sylvia, Heather. His life for Alex and Leah as well. The devil said. Like hell you are! You’re not taking him anywhere! She said. Don’t you want to see her again, Heather? You two were the best of friends. Attached to the hip and everything. Surely you want to relive those days. He said. Heather’s relationship with your mom sounds like….. Chijinda….. You mutter.

……I miss her everyday. But I made her a promise to look after her child! And I don’t break- Forlumus. You interrupt. A dark circle appears under Heather and dark tethers bind her. What?! Sec- You grab her by the throat to stop her. Silncos. You said. You let go to see of her and see a black ring on her neck. When she tries to speak, nothing comes out. ……Let’s get this over with. You said. A black fog circles around you as Heather’s eyes go wide. …….Oktar volumus liftus. You said before you disappear.
15211111111111111111111.title: Devil's deal

152111111111111111111111.content:
When you disappeared, the seals were broken and Heather collapses on the ground in sadness. Damnit….. Damnit! DAMNIT!! She shouts as tears run down her cheek. As she sobs, a symbol appears on the ground and out of it comes Leah.

*Yawn* Time to work already? She said rubbing her head. She hears crying and looks to see who it is. Heather? Leah said. L…. Leah….. Heather said as she hugged her. Jesus, Heather. What’s the occasion? Are you crying? She said. A….and? I can show emotions like other people…. Heather said, trying to act normal. Not like this. You’re acting like your child was killed right in front of you. Leah said. Is that coming from the same girl who cried for an hour and a half at the end of Old Yellow? Heather said. Ok. You know I’m close to bloodhound. That ending is torturous to any dog lover. Leah said. Right….. Heather said.

So what did you summon me for? I know it wasn’t just to bring up old memories. She said. A…. A lot has happened. Heather said.

Heather tells Leah everything.

Really not surprised mom tried to live like it was the 15th century again. And mind control too. Hell, not even grandma went that far. She wanted a kingdom but was subtle about it. Although she got poisoned in the end. So the hunters finally put aside their differences with us? She said. Yeah….. Your son not only stopped your mother…. But he put the idea out there. She said. My baby did? Leah said. Yeah….. He’s turned into a fine person. Heather said. I…. Haven’t seen him since he was a toddler. She said. You don’t remember seeing him back in the coven? Heather said. You know people who are summoned don’t keep their memories of each time they are summoned. She said. Right….. You remember Alex? She said. Of course I do. We’re married. She said. Well, he’s back too. Heather said. He is? That means I can have my family back! Wait. Is Luke still around? Leah said. You know he is. Heather said. Oh god….. I better find him before Luke gets him wrapped up in trouble again. She said.

Leah?! A voice said. A….Alex? Leah said. Alex appears right behind her.

Leah…. He said. Alex… She said as she cupped him in her hands. It’s been so long….. I forgot what you looked like. He said. And what kind of husband forgets what his wife looks like? She said. Like I said, been so long. You know hunters don’t go to hell. We go straight to the Hunter’s cabin. Alex said. You guys really hate doing things that aren’t your way. Heather said. Heather? You’re still kicking? Alex said. Why wouldn’t I? Leah told me to look me to look after her child. She said. That you flirt with nonstop. He said. Really, Heather? My baby? Leah said. He’s cute with that serious look he has. She said. I said look after him, not flirt with him. She said. Heather gives a nervous laugh as Leah rolls her eyes.

Well, this is quite the reunion. All that’s missing is my baby boy. Leah said. Both Alex and Heather look away. What? My baby is alive, right? She said. About that…… Alex and Heather both said.


Back in m district.

Your dark half was heading back to Mira’s house. The things I do for you….. I’d laughed if someone told me this was going to happen. He said. Before he could open the door, his body starts to fade. What the?! Oh shit…. Never thought this day would come. He said. As his body starts to fade away, a bight stasis field surround him and his body starts to become solid again. Huh? He said. The field stays on him for a minute then it disappears.

That bastard….. I don’t know if I should be angry or overjoyed. He said. (Heh…. Leaving me behind with your mess….. Fine. The one time you save me. I’ll remember this. Try not to cause too much trouble down there without me.) He thought. When he reached for the door, it flung open and Miley grabs hugs him. Brother! She said. Miley, you’re getting too old for this….. You’re going to tackle me to the ground one day. He said. She lets go of him. Whoa…. Someone’s getting bigger. How many growth spurts did you have since last time? You said. I’m 23 now. You expected me to stay the same height forever? She said. A little. He said. By the way, you said I could start coming with you when I get older. She said. I did? He said. Yeah. When I was 16, you said “I’ll let you come with me when you’re older.” Well, I’m older now. She said. (This time, the mess is mine to clean.) He thought. Is Mira going to be ok with this? She’s your sister. He said. Mira! Miley said.

Coming out of her room, Mira sees your dark half and mistakes it for you. Hey Mira….. You’ve been letting your hair grow out. He said. She says nothing at she walks up to him and hugs him tightly. I’ve missed you. She said. I know….. Sorry for the sudden departure. I….just had a lot to deal with. He said. But you’re back now! Miley said, hugging him tighter than Mira. (This warm, fuzzy feeling….. Still not use to it.) He thought.

Mira! Tell him it’s ok for me to go with him when he leaves. Miley said. Actually….. I won’t be leaving anymore. Everything has been settled and my enemies are dealt with. He said. Are….. Are you saying….. Mira said with a gleam in her eye. Yeah….. I’m home. For good this time. He said.
152111111111111111111111.title: Home.... At last
